LogStream.description: Describes a stream to which TDLib internal log is written

error.description: An object of this type can be returned on every function call, in case of an error

code.description: Error code; subject to future changes. If the error code is 406, the error message must not be processed in any way and must not be displayed to the user

message.description: Error message; subject to future changes

ok.description: An object of this type is returned on a successful function call for certain functions

authenticationCodeTypeTelegramMessage.description: A digit-only authentication code is delivered via a private Telegram message, which can be viewed from another active session

authenticationCodeTypeSms.description: A digit-only authentication code is delivered via an SMS message to the specified phone number; non-official applications may not receive this type of code

authenticationCodeTypeSmsWord.description: An authentication code is a word delivered via an SMS message to the specified phone number; non-official applications may not receive this type of code

first_letter.description: The first letters of the word if known

authenticationCodeTypeSmsPhrase.description: An authentication code is a phrase from multiple words delivered via an SMS message to the specified phone number; non-official applications may not receive this type of code

first_word.description: The first word of the phrase if known

authenticationCodeTypeCall.description: A digit-only authentication code is delivered via a phone call to the specified phone number

authenticationCodeTypeFlashCall.description: An authentication code is delivered by an immediately canceled call to the specified phone number. The phone number that calls is the code that must be entered automatically

pattern.description: Pattern of the phone number from which the call will be made

authenticationCodeTypeMissedCall.description: An authentication code is delivered by an immediately canceled call to the specified phone number. The last digits of the phone number that calls are the code that must be entered manually by the user

phone_number_prefix.description: Prefix of the phone number from which the call will be made

length.description: Number of digits in the code, excluding the prefix

authenticationCodeTypeFragment.description: A digit-only authentication code is delivered to https://fragment.com. The user must be logged in there via a wallet owning the phone number's NFT

url.description: URL to open to receive the code

authenticationCodeTypeFirebaseAndroid.description: A digit-only authentication code is delivered via Firebase Authentication to the official Android application

device_verification_parameters.description: Parameters to be used for device verification

authenticationCodeTypeFirebaseIos.description: A digit-only authentication code is delivered via Firebase Authentication to the official iOS application

receipt.description: Receipt of successful application token validation to compare with receipt from push notification

push_timeout.description: Time after the next authentication method is expected to be used if verification push notification isn't received, in seconds

authenticationCodeInfo.description: Information about the authentication code that was sent

phone_number.description: A phone number that is being authenticated

type.description: The way the code was sent to the user

next_type.description: The way the next code will be sent to the user; may be null

timeout.description: Timeout before the code can be re-sent, in seconds

emailAddressAuthenticationCodeInfo.description: Information about the email address authentication code that was sent

email_address_pattern.description: Pattern of the email address to which an authentication code was sent

length.description: Length of the code; 0 if unknown

emailAddressAuthenticationCode.description: An authentication code delivered to a user's email address

emailAddressAuthenticationAppleId.description: An authentication token received through Apple ID

emailAddressAuthenticationGoogleId.description: An authentication token received through Google ID

emailAddressResetStateAvailable.description: Email address can be reset after the given period. Call resetAuthenticationEmailAddress to reset it and allow the user to authorize with a code sent to the user's phone number

wait_period.description: Time required to wait before the email address can be reset; 0 if the user is subscribed to Telegram Premium

emailAddressResetStatePending.description: Email address reset has already been requested. Call resetAuthenticationEmailAddress to check whether immediate reset is possible

reset_in.description: Left time before the email address will be reset, in seconds. updateAuthorizationState is not sent when this field changes

textEntity.description: Represents a part of the text that needs to be formatted in some unusual way

offset.description: Offset of the entity, in UTF-16 code units

length.description: Length of the entity, in UTF-16 code units

textEntities.description: Contains a list of text entities

entities.description: Entities contained in the text. Entities can be nested, but must not mutually intersect with each other. Pre, Code and PreCode entities can't contain other entities. BlockQuote entities can't contain other BlockQuote entities. Bold, Italic, Underline, Strikethrough, and Spoiler entities can contain and can be part of any other entities. All other entities can't contain each other

text.description: Text of the terms of service

min_user_age.description: The minimum age of a user to be able to accept the terms; 0 if age isn't restricted

show_popup.description: True, if a blocking popup with terms of service must be shown to the user

authorizationStateWaitTdlibParameters.description: Initialization parameters are needed. Call setTdlibParameters to provide them

authorizationStateWaitPhoneNumber.description: TDLib needs the user's phone number to authorize. Call setAuthenticationPhoneNumber to provide the phone number, or use requestQrCodeAuthentication or checkAuthenticationBotToken for other authentication options

authorizationStateWaitPremiumPurchase.description: The user must buy Telegram Premium as an in-store purchase to log in. Call checkAuthenticationPremiumPurchase and then setAuthenticationPremiumPurchaseTransaction

store_product_id.description: Identifier of the store product that must be bought

authorizationStateWaitEmailAddress.description: TDLib needs the user's email address to authorize. Call setAuthenticationEmailAddress to provide the email address, or directly call checkAuthenticationEmailCode with Apple ID/Google ID token if allowed

allow_apple_id.description: True, if authorization through Apple ID is allowed

allow_google_id.description: True, if authorization through Google ID is allowed

authorizationStateWaitEmailCode.description: TDLib needs the user's authentication code sent to an email address to authorize. Call checkAuthenticationEmailCode to provide the code

allow_apple_id.description: True, if authorization through Apple ID is allowed

allow_google_id.description: True, if authorization through Google ID is allowed

code_info.description: Information about the sent authentication code

email_address_reset_state.description: Reset state of the email address; may be null if the email address can't be reset

authorizationStateWaitCode.description: TDLib needs the user's authentication code to authorize. Call checkAuthenticationCode to check the code

code_info.description: Information about the authorization code that was sent

authorizationStateWaitOtherDeviceConfirm.description: The user needs to confirm authorization on another logged in device by scanning a QR code with the provided link

link.description: A tg:// URL for the QR code. The link will be updated frequently

authorizationStateWaitRegistration.description: The user is unregistered and need to accept terms of service and enter their first name and last name to finish registration. Call registerUser to accept the terms of service and provide the data

authorizationStateWaitPassword.description: The user has been authorized, but needs to enter a 2-step verification password to start using the application. Call checkAuthenticationPassword to provide the password, or requestAuthenticationPasswordRecovery to recover the password, or deleteAccount to delete the account after a week

password_hint.description: Hint for the password; may be empty

has_recovery_email_address.description: True, if a recovery email address has been set up

has_passport_data.description: True, if some Telegram Passport elements were saved

recovery_email_address_pattern.description: Pattern of the email address to which the recovery email was sent; empty until a recovery email has been sent

authorizationStateReady.description: The user has been successfully authorized. TDLib is now ready to answer general requests

authorizationStateLoggingOut.description: The user is currently logging out

authorizationStateClosing.description: TDLib is closing, all subsequent queries will be answered with the error 500. Note that closing TDLib can take a while. All resources will be freed only after authorizationStateClosed has been received

authorizationStateClosed.description: TDLib client is in its final state. All databases are closed and all resources are released. No other updates will be received after this. All queries will be responded to with error code 500. To continue working, one must create a new instance of the TDLib client

firebaseDeviceVerificationParametersSafe.description: Device verification must be performed with the SafetyNet Attestation API

nonce.description: Nonce to pass to the SafetyNet Attestation API

firebaseDeviceVerificationParametersPlay.description: Device verification must be performed with the classic Play Integrity verification (https://developer.android.com/google/play/integrity/classic)

nonce.description: Base64url-encoded nonce to pass to the Play Integrity API

cloud_project_number.description: Cloud project number to pass to the Play Integrity API

passwordState.description: Represents the current state of 2-step verification

has_password.description: True, if a 2-step verification password is set

password_hint.description: Hint for the password; may be empty

has_recovery_email_address.description: True, if a recovery email is set

has_passport_data.description: True, if some Telegram Passport elements were saved

recovery_email_address_code_info.description: Information about the recovery email address to which the confirmation email was sent; may be null

login_email_address_pattern.description: Pattern of the email address set up for logging in

pending_reset_date.description: If not 0, point in time (Unix timestamp) after which the 2-step verification password can be reset immediately using resetPassword

recoveryEmailAddress.description: Contains information about the current recovery email address

temporaryPasswordState.description: Returns information about the availability of a temporary password, which can be used for payments

has_password.description: True, if a temporary password is available

valid_for.description: Time left before the temporary password expires, in seconds

path.description: Local path to the locally available file part; may be empty

can_be_downloaded.description: True, if it is possible to download or generate the file

can_be_deleted.description: True, if the file can be deleted

is_downloading_active.description: True, if the file is currently being downloaded (or a local copy is being generated by some other means)

is_downloading_completed.description: True, if the local copy is fully available

download_offset.description: Download will be started from this offset. downloaded_prefix_size is calculated from this offset

downloaded_prefix_size.description: If is_downloading_completed is false, then only some prefix of the file starting from download_offset is ready to be read. downloaded_prefix_size is the size of that prefix in bytes

downloaded_size.description: Total downloaded file size, in bytes. Can be used only for calculating download progress. The actual file size may be bigger, and some parts of it may contain garbage

id.description: Remote file identifier; may be empty. Can be used by the current user across application restarts or even from other devices. Uniquely identifies a file, but a file can have a lot of different valid identifiers. If the identifier starts with "http://" or "https://", it represents the HTTP URL of the file. TDLib is currently unable to download files if only their URL is known. If downloadFile/addFileToDownloads is called on such a file or if it is sent to a secret chat, TDLib starts a file generation process by sending updateFileGenerationStart to the application with the HTTP URL in the original_path and "#url#" as the conversion string. Application must generate the file by downloading it to the specified location

unique_id.description: Unique file identifier; may be empty if unknown. The unique file identifier which is the same for the same file even for different users and is persistent over time

is_uploading_active.description: True, if the file is currently being uploaded (or a remote copy is being generated by some other means)

is_uploading_completed.description: True, if a remote copy is fully available

uploaded_size.description: Size of the remote available part of the file, in bytes; 0 if unknown

size.description: File size, in bytes; 0 if unknown

expected_size.description: Approximate file size in bytes in case the exact file size is unknown. Can be used to show download/upload progress

local.description: Information about the local copy of the file

remote.description: Information about the remote copy of the file

inputFileId.description: A file defined by its unique identifier

inputFileRemote.description: A file defined by its remote identifier. The remote identifier is guaranteed to be usable only if the corresponding file is still accessible to the user and known to TDLib. For example, if the file is from a message, then the message must be not deleted and accessible to the user. If the file database is disabled, then the corresponding object with the file must be preloaded by the application

inputFileLocal.description: A file defined by a local path

inputFileGenerated.description: A file generated by the application. The application must handle updates updateFileGenerationStart and updateFileGenerationStop to generate the file when asked by TDLib

original_path.description: Local path to a file from which the file is generated. The path doesn't have to be a valid path and is used by TDLib only to detect name and MIME type of the generated file

conversion.description: String specifying the conversion applied to the original file; must be persistent across application restarts. Conversions beginning with '#' are reserved for internal TDLib usage

expected_size.description: Expected size of the generated file, in bytes; pass 0 if unknown

photoSize.description: Describes an image in JPEG format

photo.description: Information about the image file

progressive_sizes.description: Sizes of progressive JPEG file prefixes, which can be used to preliminarily show the image; in bytes

minithumbnail.description: Thumbnail image of a very poor quality and low resolution

thumbnailFormatJpeg.description: The thumbnail is in JPEG format

thumbnailFormatGif.description: The thumbnail is in static GIF format. It will be used only for some bot inline query results

thumbnailFormatMpeg4.description: The thumbnail is in MPEG4 format. It will be used only for some animations and videos

thumbnailFormatPng.description: The thumbnail is in PNG format. It will be used only for background patterns

thumbnailFormatTgs.description: The thumbnail is in TGS format. It will be used only for sticker sets

thumbnailFormatWebm.description: The thumbnail is in WEBM format. It will be used only for sticker sets

thumbnailFormatWebp.description: The thumbnail is in WEBP format. It will be used only for some stickers and sticker sets

thumbnail.description: Represents a thumbnail

maskPointForehead.description: The mask is placed relatively to the forehead

maskPointEyes.description: The mask is placed relatively to the eyes

maskPointMouth.description: The mask is placed relatively to the mouth

maskPointChin.description: The mask is placed relatively to the chin

maskPosition.description: Position on a photo where a mask is placed

point.description: Part of the face, relative to which the mask is placed

x_shift.description: Shift by X-axis measured in widths of the mask scaled to the face size, from left to right. (For example, -1.0 will place the mask just to the left of the default mask position)

y_shift.description: Shift by Y-axis measured in heights of the mask scaled to the face size, from top to bottom. (For example, 1.0 will place the mask just below the default mask position)

scale.description: Mask scaling coefficient. (For example, 2.0 means a doubled size)

stickerFormatWebp.description: The sticker is an image in WEBP format

stickerFormatTgs.description: The sticker is an animation in TGS format

stickerFormatWebm.description: The sticker is a video in WEBM format

stickerTypeRegular.description: The sticker is a regular sticker

stickerTypeMask.description: The sticker is a mask in WEBP format to be placed on photos or videos

stickerTypeCustomEmoji.description: The sticker is a custom emoji to be used inside message text and caption

stickerFullTypeRegular.description: The sticker is a regular sticker

premium_animation.description: Premium animation of the sticker; may be null. If present, only Telegram Premium users can use the sticker

stickerFullTypeMask.description: The sticker is a mask in WEBP format to be placed on photos or videos

mask_position.description: Position where the mask is placed; may be null

stickerFullTypeCustomEmoji.description: The sticker is a custom emoji to be used inside message text and caption. Currently, only Telegram Premium users can use custom emoji

needs_repainting.description: True, if the sticker must be repainted to a text color in messages, the color of the Telegram Premium badge in emoji status, white color on chat photos, or another appropriate color in other places

closedVectorPath.description: Represents a closed vector path. The path begins at the end point of the last command. The coordinate system origin is in the upper-left corner

paths.description: The list of closed vector paths

pollOption.description: Describes one answer option of a poll

text.description: Option text; 1-100 characters. Only custom emoji entities are allowed

voter_count.description: Number of voters for this option, available only for closed or voted polls

vote_percentage.description: The percentage of votes for this option; 0-100

is_chosen.description: True, if the option was chosen by the user

is_being_chosen.description: True, if the option is being chosen by a pending setPollAnswer request

allow_multiple_answers.description: True, if multiple answer options can be chosen simultaneously

pollTypeQuiz.description: A poll in quiz mode, which has exactly one correct answer option and can be answered only once

correct_option_id.description: 0-based identifier of the correct answer option; -1 for a yet unanswered poll

explanation.description: Text that is shown when the user chooses an incorrect answer or taps on the lamp icon; 0-200 characters with at most 2 line feeds; empty for a yet unanswered poll

animation.description: Describes an animation file. The animation must be encoded in GIF or MPEG4 format

duration.description: Duration of the animation, in seconds; as defined by the sender

file_name.description: Original name of the file; as defined by the sender

mime_type.description: MIME type of the file, usually "image/gif" or "video/mp4"

has_stickers.description: True, if stickers were added to the animation. The list of corresponding sticker set can be received using getAttachedStickerSets

thumbnail.description: Animation thumbnail in JPEG or MPEG4 format; may be null

audio.description: Describes an audio file. Audio is usually in MP3 or M4A format

duration.description: Duration of the audio, in seconds; as defined by the sender

title.description: Title of the audio; as defined by the sender

performer.description: Performer of the audio; as defined by the sender

file_name.description: Original name of the file; as defined by the sender

mime_type.description: The MIME type of the file; as defined by the sender

album_cover_minithumbnail.description: The minithumbnail of the album cover; may be null

album_cover_thumbnail.description: The thumbnail of the album cover in JPEG format; as defined by the sender. The full size thumbnail is expected to be extracted from the downloaded audio file; may be null

external_album_covers.description: Album cover variants to use if the downloaded audio file contains no album cover. Provided thumbnail dimensions are approximate

document.description: Describes a document of any type

file_name.description: Original name of the file; as defined by the sender

mime_type.description: MIME type of the file; as defined by the sender

thumbnail.description: Document thumbnail in JPEG or PNG format (PNG will be used only for background patterns); as defined by the sender; may be null

photo.description: Describes a photo

has_stickers.description: True, if stickers were added to the photo. The list of corresponding sticker sets can be received using getAttachedStickerSets

sizes.description: Available variants of the photo, in different sizes

sticker.description: Describes a sticker

id.description: Unique sticker identifier within the set; 0 if none

set_id.description: Identifier of the sticker set to which the sticker belongs; 0 if none

width.description: Sticker width; as defined by the sender

height.description: Sticker height; as defined by the sender

thumbnail.description: Sticker thumbnail in WEBP or JPEG format; may be null

sticker.description: File containing the sticker

duration.description: Duration of the video, in seconds; as defined by the sender

width.description: Video width; as defined by the sender

height.description: Video height; as defined by the sender

file_name.description: Original name of the file; as defined by the sender

mime_type.description: MIME type of the file; as defined by the sender

has_stickers.description: True, if stickers were added to the video. The list of corresponding sticker sets can be received using getAttachedStickerSets

supports_streaming.description: True, if the video is expected to be streamed

thumbnail.description: Video thumbnail in JPEG or MPEG4 format; as defined by the sender; may be null

videoNote.description: Describes a video note. The video must be equal in width and height, cropped to a circle, and stored in MPEG4 format

duration.description: Duration of the video, in seconds; as defined by the sender

waveform.description: A waveform representation of the video note's audio in 5-bit format; may be empty if unknown

length.description: Video width and height; as defined by the sender

thumbnail.description: Video thumbnail in JPEG format; as defined by the sender; may be null

speech_recognition_result.description: Result of speech recognition in the video note; may be null

duration.description: Duration of the voice note, in seconds; as defined by the sender

waveform.description: A waveform representation of the voice note in 5-bit format

mime_type.description: MIME type of the file; as defined by the sender. Usually, one of "audio/ogg" for Opus in an OGG container, "audio/mpeg" for an MP3 audio, or "audio/mp4" for an M4A audio

speech_recognition_result.description: Result of speech recognition in the voice note; may be null

animatedEmoji.description: Describes an animated or custom representation of an emoji

sticker.description: Sticker for the emoji; may be null if yet unknown for a custom emoji. If the sticker is a custom emoji, then it can have arbitrary format

sticker_width.description: Expected width of the sticker, which can be used if the sticker is null

sticker_height.description: Expected height of the sticker, which can be used if the sticker is null

fitzpatrick_type.description: Emoji modifier fitzpatrick type; 0-6; 0 if none

sound.description: File containing the sound to be played when the sticker is clicked; may be null. The sound is encoded with the Opus codec, and stored inside an OGG container

first_name.description: First name of the user; 1-255 characters in length

vcard.description: Additional data about the user in a form of vCard; 0-2048 bytes in length

user_id.description: Identifier of the user, if known; 0 otherwise

location.description: Describes a location on planet Earth

latitude.description: Latitude of the location in degrees; as defined by the sender

longitude.description: Longitude of the location, in degrees; as defined by the sender

horizontal_accuracy.description: The estimated horizontal accuracy of the location, in meters; as defined by the sender. 0 if unknown

location.description: Venue location; as defined by the sender

title.description: Venue name; as defined by the sender

address.description: Venue address; as defined by the sender

provider.description: Provider of the venue database; as defined by the sender. Currently, only "foursquare" and "gplaces" (Google Places) need to be supported

id.description: Identifier of the venue in the provider database; as defined by the sender

type.description: Type of the venue in the provider database; as defined by the sender

game.description: Describes a game. Use getInternalLink with internalLinkTypeGame to share the game

text.description: Game text, usually containing scoreboards for a game

photo.description: Game photo

webApp.description: Describes a Web App. Use getInternalLink with internalLinkTypeWebApp to share the Web App

photo.description: Web App photo

animation.description: Web App animation; may be null

question.description: Poll question; 1-300 characters. Only custom emoji entities are allowed

total_voter_count.description: Total number of voters, participating in the poll

recent_voter_ids.description: Identifiers of recent voters, if the poll is non-anonymous

is_anonymous.description: True, if the poll is anonymous

open_period.description: Amount of time the poll will be active after creation, in seconds

close_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the poll will automatically be closed

is_closed.description: True, if the poll is closed

alternativeVideo.description: Describes an alternative re-encoded quality of a video file

id.description: Unique identifier of the alternative video, which is used in the HLS file

codec.description: Codec used for video file encoding, for example, "h264", "h265", or "av1"

is_default.description: True, if this is one of default backgrounds

is_dark.description: True, if the background is dark and is recommended to be used with dark theme

document.description: Document with the background; may be null. Null only for filled and chat theme backgrounds

chatBackground.description: Describes a background set for a specific chat

dark_theme_dimming.description: Dimming of the background in dark themes, as a percentage; 0-100. Applied only to Wallpaper and Fill types of background

id.description: Photo identifier; 0 for an empty photo. Can be used to find a photo in a list of user profile photos

small.description: A small (160x160) user profile photo. The file can be downloaded only before the photo is changed

big.description: A big (640x640) user profile photo. The file can be downloaded only before the photo is changed

minithumbnail.description: User profile photo minithumbnail; may be null

has_animation.description: True, if the photo has animated variant

is_personal.description: True, if the photo is visible only for the current user

chatPhotoInfo.description: Contains basic information about the photo of a chat

small.description: A small (160x160) chat photo variant in JPEG format. The file can be downloaded only before the photo is changed

big.description: A big (640x640) chat photo variant in JPEG format. The file can be downloaded only before the photo is changed

minithumbnail.description: Chat photo minithumbnail; may be null

has_animation.description: True, if the photo has animated variant

is_personal.description: True, if the photo is visible only for the current user

userTypeDeleted.description: A deleted user or deleted bot. No information on the user besides the user identifier is available. It is not possible to perform any active actions on this type of user

can_be_edited.description: True, if the bot is owned by the current user and can be edited using the methods toggleBotUsernameIsActive, reorderBotActiveUsernames, setBotProfilePhoto, setBotName, setBotInfoDescription, and setBotInfoShortDescription

can_join_groups.description: True, if the bot can be invited to basic group and supergroup chats

can_read_all_group_messages.description: True, if the bot can read all messages in basic group or supergroup chats and not just those addressed to the bot. In private and channel chats a bot can always read all messages

has_main_web_app.description: True, if the bot has the main Web App

is_inline.description: True, if the bot supports inline queries

inline_query_placeholder.description: Placeholder for inline queries (displayed on the application input field)

need_location.description: True, if the location of the user is expected to be sent with every inline query to this bot

can_connect_to_business.description: True, if the bot supports connection to Telegram Business accounts

can_be_added_to_attachment_menu.description: True, if the bot can be added to attachment or side menu

active_user_count.description: The number of recently active users of the bot

userTypeUnknown.description: No information on the user besides the user identifier is available, yet this user has not been deleted. This object is extremely rare and must be handled like a deleted user. It is not possible to perform any actions on users of this type

botCommand.description: Represents a command supported by a bot

botCommands.description: Contains a list of bot commands

bot_user_id.description: Bot's user identifier

botMenuButton.description: Describes a button to be shown instead of bot commands menu button

url.description: URL of a Web App to open when the button is pressed. If the link is of the type internalLinkTypeWebApp, then it must be processed accordingly. Otherwise, the link must be passed to openWebApp

botVerificationParameters.description: Describes parameters of verification that is provided by a bot

icon_custom_emoji_id.description: Identifier of the custom emoji that is used as the verification sign

organization_name.description: Name of the organization that provides verification

default_custom_description.description: Default custom description of verification reason to be used as placeholder in setMessageSenderBotVerification; may be null if none

can_set_custom_description.description: True, if the bot is allowed to provide custom description for verified entities

botVerification.description: Describes verification status provided by a bot

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the bot that provided the verification

icon_custom_emoji_id.description: Identifier of the custom emoji that is used as the verification sign

custom_description.description: Custom description of verification reason set by the bot. Can contain only Mention, Hashtag, Cashtag, PhoneNumber, BankCardNumber, Url, and EmailAddress entities

verificationStatus.description: Contains information about verification status of a chat or a user

is_verified.description: True, if the chat or the user is verified by Telegram

is_scam.description: True, if the chat or the user is marked as scam by Telegram

is_fake.description: True, if the chat or the user is marked as fake by Telegram

bot_verification_icon_custom_emoji_id.description: Identifier of the custom emoji to be shown as verification sign provided by a bot for the user; 0 if none

chatLocation.description: Represents a location to which a chat is connected

location.description: The location

address.description: Location address; 1-64 characters, as defined by the chat owner

birthdate.description: Represents a birthdate of a user

closeBirthdayUser.description: Describes a user that had or will have a birthday soon

businessAwayMessageScheduleOutsideOfOpen.description: Send away messages outside of the business opening hours

businessAwayMessageScheduleCustom.description: Send away messages only in the specified time span

start_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the away messages will start to be sent

end_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the away messages will stop to be sent

businessLocation.description: Represents a location of a business

location.description: The location; may be null if not specified

businessRecipients.description: Describes private chats chosen for automatic interaction with a business

excluded_chat_ids.description: Identifiers of private chats that are always excluded; for businessConnectedBot only

select_existing_chats.description: True, if all existing private chats are selected

select_new_chats.description: True, if all new private chats are selected

select_contacts.description: True, if all private chats with contacts are selected

select_non_contacts.description: True, if all private chats with non-contacts are selected

exclude_selected.description: If true, then all private chats except the selected are chosen. Otherwise, only the selected chats are chosen

businessAwayMessageSettings.description: Describes settings for messages that are automatically sent by a Telegram Business account when it is away

shortcut_id.description: Unique quick reply shortcut identifier for the away messages

recipients.description: Chosen recipients of the away messages

schedule.description: Settings used to check whether the current user is away

offline_only.description: True, if the messages must not be sent if the account was online in the last 10 minutes

businessGreetingMessageSettings.description: Describes settings for greeting messages that are automatically sent by a Telegram Business account as response to incoming messages in an inactive private chat

shortcut_id.description: Unique quick reply shortcut identifier for the greeting messages

recipients.description: Chosen recipients of the greeting messages

inactivity_days.description: The number of days after which a chat will be considered as inactive; currently, must be on of 7, 14, 21, or 28

businessBotRights.description: Describes rights of a business bot

can_reply.description: True, if the bot can send and edit messages in the private chats that had incoming messages in the last 24 hours

can_read_messages.description: True, if the bot can mark incoming private messages as read

can_delete_sent_messages.description: True, if the bot can delete sent messages

can_delete_all_messages.description: True, if the bot can delete any message

can_edit_name.description: True, if the bot can edit name of the business account

can_edit_bio.description: True, if the bot can edit bio of the business account

can_edit_profile_photo.description: True, if the bot can edit profile photo of the business account

can_edit_username.description: True, if the bot can edit username of the business account

can_view_gifts_and_stars.description: True, if the bot can view gifts and amount of Telegram Stars owned by the business account

can_sell_gifts.description: True, if the bot can sell regular gifts received by the business account

can_change_gift_settings.description: True, if the bot can change gift receiving settings of the business account

can_transfer_and_upgrade_gifts.description: True, if the bot can transfer and upgrade gifts received by the business account

can_transfer_stars.description: True, if the bot can transfer Telegram Stars received by the business account to account of the bot, or use them to upgrade and transfer gifts

can_manage_stories.description: True, if the bot can post, edit and delete stories

businessConnectedBot.description: Describes a bot connected to a business account

bot_user_id.description: User identifier of the bot

recipients.description: Private chats that will be accessible to the bot

businessStartPage.description: Describes settings for a business account start page

title.description: Title text of the start page

message.description: Message text of the start page

sticker.description: Greeting sticker of the start page; may be null if none

inputBusinessStartPage.description: Describes settings for a business account start page to set

title.description: Title text of the start page; 0-getOption("business_start_page_title_length_max") characters

message.description: Message text of the start page; 0-getOption("business_start_page_message_length_max") characters

sticker.description: Greeting sticker of the start page; pass null if none. The sticker must belong to a sticker set and must not be a custom emoji

businessOpeningHoursInterval.description: Describes an interval of time when the business is open

start_minute.description: The minute's sequence number in a week, starting on Monday, marking the start of the time interval during which the business is open; 0-7*24*60

end_minute.description: The minute's sequence number in a week, starting on Monday, marking the end of the time interval during which the business is open; 1-8*24*60

businessOpeningHours.description: Describes opening hours of a business

opening_hours.description: Intervals of the time when the business is open

businessInfo.description: Contains information about a Telegram Business account

location.description: Location of the business; may be null if none

opening_hours.description: Opening hours of the business; may be null if none. The hours are guaranteed to be valid and has already been split by week days

local_opening_hours.description: Opening hours of the business in the local time; may be null if none. The hours are guaranteed to be valid and has already been split by week days. Local time zone identifier will be empty. An updateUserFullInfo update is not triggered when value of this field changes

next_open_in.description: Time left before the business will open the next time, in seconds; 0 if unknown. An updateUserFullInfo update is not triggered when value of this field changes

next_close_in.description: Time left before the business will close the next time, in seconds; 0 if unknown. An updateUserFullInfo update is not triggered when value of this field changes

greeting_message_settings.description: The greeting message; may be null if none or the Business account is not of the current user

away_message_settings.description: The away message; may be null if none or the Business account is not of the current user

start_page.description: Information about start page of the account; may be null if none

businessChatLink.description: Contains information about a business chat link

text.description: Message draft text that will be added to the input field

view_count.description: Number of times the link was used

inputBusinessChatLink.description: Describes a business chat link to create or edit

text.description: Message draft text that will be added to the input field

businessChatLinkInfo.description: Contains information about a business chat link

chat_id.description: Identifier of the private chat that created the link

text.description: Message draft text that must be added to the input field

chatPhotoStickerTypeRegularOrMask.description: Information about the sticker, which was used to create the chat photo

sticker_id.description: Identifier of the sticker in the set

chatPhotoStickerTypeCustomEmoji.description: Information about the custom emoji, which was used to create the chat photo

chatPhotoSticker.description: Information about the sticker, which was used to create the chat photo. The sticker is shown at the center of the photo and occupies at most 67% of it

background_fill.description: The fill to be used as background for the sticker; rotation angle in backgroundFillGradient isn't supported

animatedChatPhoto.description: Animated variant of a chat photo in MPEG4 format

main_frame_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the frame, used as a static chat photo

chatPhoto.description: Describes a chat or user profile photo

added_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the photo has been added

sizes.description: Available variants of the photo in JPEG format, in different size

animation.description: A big (up to 1280x1280) animated variant of the photo in MPEG4 format; may be null

small_animation.description: A small (160x160) animated variant of the photo in MPEG4 format; may be null even the big animation is available

sticker.description: Sticker-based version of the chat photo; may be null

chatPhotos.description: Contains a list of chat or user profile photos

total_count.description: Total number of photos

inputChatPhotoStatic.description: A static photo in JPEG format

animation.description: Animation to be set as profile photo. Only inputFileLocal and inputFileGenerated are allowed

main_frame_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the frame, which will be used as static chat photo

inputChatPhotoSticker.description: A sticker on a custom background

sticker.description: Information about the sticker

chatPermissions.description: Describes actions that a user is allowed to take in a chat

can_send_basic_messages.description: True, if the user can send text messages, contacts, giveaways, giveaway winners, invoices, locations, and venues

can_send_audios.description: True, if the user can send music files

can_send_documents.description: True, if the user can send documents

can_send_photos.description: True, if the user can send photos

can_send_videos.description: True, if the user can send videos

can_send_video_notes.description: True, if the user can send video notes

can_send_voice_notes.description: True, if the user can send voice notes

can_send_polls.description: True, if the user can send polls

can_send_other_messages.description: True, if the user can send animations, games, stickers, and dice and use inline bots

can_add_link_previews.description: True, if the user may add a link preview to their messages

can_change_info.description: True, if the user can change the chat title, photo, and other settings

can_invite_users.description: True, if the user can invite new users to the chat

can_pin_messages.description: True, if the user can pin messages

can_create_topics.description: True, if the user can create topics

can_manage_chat.description: True, if the administrator can access the chat event log, get boost list, see hidden supergroup and channel members, report supergroup spam messages, ignore slow mode, and send messages to the chat without paying Telegram Stars. Implied by any other privilege; applicable to supergroups and channels only

can_change_info.description: True, if the administrator can change the chat title, photo, and other settings

can_post_messages.description: True, if the administrator can create channel posts, answer to channel direct messages, or view channel statistics; applicable to channels only

can_edit_messages.description: True, if the administrator can edit messages of other users and pin messages; applicable to channels only

can_delete_messages.description: True, if the administrator can delete messages of other users

can_invite_users.description: True, if the administrator can invite new users to the chat

can_restrict_members.description: True, if the administrator can restrict, ban, or unban chat members or view supergroup statistics; always true for channels

can_pin_messages.description: True, if the administrator can pin messages; applicable to basic groups and supergroups only

can_manage_topics.description: True, if the administrator can create, rename, close, reopen, hide, and unhide forum topics; applicable to forum supergroups only

can_promote_members.description: True, if the administrator can add new administrators with a subset of their own privileges or demote administrators that were directly or indirectly promoted by them

can_manage_video_chats.description: True, if the administrator can manage video chats

can_post_stories.description: True, if the administrator can create new chat stories, or edit and delete posted stories; applicable to supergroups and channels only

can_edit_stories.description: True, if the administrator can edit stories posted by other users, post stories to the chat page, pin chat stories, and access story archive; applicable to supergroups and channels only

can_delete_stories.description: True, if the administrator can delete stories posted by other users; applicable to supergroups and channels only

is_anonymous.description: True, if the administrator isn't shown in the chat member list and sends messages anonymously; applicable to supergroups only

starAmount.description: Describes a possibly non-integer amount of Telegram Stars

star_count.description: The integer amount of Telegram Stars rounded to 0

nanostar_count.description: The number of 1/1000000000 shares of Telegram Stars; from -999999999 to 999999999

starSubscriptionTypeChannel.description: Describes a subscription to a channel chat

invite_link.description: The invite link that can be used to renew the subscription if it has been expired; may be empty, if the link isn't available anymore

starSubscriptionTypeBot.description: Describes a subscription in a bot or a business account

star_count.description: The amount of Telegram Stars that must be paid for each period

is_canceled.description: True, if the subscription was canceled

is_expiring.description: True, if the subscription expires soon and there are no enough Telegram Stars on the user's balance to extend it

starSubscriptions.description: Represents a list of Telegram Star subscriptions

star_amount.description: The amount of owned Telegram Stars

subscriptions.description: List of subscriptions for Telegram Stars

required_star_count.description: The number of Telegram Stars required to buy to extend subscriptions expiring soon

affiliateTypeBot.description: The affiliate is a bot owned by the current user

star_amount.description: The amount of Telegram Stars that were received by the affiliate; can be negative for refunds

revenue_star_count.description: The number of Telegram Stars that were earned by the affiliate program

programs.description: The list of connected affiliate programs

userFullInfo.description: Contains full information about a user

personal_photo.description: User profile photo set by the current user for the contact; may be null. If null and user.profile_photo is null, then the photo is empty; otherwise, it is unknown. If non-null, then it is the same photo as in user.profile_photo and chat.photo. This photo isn't returned in the list of user photos

photo.description: User profile photo; may be null. If null and user.profile_photo is null, then the photo is empty; otherwise, it is unknown. If non-null and personal_photo is null, then it is the same photo as in user.profile_photo and chat.photo

public_photo.description: User profile photo visible if the main photo is hidden by privacy settings; may be null. If null and user.profile_photo is null, then the photo is empty; otherwise, it is unknown. If non-null and both photo and personal_photo are null, then it is the same photo as in user.profile_photo and chat.photo. This photo isn't returned in the list of user photos

block_list.description: Block list to which the user is added; may be null if none

has_posted_to_profile_stories.description: True, if the user has posted to profile stories
