need_phone_number_privacy_exception.description: True, if the current user needs to explicitly allow to share their phone number with the user when the method addContact is used

set_chat_background.description: True, if the user set chat background for both chat users and it wasn't reverted yet

bio.description: A short user bio; may be null for bots

birthdate.description: Birthdate of the user; may be null if unknown

personal_chat_id.description: Identifier of the personal chat of the user; 0 if none

gift_count.description: Number of saved to profile gifts for other users or the total number of received gifts for the current user

group_in_common_count.description: Number of group chats where both the other user and the current user are a member; 0 for the current user

incoming_paid_message_star_count.description: Number of Telegram Stars that must be paid by the user for each sent message to the current user

outgoing_paid_message_star_count.description: Number of Telegram Stars that must be paid by the current user for each sent message to the user

gift_settings.description: Settings for gift receiving for the user

bot_verification.description: Information about verification status of the user provided by a bot; may be null if none or unknown

business_info.description: Information about business settings for Telegram Business accounts; may be null if none

bot_info.description: For bots, information about the bot; may be null if the user isn't a bot

total_count.description: Approximate total number of users found

foundUsers.description: Represents a list of found users

next_offset.description: The offset for the next request. If empty, then there are no more results

chatAdministrator.description: Contains information about a chat administrator

is_owner.description: True, if the user is the owner of the chat

chatAdministrators.description: Represents a list of chat administrators

chatMemberStatusCreator.description: The user is the owner of the chat and has all the administrator privileges

custom_title.description: A custom title of the owner; 0-16 characters without emoji; applicable to supergroups only

is_anonymous.description: True, if the creator isn't shown in the chat member list and sends messages anonymously; applicable to supergroups only

is_member.description: True, if the user is a member of the chat

chatMemberStatusAdministrator.description: The user is a member of the chat and has some additional privileges. In basic groups, administrators can edit and delete messages sent by others, add new members, ban unprivileged members, and manage video chats. In supergroups and channels, there are more detailed options for administrator privileges

custom_title.description: A custom title of the administrator; 0-16 characters without emoji; applicable to supergroups only

can_be_edited.description: True, if the current user can edit the administrator privileges for the called user

chatMemberStatusMember.description: The user is a member of the chat, without any additional privileges or restrictions

member_until_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the user will be removed from the chat because of the expired subscription; 0 if never. Ignored in setChatMemberStatus

chatMemberStatusRestricted.description: The user is under certain restrictions in the chat. Not supported in basic groups and channels

is_member.description: True, if the user is a member of the chat

restricted_until_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when restrictions will be lifted from the user; 0 if never. If the user is restricted for more than 366 days or for less than 30 seconds from the current time, the user is considered to be restricted forever

chatMemberStatusLeft.description: The user or the chat is not a chat member

chatMemberStatusBanned.description: The user or the chat was banned (and hence is not a member of the chat). Implies the user can't return to the chat, view messages, or be used as a participant identifier to join a video chat of the chat

banned_until_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the user will be unbanned; 0 if never. If the user is banned for more than 366 days or for less than 30 seconds from the current time, the user is considered to be banned forever. Always 0 in basic groups

chatMember.description: Describes a user or a chat as a member of another chat

member_id.description: Identifier of the chat member. Currently, other chats can be only Left or Banned. Only supergroups and channels can have other chats as Left or Banned members and these chats must be supergroups or channels

inviter_user_id.description: Identifier of a user that invited/promoted/banned this member in the chat; 0 if unknown

joined_chat_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the user joined/was promoted/was banned in the chat

status.description: Status of the member in the chat

chatMembers.description: Contains a list of chat members

total_count.description: Approximate total number of chat members found

chatMembersFilterMembers.description: Returns all chat members, including restricted chat members

chatMembersFilterMention.description: Returns users which can be mentioned in the chat

message_thread_id.description: If non-zero, the identifier of the current message thread

chatMembersFilterRestricted.description: Returns users under certain restrictions in the chat; can be used only by administrators in a supergroup

chatMembersFilterBanned.description: Returns users banned from the chat; can be used only by administrators in a supergroup or in a channel

chatMembersFilterBots.description: Returns bot members of the chat

supergroupMembersFilterRecent.description: Returns recently active users in reverse chronological order

supergroupMembersFilterContacts.description: Returns contacts of the user, which are members of the supergroup or channel

supergroupMembersFilterSearch.description: Used to search for supergroup or channel members via a (string) query

supergroupMembersFilterRestricted.description: Returns restricted supergroup members; can be used only by administrators

supergroupMembersFilterBanned.description: Returns users banned from the supergroup or channel; can be used only by administrators

supergroupMembersFilterMention.description: Returns users which can be mentioned in the supergroup

message_thread_id.description: If non-zero, the identifier of the current message thread

supergroupMembersFilterBots.description: Returns bot members of the supergroup or channel

invite_link.description: Chat invite link

creator_user_id.description: User identifier of an administrator created the link

date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the link was created

edit_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the link was last edited; 0 if never or unknown

expiration_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the link will expire; 0 if never

subscription_pricing.description: Information about subscription plan that is applied to the users joining the chat by the link; may be null if the link doesn't require subscription

member_limit.description: The maximum number of members, which can join the chat using the link simultaneously; 0 if not limited. Always 0 if the link requires approval

member_count.description: Number of chat members, which joined the chat using the link

expired_member_count.description: Number of chat members, which joined the chat using the link, but have already left because of expired subscription; for subscription links only

pending_join_request_count.description: Number of pending join requests created using this link

creates_join_request.description: True, if the link only creates join request. If true, total number of joining members will be unlimited

is_primary.description: True, if the link is primary. Primary invite link can't have name, expiration date, or usage limit. There is exactly one primary invite link for each administrator with can_invite_users right at a given time

is_revoked.description: True, if the link was revoked

chatInviteLinks.description: Contains a list of chat invite links

total_count.description: Approximate total number of chat invite links found

chatInviteLinkCount.description: Describes a chat administrator with a number of active and revoked chat invite links

chatInviteLinkCounts.description: Contains a list of chat invite link counts

chatInviteLinkMember.description: Describes a chat member joined a chat via an invite link

joined_chat_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the user joined the chat

via_chat_folder_invite_link.description: True, if the user has joined the chat using an invite link for a chat folder

approver_user_id.description: User identifier of the chat administrator, approved user join request

chatInviteLinkMembers.description: Contains a list of chat members joined a chat via an invite link

total_count.description: Approximate total number of chat members found

members.description: List of chat members, joined a chat via an invite link

inviteLinkChatTypeBasicGroup.description: The link is an invite link for a basic group

inviteLinkChatTypeSupergroup.description: The link is an invite link for a supergroup

inviteLinkChatTypeChannel.description: The link is an invite link for a channel

chatInviteLinkSubscriptionInfo.description: Contains information about subscription plan that must be paid by the user to use a chat invite link

pricing.description: Information about subscription plan that must be paid by the user to use the link

can_reuse.description: True, if the user has already paid for the subscription and can use joinChatByInviteLink to join the subscribed chat again

form_id.description: Identifier of the payment form to use for subscription payment; 0 if the subscription can't be paid

chatInviteLinkInfo.description: Contains information about a chat invite link

chat_id.description: Chat identifier of the invite link; 0 if the user has no access to the chat before joining

accessible_for.description: If non-zero, the amount of time for which read access to the chat will remain available, in seconds

photo.description: Chat photo; may be null

accent_color_id.description: Identifier of the accent color for chat title and background of chat photo

member_count.description: Number of members in the chat

member_user_ids.description: User identifiers of some chat members that may be known to the current user

subscription_info.description: Information about subscription plan that must be paid by the user to use the link; may be null if the link doesn't require subscription

creates_join_request.description: True, if the link only creates join request

is_public.description: True, if the chat is a public supergroup or channel, i.e. it has a username or it is a location-based supergroup

verification_status.description: Information about verification status of the chat; may be null if none

chatJoinRequest.description: Describes a user that sent a join request and waits for administrator approval

date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the user sent the join request

bio.description: A short bio of the user

chatJoinRequests.description: Contains a list of requests to join a chat

total_count.description: Approximate total number of requests found

chatJoinRequestsInfo.description: Contains information about pending join requests for a chat

total_count.description: Total number of pending join requests

user_ids.description: Identifiers of at most 3 users sent the newest pending join requests

basicGroup.description: Represents a basic group of 0-200 users (must be upgraded to a supergroup to accommodate more than 200 users)

member_count.description: Number of members in the group

status.description: Status of the current user in the group

is_active.description: True, if the group is active

upgraded_to_supergroup_id.description: Identifier of the supergroup to which this group was upgraded; 0 if none

basicGroupFullInfo.description: Contains full information about a basic group

photo.description: Chat photo; may be null if empty or unknown. If non-null, then it is the same photo as in chat.photo

description.description: Group description. Updated only after the basic group is opened

creator_user_id.description: User identifier of the creator of the group; 0 if unknown

can_hide_members.description: True, if non-administrators and non-bots can be hidden in responses to getSupergroupMembers and searchChatMembers for non-administrators after upgrading the basic group to a supergroup

can_toggle_aggressive_anti_spam.description: True, if aggressive anti-spam checks can be enabled or disabled in the supergroup after upgrading the basic group to a supergroup

invite_link.description: Primary invite link for this group; may be null. For chat administrators with can_invite_users right only. Updated only after the basic group is opened

bot_commands.description: List of commands of bots in the group

supergroup.description: Represents a supergroup or channel with zero or more members (subscribers in the case of channels). From the point of view of the system, a channel is a special kind of a supergroup: only administrators can post and see the list of members, and posts from all administrators use the name and photo of the channel instead of individual names and profile photos. Unlike supergroups, channels can have an unlimited number of subscribers

usernames.description: Usernames of the supergroup or channel; may be null

date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the current user joined, or the point in time when the supergroup or channel was created, in case the user is not a member

status.description: Status of the current user in the supergroup or channel; custom title will always be empty

member_count.description: Number of members in the supergroup or channel; 0 if unknown. Currently, it is guaranteed to be known only if the supergroup or channel was received through getChatSimilarChats, getChatsToPostStories, getCreatedPublicChats, getGroupsInCommon, getInactiveSupergroupChats, getRecommendedChats, getSuitableDiscussionChats, getUserPrivacySettingRules, getVideoChatAvailableParticipants, searchPublicChats, or in chatFolderInviteLinkInfo.missing_chat_ids, or in userFullInfo.personal_chat_id, or for chats with messages or stories from publicForwards and foundStories

boost_level.description: Approximate boost level for the chat

has_automatic_translation.description: True, if automatic translation of messages is enabled in the channel

has_linked_chat.description: True, if the channel has a discussion group, or the supergroup is the designated discussion group for a channel

has_location.description: True, if the supergroup is connected to a location, i.e. the supergroup is a location-based supergroup

sign_messages.description: True, if messages sent to the channel contains name of the sender. This field is only applicable to channels

show_message_sender.description: True, if messages sent to the channel have information about the sender user. This field is only applicable to channels

join_to_send_messages.description: True, if users need to join the supergroup before they can send messages. Always true for channels and non-discussion supergroups

join_by_request.description: True, if all users directly joining the supergroup need to be approved by supergroup administrators. Always false for channels and supergroups without username, location, or a linked chat

is_slow_mode_enabled.description: True, if the slow mode is enabled in the supergroup

is_channel.description: True, if the supergroup is a channel

is_broadcast_group.description: True, if the supergroup is a broadcast group, i.e. only administrators can send messages and there is no limit on the number of members

is_forum.description: True, if the supergroup is a forum with topics

is_direct_messages_group.description: True, if the supergroup is a direct message group for a channel chat

is_administered_direct_messages_group.description: True, if the supergroup is a direct messages group for a channel chat that is administered by the current user

verification_status.description: Information about verification status of the supergroup or channel; may be null if none

has_direct_messages_group.description: True, if the channel has direct messages group

has_forum_tabs.description: True, if the supergroup is a forum, which topics are shown in the same way as in channel direct messages groups

has_sensitive_content.description: True, if content of media messages in the supergroup or channel chat must be hidden with 18+ spoiler

restriction_reason.description: If non-empty, contains a human-readable description of the reason why access to this supergroup or channel must be restricted

paid_message_star_count.description: Number of Telegram Stars that must be paid by non-administrator users of the supergroup chat for each sent message

has_active_stories.description: True, if the supergroup or channel has non-expired stories available to the current user

has_unread_active_stories.description: True, if the supergroup or channel has unread non-expired stories available to the current user

supergroupFullInfo.description: Contains full information about a supergroup or channel

photo.description: Chat photo; may be null if empty or unknown. If non-null, then it is the same photo as in chat.photo

member_count.description: Number of members in the supergroup or channel; 0 if unknown

administrator_count.description: Number of privileged users in the supergroup or channel; 0 if unknown

restricted_count.description: Number of restricted users in the supergroup; 0 if unknown

banned_count.description: Number of users banned from chat; 0 if unknown

linked_chat_id.description: Chat identifier of a discussion group for the channel, or a channel, for which the supergroup is the designated discussion group; 0 if none or unknown

direct_messages_chat_id.description: Chat identifier of a direct messages group for the channel, or a channel, for which the supergroup is the designated direct messages group; 0 if none

slow_mode_delay.description: Delay between consecutive sent messages for non-administrator supergroup members, in seconds

slow_mode_delay_expires_in.description: Time left before next message can be sent in the supergroup, in seconds. An updateSupergroupFullInfo update is not triggered when value of this field changes, but both new and old values are non-zero

can_enable_paid_messages.description: True, if paid messages can be enabled in the supergroup chat; for supergroup only

can_enable_paid_reaction.description: True, if paid reaction can be enabled in the channel chat; for channels only

can_get_members.description: True, if members of the chat can be retrieved via getSupergroupMembers or searchChatMembers

has_hidden_members.description: True, if non-administrators can receive only administrators and bots using getSupergroupMembers or searchChatMembers

can_hide_members.description: True, if non-administrators and non-bots can be hidden in responses to getSupergroupMembers and searchChatMembers for non-administrators

can_set_sticker_set.description: True, if the supergroup sticker set can be changed

can_set_location.description: True, if the supergroup location can be changed

can_get_statistics.description: True, if the supergroup or channel statistics are available

can_get_revenue_statistics.description: True, if the supergroup or channel revenue statistics are available

can_get_star_revenue_statistics.description: True, if the supergroup or channel Telegram Star revenue statistics are available

can_send_gift.description: True, if the user can send a gift to the supergroup or channel using sendGift or transferGift

can_toggle_aggressive_anti_spam.description: True, if aggressive anti-spam checks can be enabled or disabled in the supergroup

is_all_history_available.description: True, if new chat members will have access to old messages. In public, discussion, of forum groups and all channels, old messages are always available, so this option affects only private non-forum supergroups without a linked chat. The value of this field is only available to chat administrators

can_have_sponsored_messages.description: True, if the chat can have sponsored messages. The value of this field is only available to the owner of the chat

has_aggressive_anti_spam_enabled.description: True, if aggressive anti-spam checks are enabled in the supergroup. The value of this field is only available to chat administrators

has_paid_media_allowed.description: True, if paid media can be sent and forwarded to the channel chat; for channels only

has_pinned_stories.description: True, if the supergroup or channel has pinned stories

gift_count.description: Number of saved to profile gifts for channels without can_post_messages administrator right, otherwise, the total number of received gifts

my_boost_count.description: Number of times the current user boosted the supergroup or channel

unrestrict_boost_count.description: Number of times the supergroup must be boosted by a user to ignore slow mode and chat permission restrictions; 0 if unspecified

sticker_set_id.description: Identifier of the supergroup sticker set that must be shown before user sticker sets; 0 if none

custom_emoji_sticker_set_id.description: Identifier of the custom emoji sticker set that can be used in the supergroup without Telegram Premium subscription; 0 if none

location.description: Location to which the supergroup is connected; may be null if none

invite_link.description: Primary invite link for the chat; may be null. For chat administrators with can_invite_users right only

bot_commands.description: List of commands of bots in the group

bot_verification.description: Information about verification status of the supergroup or the channel provided by a bot; may be null if none or unknown

upgraded_from_basic_group_id.description: Identifier of the basic group from which supergroup was upgraded; 0 if none

upgraded_from_max_message_id.description: Identifier of the last message in the basic group from which supergroup was upgraded; 0 if none

secretChatStatePending.description: The secret chat is not yet created; waiting for the other user to get online

secretChatStateReady.description: The secret chat is ready to use

is_outbound.description: True, if the chat was created by the current user; false otherwise

key_hash.description: Hash of the currently used key for comparison with the hash of the chat partner's key. This is a string of 36 little-endian bytes, which must be split into groups of 2 bits, each denoting a pixel of one of 4 colors FFFFFF, D5E6F3, 2D5775, and 2F99C9. The pixels must be used to make a 12x12 square image filled from left to right, top to bottom. Alternatively, the first 32 bytes of the hash can be converted to the hexadecimal format and printed as 32 2-digit hex numbers

layer.description: Secret chat layer; determines features supported by the chat partner's application. Nested text entities and underline and strikethrough entities are supported if the layer >= 101, files bigger than 2000MB are supported if the layer >= 143, spoiler and custom emoji text entities are supported if the layer >= 144

messageSenderUser.description: The message was sent by a known user

user_id.description: Identifier of the user that sent the message

messageSenderChat.description: The message was sent on behalf of a chat

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat that sent the message

messageSenders.description: Represents a list of message senders

total_count.description: Approximate total number of messages senders found

chatMessageSender.description: Represents a message sender, which can be used to send messages in a chat

needs_premium.description: True, if Telegram Premium is needed to use the message sender

chatMessageSenders.description: Represents a list of message senders, which can be used to send messages in a chat

messageReadDateRead.description: Contains read date of the message

read_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the message was read by the other user

messageReadDateTooOld.description: The message is too old to get read date

messageReadDateUserPrivacyRestricted.description: The read date is unknown due to privacy settings of the other user

messageReadDateMyPrivacyRestricted.description: The read date is unknown due to privacy settings of the current user, but will be known if the user subscribes to Telegram Premium

messageViewer.description: Represents a viewer of a message

view_date.description: Approximate point in time (Unix timestamp) when the message was viewed

messageViewers.description: Represents a list of message viewers

messageOriginUser.description: The message was originally sent by a known user

sender_user_id.description: Identifier of the user that originally sent the message

messageOriginHiddenUser.description: The message was originally sent by a user, which is hidden by their privacy settings

messageOriginChat.description: The message was originally sent on behalf of a chat

sender_chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat that originally sent the message

author_signature.description: For messages originally sent by an anonymous chat administrator, original message author signature

messageOriginChannel.description: The message was originally a post in a channel

chat_id.description: Identifier of the channel chat to which the message was originally sent

message_id.description: Message identifier of the original message

forwardSource.description: Contains information about the last message from which a new message was forwarded last time

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat to which the message that was forwarded belonged; may be 0 if unknown

message_id.description: Identifier of the message; may be 0 if unknown

sender_id.description: Identifier of the sender of the message; may be null if unknown or the new message was forwarded not to Saved Messages

sender_name.description: Name of the sender of the message if the sender is hidden by their privacy settings

date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the message is sent; 0 if unknown

is_outgoing.description: True, if the message that was forwarded is outgoing; always false if sender is unknown

reactionTypeCustomEmoji.description: A reaction with a custom emoji

custom_emoji_id.description: Unique identifier of the custom emoji

reactionTypePaid.description: The paid reaction in a channel chat

paidReactionTypeRegular.description: A paid reaction on behalf of the current user

paidReactionTypeChat.description: A paid reaction on behalf of an owned chat

paidReactor.description: Contains information about a user that added paid reactions

sender_id.description: Identifier of the user or chat that added the reactions; may be null for anonymous reactors that aren't the current user

star_count.description: Number of Telegram Stars added

is_top.description: True, if the reactor is one of the most active reactors; may be false if the reactor is the current user

is_me.description: True, if the paid reaction was added by the current user

is_anonymous.description: True, if the reactor is anonymous

messageForwardInfo.description: Contains information about a forwarded message

date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the message was originally sent

source.description: For messages forwarded to the chat with the current user (Saved Messages), to the Replies bot chat, or to the channel's discussion group, information about the source message from which the message was forwarded last time; may be null for other forwards or if unknown

public_service_announcement_type.description: The type of public service announcement for the forwarded message

messageImportInfo.description: Contains information about a message created with importMessages

date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the message was originally sent

messageReplyInfo.description: Contains information about replies to a message

reply_count.description: Number of times the message was directly or indirectly replied

recent_replier_ids.description: Identifiers of at most 3 recent repliers to the message; available in channels with a discussion supergroup. The users and chats are expected to be inaccessible: only their photo and name will be available

last_read_inbox_message_id.description: Identifier of the last read incoming reply to the message

last_read_outbox_message_id.description: Identifier of the last read outgoing reply to the message

last_message_id.description: Identifier of the last reply to the message

messageReaction.description: Contains information about a reaction to a message

total_count.description: Number of times the reaction was added

is_chosen.description: True, if the reaction is chosen by the current user

used_sender_id.description: Identifier of the message sender used by the current user to add the reaction; may be null if unknown or the reaction isn't chosen

recent_sender_ids.description: Identifiers of at most 3 recent message senders, added the reaction; available in private, basic group and supergroup chats

messageReactions.description: Contains a list of reactions added to a message

are_tags.description: True, if the reactions are tags and Telegram Premium users can filter messages by them

paid_reactors.description: Information about top users that added the paid reaction

can_get_added_reactions.description: True, if the list of added reactions is available using getMessageAddedReactions

messageInteractionInfo.description: Contains information about interactions with a message

view_count.description: Number of times the message was viewed

forward_count.description: Number of times the message was forwarded

reply_info.description: Information about direct or indirect replies to the message; may be null. Currently, available only in channels with a discussion supergroup and discussion supergroups for messages, which are not replies itself

reactions.description: The list of reactions or tags added to the message; may be null

unreadReaction.description: Contains information about an unread reaction to a message

sender_id.description: Identifier of the sender, added the reaction

is_big.description: True, if the reaction was added with a big animation

messageTopicForum.description: A topic in a forum supergroup chat

forum_topic_id.description: Unique identifier of the forum topic; all messages in a non-forum supergroup chats belongs to the General topic

messageTopicDirectMessages.description: A topic in a channel direct messages chat administered by the current user

messageTopicSavedMessages.description: A topic in Saved Messages chat

saved_messages_topic_id.description: Unique identifier of the Saved Messages topic

messageEffectTypeEmojiReaction.description: An effect from an emoji reaction

select_animation.description: Select animation for the effect in TGS format

effect_animation.description: Effect animation for the effect in TGS format

messageEffectTypePremiumSticker.description: An effect from a premium sticker

sticker.description: The premium sticker. The effect can be found at sticker.full_type.premium_animation

messageEffect.description: Contains information about an effect added to a message

static_icon.description: Static icon for the effect in WEBP format; may be null if none

emoji.description: Emoji corresponding to the effect that can be used if static icon isn't available

is_premium.description: True, if Telegram Premium subscription is required to use the effect

messageSendingStatePending.description: The message is being sent now, but has not yet been delivered to the server

sending_id.description: Non-persistent message sending identifier, specified by the application

messageSendingStateFailed.description: The message failed to be sent

error.description: The cause of the message sending failure

can_retry.description: True, if the message can be re-sent using resendMessages or readdQuickReplyShortcutMessages

need_another_sender.description: True, if the message can be re-sent only on behalf of a different sender

need_another_reply_quote.description: True, if the message can be re-sent only if another quote is chosen in the message that is replied by the given message

need_drop_reply.description: True, if the message can be re-sent only if the message to be replied is removed. This will be done automatically by resendMessages

required_paid_message_star_count.description: The number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to send the message; 0 if the current amount is correct

retry_after.description: Time left before the message can be re-sent, in seconds. No update is sent when this field changes

textQuote.description: Describes manually or automatically chosen quote from another message

text.description: Text of the quote. Only Bold, Italic, Underline, Strikethrough, Spoiler, and CustomEmoji entities can be present in the text

position.description: Approximate quote position in the original message in UTF-16 code units as specified by the message sender

is_manual.description: True, if the quote was manually chosen by the message sender

inputTextQuote.description: Describes manually chosen quote from another message

text.description: Text of the quote; 0-getOption("message_reply_quote_length_max") characters. Only Bold, Italic, Underline, Strikethrough, Spoiler, and CustomEmoji entities are allowed to be kept and must be kept in the quote

position.description: Quote position in the original message in UTF-16 code units

messageReplyToMessage.description: Describes a message replied by a given message

chat_id.description: The identifier of the chat to which the message belongs; may be 0 if the replied message is in unknown chat

message_id.description: The identifier of the message; may be 0 if the replied message is in unknown chat

quote.description: Chosen quote from the replied message; may be null if none

origin.description: Information about origin of the message if the message was from another chat or topic; may be null for messages from the same chat

origin_send_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the message was sent if the message was from another chat or topic; 0 for messages from the same chat

content.description: Media content of the message if the message was from another chat or topic; may be null for messages from the same chat and messages without media. Can be only one of the following types: messageAnimation, messageAudio, messageContact, messageDice, messageDocument, messageGame, messageGiveaway, messageGiveawayWinners, messageInvoice, messageLocation, messagePaidMedia, messagePhoto, messagePoll, messageSticker, messageStory, messageText (for link preview), messageVenue, messageVideo, messageVideoNote, or messageVoiceNote

messageReplyToStory.description: Describes a story replied by a given message

story_poster_chat_id.description: The identifier of the poster of the story

inputMessageReplyToMessage.description: Describes a message to be replied in the same chat and forum topic

message_id.description: The identifier of the message to be replied in the same chat and forum topic. A message can be replied in the same chat and forum topic only if messageProperties.can_be_replied

quote.description: Quote from the message to be replied; pass null if none. Must always be null for replies in secret chats

inputMessageReplyToExternalMessage.description: Describes a message to be replied that is from a different chat or a forum topic; not supported in secret chats

chat_id.description: The identifier of the chat to which the message to be replied belongs

message_id.description: The identifier of the message to be replied in the specified chat. A message can be replied in another chat or forum topic only if messageProperties.can_be_replied_in_another_chat

quote.description: Quote from the message to be replied; pass null if none

inputMessageReplyToStory.description: Describes a story to be replied

story_poster_chat_id.description: The identifier of the poster of the story. Currently, stories can be replied only in the chat that posted the story; channel stories can't be replied

factCheck.description: Describes a fact-check added to the message by an independent checker

country_code.description: A two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the country for which the fact-check is shown

id.description: Message identifier; unique for the chat to which the message belongs

sender_id.description: Identifier of the sender of the message

sending_state.description: The sending state of the message; may be null if the message isn't being sent and didn't fail to be sent

scheduling_state.description: The scheduling state of the message; may be null if the message isn't scheduled

is_outgoing.description: True, if the message is outgoing

is_pinned.description: True, if the message is pinned

is_from_offline.description: True, if the message was sent because of a scheduled action by the message sender, for example, as away, or greeting service message

can_be_saved.description: True, if content of the message can be saved locally

has_timestamped_media.description: True, if media timestamp entities refers to a media in this message as opposed to a media in the replied message

is_channel_post.description: True, if the message is a channel post. All messages to channels are channel posts, all other messages are not channel posts

contains_unread_mention.description: True, if the message contains an unread mention for the current user

date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the message was sent; 0 for scheduled messages

edit_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the message was last edited; 0 for scheduled messages

forward_info.description: Information about the initial message sender; may be null if none or unknown

import_info.description: Information about the initial message for messages created with importMessages; may be null if the message isn't imported

interaction_info.description: Information about interactions with the message; may be null if none

unread_reactions.description: Information about unread reactions added to the message

fact_check.description: Information about fact-check added to the message; may be null if none

reply_to.description: Information about the message or the story this message is replying to; may be null if none

message_thread_id.description: If non-zero, the identifier of the message thread the message belongs to; unique within the chat to which the message belongs

topic_id.description: Identifier of the topic within the chat to which the message belongs; may be null if none

self_destruct_type.description: The message's self-destruct type; may be null if none

self_destruct_in.description: Time left before the message self-destruct timer expires, in seconds; 0 if self-destruction isn't scheduled yet

auto_delete_in.description: Time left before the message will be automatically deleted by message_auto_delete_time setting of the chat, in seconds; 0 if never

via_bot_user_id.description: If non-zero, the user identifier of the inline bot through which this message was sent

sender_business_bot_user_id.description: If non-zero, the user identifier of the business bot that sent this message

sender_boost_count.description: Number of times the sender of the message boosted the supergroup at the time the message was sent; 0 if none or unknown. For messages sent by the current user, supergroupFullInfo.my_boost_count must be used instead

paid_message_star_count.description: The number of Telegram Stars the sender paid to send the message

author_signature.description: For channel posts and anonymous group messages, optional author signature

media_album_id.description: Unique identifier of an album this message belongs to; 0 if none. Only audios, documents, photos and videos can be grouped together in albums

effect_id.description: Unique identifier of the effect added to the message; 0 if none

has_sensitive_content.description: True, if media content of the message must be hidden with 18+ spoiler

restriction_reason.description: If non-empty, contains a human-readable description of the reason why access to this message must be restricted

reply_markup.description: Reply markup for the message; may be null if none

total_count.description: Approximate total number of messages found

messages.description: List of messages; messages may be null

foundMessages.description: Contains a list of messages found by a search

total_count.description: Approximate total number of messages found; -1 if unknown

next_offset.description: The offset for the next request. If empty, then there are no more results

foundChatMessages.description: Contains a list of messages found by a search in a given chat

total_count.description: Approximate total number of messages found; -1 if unknown

next_from_message_id.description: The offset for the next request. If 0, there are no more results

messagePosition.description: Contains information about a message in a specific position

position.description: 0-based message position in the full list of suitable messages

date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the message was sent

messagePositions.description: Contains a list of message positions

total_count.description: Total number of messages found

messageCalendarDay.description: Contains information about found messages sent on a specific day

total_count.description: Total number of found messages sent on the day

message.description: First message sent on the day

messageCalendar.description: Contains information about found messages, split by days according to the option "utc_time_offset"

total_count.description: Total number of found messages

businessMessage.description: Describes a message from a business account as received by a bot

reply_to_message.description: Message that is replied by the message in the same chat; may be null if none

businessMessages.description: Contains a list of messages from a business account as received by a bot

messageSourceChatHistory.description: The message is from a chat history

messageSourceMessageThreadHistory.description: The message is from history of a message thread

messageSourceForumTopicHistory.description: The message is from history of a forum topic

messageSourceDirectMessagesChatTopicHist.description: The message is from history of a topic in a channel direct messages chat administered by the current user

messageSourceHistoryPreview.description: The message is from chat, message thread or forum topic history preview

messageSourceChatList.description: The message is from a chat list or a forum topic list

messageSourceSearch.description: The message is from search results, including file downloads, local file list, outgoing document messages, calendar

messageSourceChatEventLog.description: The message is from a chat event log

messageSourceNotification.description: The message is from a notification

messageSourceScreenshot.description: The message was screenshotted; the source must be used only if the message content was visible during the screenshot

messageSourceOther.description: The message is from some other source

messageSponsor.description: Information about the sponsor of a message

url.description: URL of the sponsor to be opened when the message is clicked

photo.description: Photo of the sponsor; may be null if must not be shown

info.description: Additional optional information about the sponsor to be shown along with the message

message_id.description: Message identifier; unique for the chat to which the sponsored message belongs among both ordinary and sponsored messages

is_recommended.description: True, if the message needs to be labeled as "recommended" instead of "sponsored"

can_be_reported.description: True, if the message can be reported to Telegram moderators through reportChatSponsoredMessage

content.description: Content of the message. Currently, can be only of the types messageText, messageAnimation, messagePhoto, or messageVideo. Video messages can be viewed fullscreen

sponsor.description: Information about the sponsor of the message

button_text.description: Text for the message action button

accent_color_id.description: Identifier of the accent color for title, button text and message background

background_custom_emoji_id.description: Identifier of a custom emoji to be shown on the message background; 0 if none

additional_info.description: If non-empty, additional information about the sponsored message to be shown along with the message

sponsoredMessages.description: Contains a list of sponsored messages

messages_between.description: The minimum number of messages between shown sponsored messages, or 0 if only one sponsored message must be shown after all ordinary messages

sponsor_info.description: Additional optional information about the sponsor to be shown along with the chat

additional_info.description: If non-empty, additional information about the sponsored chat to be shown along with the chat

sponsoredChats.description: Contains a list of sponsored chats

reportOption.description: Describes an option to report an entity to Telegram

reportSponsoredResultFailed.description: The sponsored message is too old or not found

reportSponsoredResultOptionRequired.description: The user must choose an option to report the message and repeat request with the chosen option

reportSponsoredResultAdsHidden.description: Sponsored messages were hidden for the user in all chats

reportSponsoredResultPremiumRequired.description: The user asked to hide sponsored messages, but Telegram Premium is required for this

fileDownload.description: Describes a file added to file download list

add_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the file was added to the download list

complete_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the file downloading was completed; 0 if the file downloading isn't completed

is_paused.description: True, if downloading of the file is paused

downloadedFileCounts.description: Contains number of being downloaded and recently downloaded files found

active_count.description: Number of active file downloads found, including paused

paused_count.description: Number of paused file downloads found

completed_count.description: Number of completed file downloads found

foundFileDownloads.description: Contains a list of downloaded files, found by a search

total_counts.description: Total number of suitable files, ignoring offset

next_offset.description: The offset for the next request. If empty, then there are no more results

notificationSettingsScopePrivateChats.description: Notification settings applied to all private and secret chats when the corresponding chat setting has a default value

notificationSettingsScopeGroupChats.description: Notification settings applied to all basic group and supergroup chats when the corresponding chat setting has a default value

notificationSettingsScopeChannelChats.description: Notification settings applied to all channel chats when the corresponding chat setting has a default value

chatNotificationSettings.description: Contains information about notification settings for a chat or a forum topic

use_default_mute_for.description: If true, the value for the relevant type of chat or the forum chat is used instead of mute_for

mute_for.description: Time left before notifications will be unmuted, in seconds

use_default_sound.description: If true, the value for the relevant type of chat or the forum chat is used instead of sound_id

sound_id.description: Identifier of the notification sound to be played for messages; 0 if sound is disabled

use_default_show_preview.description: If true, the value for the relevant type of chat or the forum chat is used instead of show_preview

show_preview.description: True, if message content must be displayed in notifications

use_default_mute_stories.description: If true, the value for the relevant type of chat is used instead of mute_stories

mute_stories.description: True, if story notifications are disabled for the chat

use_default_story_sound.description: If true, the value for the relevant type of chat is used instead of story_sound_id

story_sound_id.description: Identifier of the notification sound to be played for stories; 0 if sound is disabled

use_default_show_story_poster.description: If true, the value for the relevant type of chat is used instead of show_story_poster

show_story_poster.description: True, if the chat that posted a story must be displayed in notifications

use_default_disable_pinned_message_notif.description: If true, the value for the relevant type of chat or the forum chat is used instead of disable_pinned_message_notifications

disable_pinned_message_notifications.description: If true, notifications for incoming pinned messages will be created as for an ordinary unread message

use_default_disable_mention_notification.description: If true, the value for the relevant type of chat or the forum chat is used instead of disable_mention_notifications

disable_mention_notifications.description: If true, notifications for messages with mentions will be created as for an ordinary unread message

scopeNotificationSettings.description: Contains information about notification settings for several chats

mute_for.description: Time left before notifications will be unmuted, in seconds

sound_id.description: Identifier of the notification sound to be played; 0 if sound is disabled

show_preview.description: True, if message content must be displayed in notifications

use_default_mute_stories.description: If true, story notifications are received only for the first 5 chats from topChatCategoryUsers regardless of the value of mute_stories

mute_stories.description: True, if story notifications are disabled

story_sound_id.description: Identifier of the notification sound to be played for stories; 0 if sound is disabled

show_story_poster.description: True, if the chat that posted a story must be displayed in notifications

disable_pinned_message_notifications.description: True, if notifications for incoming pinned messages will be created as for an ordinary unread message

disable_mention_notifications.description: True, if notifications for messages with mentions will be created as for an ordinary unread message

reactionNotificationSourceContacts.description: Notifications for reactions are shown only for reactions from contacts

reactionNotificationSourceAll.description: Notifications for reactions are shown for all reactions

reactionNotificationSettings.description: Contains information about notification settings for reactions

message_reaction_source.description: Source of message reactions for which notifications are shown

story_reaction_source.description: Source of story reactions for which notifications are shown

sound_id.description: Identifier of the notification sound to be played; 0 if sound is disabled

show_preview.description: True, if reaction sender and emoji must be displayed in notifications

draftMessage.description: Contains information about a message draft

reply_to.description: Information about the message to be replied; must be of the type inputMessageReplyToMessage; may be null if none

date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the draft was created

input_message_text.description: Content of the message draft; must be of the type inputMessageText, inputMessageVideoNote, or inputMessageVoiceNote

effect_id.description: Identifier of the effect to apply to the message when it is sent; 0 if none

chatTypePrivate.description: An ordinary chat with a user

chatTypeBasicGroup.description: A basic group (a chat with 0-200 other users)

chatTypeSupergroup.description: A supergroup or channel (with unlimited members)

is_channel.description: True, if the supergroup is a channel

chatTypeSecret.description: A secret chat with a user

user_id.description: User identifier of the other user in the secret chat

chatFolderIcon.description: Represents an icon for a chat folder

name.description: The chosen icon name for short folder representation; one of "All", "Unread", "Unmuted", "Bots", "Channels", "Groups", "Private", "Custom", "Setup", "Cat", "Crown", "Favorite", "Flower", "Game", "Home", "Love", "Mask", "Party", "Sport", "Study", "Trade", "Travel", "Work", "Airplane", "Book", "Light", "Like", "Money", "Note", "Palette"

chatFolderName.description: Describes name of a chat folder

text.description: The text of the chat folder name; 1-12 characters without line feeds. May contain only CustomEmoji entities

animate_custom_emoji.description: True, if custom emoji in the name must be animated

chatFolder.description: Represents a folder for user chats

icon.description: The chosen icon for the chat folder; may be null. If null, use getChatFolderDefaultIconName to get default icon name for the folder

color_id.description: The identifier of the chosen color for the chat folder icon; from -1 to 6. If -1, then color is disabled. Can't be changed if folder tags are disabled or the current user doesn't have Telegram Premium subscription

is_shareable.description: True, if at least one link has been created for the folder

pinned_chat_ids.description: The chat identifiers of pinned chats in the folder. There can be up to getOption("chat_folder_chosen_chat_count_max") pinned and always included non-secret chats and the same number of secret chats, but the limit can be increased with Telegram Premium

included_chat_ids.description: The chat identifiers of always included chats in the folder. There can be up to getOption("chat_folder_chosen_chat_count_max") pinned and always included non-secret chats and the same number of secret chats, but the limit can be increased with Telegram Premium

excluded_chat_ids.description: The chat identifiers of always excluded chats in the folder. There can be up to getOption("chat_folder_chosen_chat_count_max") always excluded non-secret chats and the same number of secret chats, but the limit can be increased with Telegram Premium

exclude_muted.description: True, if muted chats need to be excluded

exclude_read.description: True, if read chats need to be excluded

exclude_archived.description: True, if archived chats need to be excluded

include_contacts.description: True, if contacts need to be included

include_non_contacts.description: True, if non-contact users need to be included

include_bots.description: True, if bots need to be included

include_groups.description: True, if basic groups and supergroups need to be included

include_channels.description: True, if channels need to be included

chatFolderInfo.description: Contains basic information about a chat folder

icon.description: The chosen or default icon for the chat folder

color_id.description: The identifier of the chosen color for the chat folder icon; from -1 to 6. If -1, then color is disabled

is_shareable.description: True, if at least one link has been created for the folder

has_my_invite_links.description: True, if the chat folder has invite links created by the current user

chatFolderInviteLink.description: Contains a chat folder invite link

invite_link.description: The chat folder invite link

chat_ids.description: Identifiers of chats, included in the link

chatFolderInviteLinks.description: Represents a list of chat folder invite links

chatFolderInviteLinkInfo.description: Contains information about an invite link to a chat folder

chat_folder_info.description: Basic information about the chat folder; chat folder identifier will be 0 if the user didn't have the chat folder yet

missing_chat_ids.description: Identifiers of the chats from the link, which aren't added to the folder yet

added_chat_ids.description: Identifiers of the chats from the link, which are added to the folder already

recommendedChatFolders.description: Contains a list of recommended chat folders

archiveChatListSettings.description: Contains settings for automatic moving of chats to and from the Archive chat lists

archive_and_mute_new_chats_from_unknown_.description: True, if new chats from non-contacts will be automatically archived and muted. Can be set to true only if the option "can_archive_and_mute_new_chats_from_unknown_users" is true

keep_unmuted_chats_archived.description: True, if unmuted chats will be kept in the Archive chat list when they get a new message

keep_chats_from_folders_archived.description: True, if unmuted chats, that are always included or pinned in a folder, will be kept in the Archive chat list when they get a new message. Ignored if keep_unmuted_chats_archived == true

chatListArchive.description: A list of chats usually located at the top of the main chat list. Unmuted chats are automatically moved from the Archive to the Main chat list when a new message arrives

chatListFolder.description: A list of chats added to a chat folder

chatLists.description: Contains a list of chat lists

chatSourceMtprotoProxy.description: The chat is sponsored by the user's MTProxy server

chatSourcePublicServiceAnnouncement.description: The chat contains a public service announcement

chatPosition.description: Describes a position of a chat in a chat list

order.description: A parameter used to determine order of the chat in the chat list. Chats must be sorted by the pair (order, chat.id) in descending order

is_pinned.description: True, if the chat is pinned in the chat list

source.description: Source of the chat in the chat list; may be null

chatAvailableReactionsAll.description: All reactions are available in the chat, excluding the paid reaction and custom reactions in channel chats

max_reaction_count.description: The maximum allowed number of reactions per message; 1-11

chatAvailableReactionsSome.description: Only specific reactions are available in the chat

max_reaction_count.description: The maximum allowed number of reactions per message; 1-11

savedMessagesTag.description: Represents a tag used in Saved Messages or a Saved Messages topic

label.description: Label of the tag; 0-12 characters. Always empty if the tag is returned for a Saved Messages topic

count.description: Number of times the tag was used; may be 0 if the tag has non-empty label

savedMessagesTags.description: Contains a list of tags used in Saved Messages

businessBotManageBar.description: Contains information about a business bot that manages the chat

bot_user_id.description: User identifier of the bot

manage_url.description: URL to be opened to manage the bot

is_bot_paused.description: True, if the bot is paused. Use toggleBusinessConnectedBotChatIsPaused to change the value of the field

can_bot_reply.description: True, if the bot can reply

videoChat.description: Describes a video chat, i.e. a group call bound to a chat

group_call_id.description: Group call identifier of an active video chat; 0 if none. Full information about the video chat can be received through the method getGroupCall

has_participants.description: True, if the video chat has participants

default_participant_id.description: Default group call participant identifier to join the video chat; may be null

chat.description: A chat. (Can be a private chat, basic group, supergroup, or secret chat)

photo.description: Chat photo; may be null

accent_color_id.description: Identifier of the accent color for message sender name, and backgrounds of chat photo, reply header, and link preview

background_custom_emoji_id.description: Identifier of a custom emoji to be shown on the reply header and link preview background for messages sent by the chat; 0 if none

profile_accent_color_id.description: Identifier of the profile accent color for the chat's profile; -1 if none

profile_background_custom_emoji_id.description: Identifier of a custom emoji to be shown on the background of the chat's profile; 0 if none

permissions.description: Actions that non-administrator chat members are allowed to take in the chat

last_message.description: Last message in the chat; may be null if none or unknown

positions.description: Positions of the chat in chat lists

chat_lists.description: Chat lists to which the chat belongs. A chat can have a non-zero position in a chat list even it doesn't belong to the chat list and have no position in a chat list even it belongs to the chat list

message_sender_id.description: Identifier of a user or chat that is selected to send messages in the chat; may be null if the user can't change message sender

block_list.description: Block list to which the chat is added; may be null if none

has_protected_content.description: True, if chat content can't be saved locally, forwarded, or copied

is_translatable.description: True, if translation of all messages in the chat must be suggested to the user

is_marked_as_unread.description: True, if the chat is marked as unread

view_as_topics.description: True, if the chat is a forum supergroup that must be shown in the "View as topics" mode, or Saved Messages chat that must be shown in the "View as chats"

has_scheduled_messages.description: True, if the chat has scheduled messages

can_be_deleted_only_for_self.description: True, if the chat messages can be deleted only for the current user while other users will continue to see the messages

can_be_deleted_for_all_users.description: True, if the chat messages can be deleted for all users

can_be_reported.description: True, if the chat can be reported to Telegram moderators through reportChat or reportChatPhoto

default_disable_notification.description: Default value of the disable_notification parameter, used when a message is sent to the chat

unread_count.description: Number of unread messages in the chat

last_read_inbox_message_id.description: Identifier of the last read incoming message

last_read_outbox_message_id.description: Identifier of the last read outgoing message

unread_mention_count.description: Number of unread messages with a mention/reply in the chat

unread_reaction_count.description: Number of messages with unread reactions in the chat

available_reactions.description: Types of reaction, available in the chat

message_auto_delete_time.description: Current message auto-delete or self-destruct timer setting for the chat, in seconds; 0 if disabled. Self-destruct timer in secret chats starts after the message or its content is viewed. Auto-delete timer in other chats starts from the send date

emoji_status.description: Emoji status to be shown along with chat title; may be null

background.description: Background set for the chat; may be null if none

theme_name.description: If non-empty, name of a theme, set for the chat

action_bar.description: Information about actions which must be possible to do through the chat action bar; may be null if none

business_bot_manage_bar.description: Information about bar for managing a business bot in the chat; may be null if none

video_chat.description: Information about video chat of the chat

pending_join_requests.description: Information about pending join requests; may be null if none

reply_markup_message_id.description: Identifier of the message from which reply markup needs to be used; 0 if there is no default custom reply markup in the chat

draft_message.description: A draft of a message in the chat; may be null if none

client_data.description: Application-specific data associated with the chat. (For example, the chat scroll position or local chat notification settings can be stored here.) Persistent if the message database is used

total_count.description: Approximate total number of chats found

failedToAddMember.description: Contains information about a user that has failed to be added to a chat

premium_would_allow_invite.description: True, if subscription to Telegram Premium would have allowed to add the user to the chat

premium_required_to_send_messages.description: True, if subscription to Telegram Premium is required to send the user chat invite link

failedToAddMembers.description: Represents a list of users that has failed to be added to a chat

failed_to_add_members.description: Information about users that weren't added to the chat

createdBasicGroupChat.description: Contains information about a newly created basic group chat

failed_to_add_members.description: Information about failed to add members

publicChatTypeHasUsername.description: The chat is public, because it has an active username

publicChatTypeIsLocationBased.description: The chat is public, because it is a location-based supergroup

accountInfo.description: Contains basic information about another user that started a chat with the current user

registration_month.description: Month when the user was registered in Telegram; 0-12; may be 0 if unknown

registration_year.description: Year when the user was registered in Telegram; 0-9999; may be 0 if unknown

phone_number_country_code.description: A two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code based on the phone number of the user; may be empty if unknown

last_name_change_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the user changed name last time; 0 if unknown

last_photo_change_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the user changed photo last time; 0 if unknown

chatActionBarReportSpam.description: The chat can be reported as spam using the method reportChat with an empty option_id and message_ids. If the chat is a private chat with a user with an emoji status, then a notice about emoji status usage must be shown

can_unarchive.description: If true, the chat was automatically archived and can be moved back to the main chat list using addChatToList simultaneously with setting chat notification settings to default using setChatNotificationSettings

chatActionBarInviteMembers.description: The chat is a recently created group chat to which new members can be invited

chatActionBarReportAddBlock.description: The chat is a private or secret chat, which can be reported using the method reportChat, or the other user can be blocked using the method setMessageSenderBlockList, or the other user can be added to the contact list using the method addContact. If the chat is a private chat with a user with an emoji status, then a notice about emoji status usage must be shown

can_unarchive.description: If true, the chat was automatically archived and can be moved back to the main chat list using addChatToList simultaneously with setting chat notification settings to default using setChatNotificationSettings

account_info.description: Basic information about the other user in the chat; may be null if unknown

chatActionBarAddContact.description: The chat is a private or secret chat and the other user can be added to the contact list using the method addContact

chatActionBarSharePhoneNumber.description: The chat is a private or secret chat with a mutual contact and the user's phone number can be shared with the other user using the method sharePhoneNumber

chatActionBarJoinRequest.description: The chat is a private chat with an administrator of a chat to which the user sent join request

title.description: Title of the chat to which the join request was sent

is_channel.description: True, if the join request was sent to a channel chat

request_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the join request was sent

keyboardButtonTypeText.description: A simple button, with text that must be sent when the button is pressed

keyboardButtonTypeRequestPhoneNumber.description: A button that sends the user's phone number when pressed; available only in private chats

keyboardButtonTypeRequestLocation.description: A button that sends the user's location when pressed; available only in private chats

keyboardButtonTypeRequestPoll.description: A button that allows the user to create and send a poll when pressed; available only in private chats

force_regular.description: If true, only regular polls must be allowed to create

force_quiz.description: If true, only polls in quiz mode must be allowed to create

keyboardButtonTypeRequestUsers.description: A button that requests users to be shared by the current user; available only in private chats. Use the method shareUsersWithBot to complete the request

restrict_user_is_bot.description: True, if the shared users must or must not be bots
