was_upgraded.description: True, if the gift was upgraded to a unique gift

was_refunded.description: True, if the gift was refunded and isn't available anymore

upgraded_received_gift_id.description: Identifier of the corresponding upgraded gift; may be empty if unknown. Use getReceivedGift to get information about the gift

messageUpgradedGift.description: An upgraded gift was received or sent by the current user, or the current user was notified about a channel gift

sender_id.description: Sender of the gift; may be null for anonymous gifts

received_gift_id.description: Unique identifier of the received gift for the current user; only for the receiver of the gift

is_upgrade.description: True, if the gift was obtained by upgrading of a previously received gift; otherwise, this is a transferred or resold gift

is_saved.description: True, if the gift is displayed on the user's or the channel's profile page; only for the receiver of the gift

can_be_transferred.description: True, if the gift can be transferred to another owner; only for the receiver of the gift

was_transferred.description: True, if the gift was transferred to another owner; only for the receiver of the gift

last_resale_star_count.description: Number of Telegram Stars that were paid by the sender for the gift; 0 if the gift was upgraded or transferred

transfer_star_count.description: Number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to transfer the upgraded gift; only for the receiver of the gift

next_transfer_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the gift can be transferred to another owner; 0 if the gift can be transferred immediately or transfer isn't possible; only for the receiver of the gift

next_resale_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the gift can be resold to another user; 0 if the gift can't be resold; only for the receiver of the gift

export_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the gift can be transferred to the TON blockchain as an NFT; 0 if NFT export isn't possible; only for the receiver of the gift

messageRefundedUpgradedGift.description: A gift which purchase, upgrade or transfer were refunded

is_upgrade.description: True, if the gift was obtained by upgrading of a previously received gift; otherwise, this is a transferred or resold gift

star_count.description: The number of refunded Telegram Stars

messagePaidMessagePriceChanged.description: A price for paid messages was changed in the supergroup chat

paid_message_star_count.description: The new number of Telegram Stars that must be paid by non-administrator users of the supergroup chat for each sent message

messageDirectMessagePriceChanged.description: A price for direct messages was changed in the channel chat

is_enabled.description: True, if direct messages group was enabled for the channel; false otherwise

paid_message_star_count.description: The new number of Telegram Stars that must be paid by non-administrator users of the channel chat for each message sent to the direct messages group; 0 if the direct messages group was disabled or the messages are free

messageContactRegistered.description: A contact has registered with Telegram

messageUsersShared.description: The current user shared users, which were requested by the bot

button_id.description: Identifier of the keyboard button with the request

messageChatShared.description: The current user shared a chat, which was requested by the bot

button_id.description: Identifier of the keyboard button with the request

messageBotWriteAccessAllowed.description: The user allowed the bot to send messages

reason.description: The reason why the bot was allowed to write messages

messageWebAppDataSent.description: Data from a Web App has been sent to a bot

button_text.description: Text of the keyboardButtonTypeWebApp button, which opened the Web App

messageWebAppDataReceived.description: Data from a Web App has been received; for bots only

button_text.description: Text of the keyboardButtonTypeWebApp button, which opened the Web App

messagePassportDataSent.description: Telegram Passport data has been sent to a bot

types.description: List of Telegram Passport element types sent

messagePassportDataReceived.description: Telegram Passport data has been received; for bots only

elements.description: List of received Telegram Passport elements

messageProximityAlertTriggered.description: A user in the chat came within proximity alert range

traveler_id.description: The identifier of a user or chat that triggered the proximity alert

watcher_id.description: The identifier of a user or chat that subscribed for the proximity alert

messageUnsupported.description: A message content that is not supported in the current TDLib version

textEntityTypeMention.description: A mention of a user, a supergroup, or a channel by their username

textEntityTypeHashtag.description: A hashtag text, beginning with "#" and optionally containing a chat username at the end

textEntityTypeCashtag.description: A cashtag text, beginning with "$", consisting of capital English letters (e.g., "$USD"), and optionally containing a chat username at the end

textEntityTypeBankCardNumber.description: A bank card number. The getBankCardInfo method can be used to get information about the bank card

textEntityTypeCode.description: Text that must be formatted as if inside a code HTML tag

textEntityTypePre.description: Text that must be formatted as if inside a pre HTML tag

textEntityTypePreCode.description: Text that must be formatted as if inside pre, and code HTML tags

language.description: Programming language of the code; as defined by the sender

textEntityTypeBlockQuote.description: Text that must be formatted as if inside a blockquote HTML tag; not supported in secret chats

textEntityTypeExpandableBlockQuote.description: Text that must be formatted as if inside a blockquote HTML tag and collapsed by default to 3 lines with the ability to show full text; not supported in secret chats

textEntityTypeTextUrl.description: A text description shown instead of a raw URL

url.description: HTTP or tg:// URL to be opened when the link is clicked

textEntityTypeMentionName.description: A text shows instead of a raw mention of the user (e.g., when the user has no username)

textEntityTypeCustomEmoji.description: A custom emoji. The text behind a custom emoji must be an emoji. Only premium users can use premium custom emoji

custom_emoji_id.description: Unique identifier of the custom emoji

media_timestamp.description: Timestamp from which a video/audio/video note/voice note/story playing must start, in seconds. The media can be in the content or the link preview of the current message, or in the same places in the replied message

inputThumbnail.description: A thumbnail to be sent along with a file; must be in JPEG or WEBP format for stickers, and less than 200 KB in size

thumbnail.description: Thumbnail file to send. Sending thumbnails by file_id is currently not supported

width.description: Thumbnail width, usually shouldn't exceed 320. Use 0 if unknown

height.description: Thumbnail height, usually shouldn't exceed 320. Use 0 if unknown

inputPaidMediaTypePhoto.description: The media is a photo. The photo must be at most 10 MB in size. The photo's width and height must not exceed 10000 in total. Width and height ratio must be at most 20

cover.description: Cover of the video; pass null to skip cover uploading

start_timestamp.description: Timestamp from which the video playing must start, in seconds

duration.description: Duration of the video, in seconds

supports_streaming.description: True, if the video is expected to be streamed

inputPaidMedia.description: Describes a paid media to be sent

media.description: Photo or video to be sent

thumbnail.description: Media thumbnail; pass null to skip thumbnail uploading

added_sticker_file_ids.description: File identifiers of the stickers added to the media, if applicable

messageSchedulingStateSendAtDate.description: The message will be sent at the specified date

send_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the message will be sent. The date must be within 367 days in the future

messageSchedulingStateSendWhenOnline.description: The message will be sent when the other user is online. Applicable to private chats only and when the exact online status of the other user is known

messageSchedulingStateSendWhenVideoProce.description: The message will be sent when the video in the message is converted and optimized; can be used only by the server

send_date.description: Approximate point in time (Unix timestamp) when the message is expected to be sent

messageSelfDestructTypeTimer.description: The message will be self-destructed in the specified time after its content was opened

self_destruct_time.description: The message's self-destruct time, in seconds; must be between 0 and 60 in private chats

messageSelfDestructTypeImmediately.description: The message can be opened only once and will be self-destructed once closed

messageSendOptions.description: Options to be used when a message is sent

direct_messages_chat_topic_id.description: Unique identifier of the topic in a channel direct messages chat administered by the current user; pass 0 if the chat isn't a channel direct messages chat administered by the current user

disable_notification.description: Pass true to disable notification for the message

from_background.description: Pass true if the message is sent from the background

protect_content.description: Pass true if the content of the message must be protected from forwarding and saving; for bots only

allow_paid_broadcast.description: Pass true to allow the message to ignore regular broadcast limits for a small fee; for bots only

paid_message_star_count.description: The number of Telegram Stars the user agreed to pay to send the messages

update_order_of_installed_sticker_sets.description: Pass true if the user explicitly chosen a sticker or a custom emoji from an installed sticker set; applicable only to sendMessage and sendMessageAlbum

scheduling_state.description: Message scheduling state; pass null to send message immediately. Messages sent to a secret chat, to a chat with paid messages, to a channel direct messages chat, live location messages and self-destructing messages can't be scheduled

effect_id.description: Identifier of the effect to apply to the message; pass 0 if none; applicable only to sendMessage and sendMessageAlbum in private chats

sending_id.description: Non-persistent identifier, which will be returned back in messageSendingStatePending object and can be used to match sent messages and corresponding updateNewMessage updates

only_preview.description: Pass true to get a fake message instead of actually sending them

messageCopyOptions.description: Options to be used when a message content is copied without reference to the original sender. Service messages, messages with messageInvoice, messagePaidMedia, messageGiveaway, or messageGiveawayWinners content can't be copied

send_copy.description: True, if content of the message needs to be copied without reference to the original sender. Always true if the message is forwarded to a secret chat or is local. Use messageProperties.can_be_copied and messageProperties.can_be_copied_to_secret_chat to check whether the message is suitable

replace_caption.description: True, if media caption of the message copy needs to be replaced. Ignored if send_copy is false

new_caption.description: New message caption; pass null to copy message without caption. Ignored if replace_caption is false

new_show_caption_above_media.description: True, if new caption must be shown above the media; otherwise, new caption must be shown below the media; not supported in secret chats. Ignored if replace_caption is false

text.description: Formatted text to be sent; 0-getOption("message_text_length_max") characters. Only Bold, Italic, Underline, Strikethrough, Spoiler, CustomEmoji, BlockQuote, ExpandableBlockQuote, Code, Pre, PreCode, TextUrl and MentionName entities are allowed to be specified manually

link_preview_options.description: Options to be used for generation of a link preview; may be null if none; pass null to use default link preview options

clear_draft.description: True, if a chat message draft must be deleted

thumbnail.description: Animation thumbnail; pass null to skip thumbnail uploading

added_sticker_file_ids.description: File identifiers of the stickers added to the animation, if applicable

duration.description: Duration of the animation, in seconds

width.description: Width of the animation; may be replaced by the server

height.description: Height of the animation; may be replaced by the server

caption.description: Animation caption; pass null to use an empty caption; 0-getOption("message_caption_length_max") characters

show_caption_above_media.description: True, if the caption must be shown above the animation; otherwise, the caption must be shown below the animation; not supported in secret chats

has_spoiler.description: True, if the animation preview must be covered by a spoiler animation; not supported in secret chats

album_cover_thumbnail.description: Thumbnail of the cover for the album; pass null to skip thumbnail uploading

duration.description: Duration of the audio, in seconds; may be replaced by the server

title.description: Title of the audio; 0-64 characters; may be replaced by the server

performer.description: Performer of the audio; 0-64 characters, may be replaced by the server

caption.description: Audio caption; pass null to use an empty caption; 0-getOption("message_caption_length_max") characters

thumbnail.description: Document thumbnail; pass null to skip thumbnail uploading

disable_content_type_detection.description: Pass true to disable automatic file type detection and send the document as a file. Always true for files sent to secret chats

caption.description: Document caption; pass null to use an empty caption; 0-getOption("message_caption_length_max") characters

inputMessagePaidMedia.description: A message with paid media; can be used only in channel chats with supergroupFullInfo.has_paid_media_allowed

star_count.description: The number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to see the media; 1-getOption("paid_media_message_star_count_max")

paid_media.description: The content of the paid media

caption.description: Message caption; pass null to use an empty caption; 0-getOption("message_caption_length_max") characters

show_caption_above_media.description: True, if the caption must be shown above the media; otherwise, the caption must be shown below the media; not supported in secret chats

payload.description: Bot-provided data for the paid media; bots only

photo.description: Photo to send. The photo must be at most 10 MB in size. The photo's width and height must not exceed 10000 in total. Width and height ratio must be at most 20

thumbnail.description: Photo thumbnail to be sent; pass null to skip thumbnail uploading. The thumbnail is sent to the other party only in secret chats

added_sticker_file_ids.description: File identifiers of the stickers added to the photo, if applicable

caption.description: Photo caption; pass null to use an empty caption; 0-getOption("message_caption_length_max") characters

show_caption_above_media.description: True, if the caption must be shown above the photo; otherwise, the caption must be shown below the photo; not supported in secret chats

self_destruct_type.description: Photo self-destruct type; pass null if none; private chats only

has_spoiler.description: True, if the photo preview must be covered by a spoiler animation; not supported in secret chats

sticker.description: Sticker to be sent

thumbnail.description: Sticker thumbnail; pass null to skip thumbnail uploading

emoji.description: Emoji used to choose the sticker

video.description: Video to be sent. The video is expected to be re-encoded to MPEG4 format with H.264 codec by the sender

thumbnail.description: Video thumbnail; pass null to skip thumbnail uploading

cover.description: Cover of the video; pass null to skip cover uploading; not supported in secret chats and for self-destructing messages

start_timestamp.description: Timestamp from which the video playing must start, in seconds

added_sticker_file_ids.description: File identifiers of the stickers added to the video, if applicable

duration.description: Duration of the video, in seconds

supports_streaming.description: True, if the video is expected to be streamed

caption.description: Video caption; pass null to use an empty caption; 0-getOption("message_caption_length_max") characters

show_caption_above_media.description: True, if the caption must be shown above the video; otherwise, the caption must be shown below the video; not supported in secret chats

self_destruct_type.description: Video self-destruct type; pass null if none; private chats only

has_spoiler.description: True, if the video preview must be covered by a spoiler animation; not supported in secret chats

video_note.description: Video note to be sent. The video is expected to be encoded to MPEG4 format with H.264 codec and have no data outside of the visible circle

thumbnail.description: Video thumbnail; may be null if empty; pass null to skip thumbnail uploading

duration.description: Duration of the video, in seconds; 0-60

length.description: Video width and height; must be positive and not greater than 640

self_destruct_type.description: Video note self-destruct type; may be null if none; pass null if none; private chats only

voice_note.description: Voice note to be sent. The voice note must be encoded with the Opus codec and stored inside an OGG container with a single audio channel, or be in MP3 or M4A format as regular audio

duration.description: Duration of the voice note, in seconds

waveform.description: Waveform representation of the voice note in 5-bit format

caption.description: Voice note caption; may be null if empty; pass null to use an empty caption; 0-getOption("message_caption_length_max") characters

self_destruct_type.description: Voice note self-destruct type; may be null if none; pass null if none; private chats only

location.description: Location to be sent

live_period.description: Period for which the location can be updated, in seconds; must be between 60 and 86400 for a temporary live location, 0x7FFFFFFF for permanent live location, and 0 otherwise

heading.description: For live locations, a direction in which the location moves, in degrees; 1-360. Pass 0 if unknown

proximity_alert_radius.description: For live locations, a maximum distance to another chat member for proximity alerts, in meters (0-100000). Pass 0 if the notification is disabled. Can't be enabled in channels and Saved Messages

inputMessageVenue.description: A message with information about a venue

inputMessageContact.description: A message containing a user contact

emoji.description: Emoji on which the dice throw animation is based

clear_draft.description: True, if the chat message draft must be deleted

inputMessageGame.description: A message with a game; not supported for channels or secret chats

bot_user_id.description: User identifier of the bot that owns the game

inputMessageInvoice.description: A message with an invoice; can be used only by bots

provider_token.description: Payment provider token; may be empty for payments in Telegram Stars

provider_data.description: JSON-encoded data about the invoice, which will be shared with the payment provider

start_parameter.description: Unique invoice bot deep link parameter for the generation of this invoice. If empty, it would be possible to pay directly from forwards of the invoice message

paid_media.description: The content of paid media attached to the invoice; pass null if none

paid_media_caption.description: Paid media caption; pass null to use an empty caption; 0-getOption("message_caption_length_max") characters

inputMessagePoll.description: A message with a poll. Polls can't be sent to secret chats and channel direct messages chats. Polls can be sent to a private chat only if the chat is a chat with a bot or the Saved Messages chat

question.description: Poll question; 1-255 characters (up to 300 characters for bots). Only custom emoji entities are allowed to be added and only by Premium users

options.description: List of poll answer options, 2-getOption("poll_answer_count_max") strings 1-100 characters each. Only custom emoji entities are allowed to be added and only by Premium users

is_anonymous.description: True, if the poll voters are anonymous. Non-anonymous polls can't be sent or forwarded to channels

open_period.description: Amount of time the poll will be active after creation, in seconds; for bots only

close_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the poll will automatically be closed; for bots only

is_closed.description: True, if the poll needs to be sent already closed; for bots only

inputMessageStory.description: A message with a forwarded story. Stories can't be forwarded to secret chats. A story can be forwarded only if story.can_be_forwarded

story_poster_chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat that posted the story

from_chat_id.description: Identifier for the chat this forwarded message came from

message_id.description: Identifier of the message to forward. A message can be forwarded only if messageProperties.can_be_forwarded

in_game_share.description: Pass true if a game message is being shared from a launched game; applies only to game messages

replace_video_start_timestamp.description: Pass true to replace video start timestamp in the forwarded message

new_video_start_timestamp.description: The new video start timestamp; ignored if replace_video_start_timestamp == false

copy_options.description: Options to be used to copy content of the message without reference to the original sender; pass null to forward the message as usual

messageProperties.description: Contains properties of a message and describes actions that can be done with the message right now

can_be_copied.description: True, if content of the message can be copied using inputMessageForwarded or forwardMessages with copy options

can_be_copied_to_secret_chat.description: True, if content of the message can be copied to a secret chat using inputMessageForwarded or forwardMessages with copy options

can_be_deleted_only_for_self.description: True, if the message can be deleted only for the current user while other users will continue to see it using the method deleteMessages with revoke == false

can_be_deleted_for_all_users.description: True, if the message can be deleted for all users using the method deleteMessages with revoke == true

can_be_edited.description: True, if the message can be edited using the methods editMessageText, editMessageCaption, or editMessageReplyMarkup. For live location and poll messages this fields shows whether editMessageLiveLocation or stopPoll can be used with this message

can_be_forwarded.description: True, if the message can be forwarded using inputMessageForwarded or forwardMessages without copy options

can_be_paid.description: True, if the message can be paid using inputInvoiceMessage

can_be_pinned.description: True, if the message can be pinned or unpinned in the chat using pinChatMessage or unpinChatMessage

can_be_replied.description: True, if the message can be replied in the same chat and forum topic using inputMessageReplyToMessage

can_be_replied_in_another_chat.description: True, if the message can be replied in another chat or forum topic using inputMessageReplyToExternalMessage

can_be_saved.description: True, if content of the message can be saved locally

can_be_shared_in_story.description: True, if the message can be shared in a story using inputStoryAreaTypeMessage

can_edit_media.description: True, if the message can be edited using the method editMessageMedia

can_edit_scheduling_state.description: True, if scheduling state of the message can be edited

can_get_author.description: True, if author of the message sent on behalf of a chat can be received through getMessageAuthor

can_get_embedding_code.description: True, if code for message embedding can be received using getMessageEmbeddingCode

can_get_link.description: True, if a link can be generated for the message using getMessageLink

can_get_media_timestamp_links.description: True, if media timestamp links can be generated for media timestamp entities in the message text, caption or link preview description using getMessageLink

can_get_message_thread.description: True, if information about the message thread is available through getMessageThread and getMessageThreadHistory

can_get_read_date.description: True, if read date of the message can be received through getMessageReadDate

can_get_statistics.description: True, if message statistics are available through getMessageStatistics and message forwards can be received using getMessagePublicForwards

can_get_viewers.description: True, if chat members already viewed the message can be received through getMessageViewers

can_recognize_speech.description: True, if speech can be recognized for the message through recognizeSpeech

can_report_chat.description: True, if the message can be reported using reportChat

can_report_reactions.description: True, if reactions on the message can be reported through reportMessageReactions

can_report_supergroup_spam.description: True, if the message can be reported using reportSupergroupSpam

can_set_fact_check.description: True, if fact check for the message can be changed through setMessageFactCheck

need_show_statistics.description: True, if message statistics must be available from context menu of the message

searchMessagesFilterEmpty.description: Returns all found messages, no filter is applied

searchMessagesFilterPhotoAndVideo.description: Returns only photo and video messages

searchMessagesFilterChatPhoto.description: Returns only messages containing chat photos

searchMessagesFilterVoiceAndVideoNote.description: Returns only voice and video note messages

searchMessagesFilterMention.description: Returns only messages with mentions of the current user, or messages that are replies to their messages

searchMessagesFilterUnreadMention.description: Returns only messages with unread mentions of the current user, or messages that are replies to their messages. When using this filter the results can't be additionally filtered by a query, a message thread or by the sending user

searchMessagesFilterUnreadReaction.description: Returns only messages with unread reactions for the current user. When using this filter the results can't be additionally filtered by a query, a message thread or by the sending user

searchMessagesFilterFailedToSend.description: Returns only failed to send messages. This filter can be used only if the message database is used

searchMessagesChatTypeFilterPrivate.description: Returns only messages in private chats

searchMessagesChatTypeFilterGroup.description: Returns only messages in basic group and supergroup chats

searchMessagesChatTypeFilterChannel.description: Returns only messages in channel chats

chatActionTyping.description: The user is typing a message

chatActionRecordingVideo.description: The user is recording a video

chatActionUploadingVideo.description: The user is uploading a video

chatActionRecordingVoiceNote.description: The user is recording a voice note

chatActionUploadingVoiceNote.description: The user is uploading a voice note

chatActionUploadingPhoto.description: The user is uploading a photo

chatActionUploadingDocument.description: The user is uploading a document

chatActionChoosingSticker.description: The user is picking a sticker to send

chatActionChoosingLocation.description: The user is picking a location or venue to send

chatActionChoosingContact.description: The user is picking a contact to send

chatActionStartPlayingGame.description: The user has started to play a game

chatActionRecordingVideoNote.description: The user is recording a video note

chatActionUploadingVideoNote.description: The user is uploading a video note

chatActionWatchingAnimations.description: The user is watching animations sent by the other party by clicking on an animated emoji

chatActionCancel.description: The user has canceled the previous action

userStatusEmpty.description: The user's status has never been changed

expires.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the user's online status will expire

was_online.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the user was last online

by_my_privacy_settings.description: Exact user's status is hidden because the current user enabled userPrivacySettingShowStatus privacy setting for the user and has no Telegram Premium

userStatusLastWeek.description: The user is offline, but was online last week

by_my_privacy_settings.description: Exact user's status is hidden because the current user enabled userPrivacySettingShowStatus privacy setting for the user and has no Telegram Premium

userStatusLastMonth.description: The user is offline, but was online last month

by_my_privacy_settings.description: Exact user's status is hidden because the current user enabled userPrivacySettingShowStatus privacy setting for the user and has no Telegram Premium

emojiKeyword.description: Represents an emoji with its keyword

emojiKeywords.description: Represents a list of emojis with their keywords

emoji_keywords.description: List of emojis with their keywords

thumbnail.description: Sticker set thumbnail in WEBP, TGS, or WEBM format with width and height 100; may be null. The file can be downloaded only before the thumbnail is changed

thumbnail_outline.description: Sticker set thumbnail's outline; may be null if unknown

is_owned.description: True, if the sticker set is owned by the current user

is_installed.description: True, if the sticker set has been installed by the current user

is_archived.description: True, if the sticker set has been archived. A sticker set can't be installed and archived simultaneously

is_official.description: True, if the sticker set is official

sticker_type.description: Type of the stickers in the set

needs_repainting.description: True, if stickers in the sticker set are custom emoji that must be repainted; for custom emoji sticker sets only

is_allowed_as_chat_emoji_status.description: True, if stickers in the sticker set are custom emoji that can be used as chat emoji status; for custom emoji sticker sets only

is_viewed.description: True for already viewed trending sticker sets

stickers.description: List of stickers in this set

emojis.description: A list of emojis corresponding to the stickers in the same order. The list is only for informational purposes, because a sticker is always sent with a fixed emoji from the corresponding Sticker object

stickerSetInfo.description: Represents short information about a sticker set

thumbnail.description: Sticker set thumbnail in WEBP, TGS, or WEBM format with width and height 100; may be null. The file can be downloaded only before the thumbnail is changed

thumbnail_outline.description: Sticker set thumbnail's outline; may be null if unknown

is_owned.description: True, if the sticker set is owned by the current user

is_installed.description: True, if the sticker set has been installed by the current user

is_archived.description: True, if the sticker set has been archived. A sticker set can't be installed and archived simultaneously

is_official.description: True, if the sticker set is official

sticker_type.description: Type of the stickers in the set

needs_repainting.description: True, if stickers in the sticker set are custom emoji that must be repainted; for custom emoji sticker sets only

is_allowed_as_chat_emoji_status.description: True, if stickers in the sticker set are custom emoji that can be used as chat emoji status; for custom emoji sticker sets only

is_viewed.description: True for already viewed trending sticker sets

size.description: Total number of stickers in the set

covers.description: Up to the first 5 stickers from the set, depending on the context. If the application needs more stickers the full sticker set needs to be requested

stickerSets.description: Represents a list of sticker sets

total_count.description: Approximate total number of sticker sets found

trendingStickerSets.description: Represents a list of trending sticker sets

total_count.description: Approximate total number of trending sticker sets

is_premium.description: True, if the list contains sticker sets with premium stickers

emojiCategorySourceSearch.description: The category contains a list of similar emoji to search for in getStickers and searchStickers for stickers, or getInlineQueryResults with the bot getOption("animation_search_bot_username") for animations

emojis.description: List of emojis to search for

emojiCategorySourcePremium.description: The category contains premium stickers that must be found by getPremiumStickers

icon.description: Custom emoji sticker, which represents icon of the category

source.description: Source of stickers for the emoji category

is_greeting.description: True, if the category must be shown first when choosing a sticker for the start page

emojiCategories.description: Represents a list of emoji categories

emojiCategoryTypeDefault.description: The category must be used by default (e.g., for custom emoji or animation search)

emojiCategoryTypeRegularStickers.description: The category must be used by default for regular sticker selection. It may contain greeting emoji category and premium stickers

emojiCategoryTypeEmojiStatus.description: The category must be used for emoji status selection

emojiCategoryTypeChatPhoto.description: The category must be used for chat photo emoji selection

storyAreaPosition.description: Describes position of a clickable rectangle area on a story media

x_percentage.description: The abscissa of the rectangle's center, as a percentage of the media width

y_percentage.description: The ordinate of the rectangle's center, as a percentage of the media height

location.description: A human-readable description of the location from which the session was created, based on the IP address

inactive_session_ttl_days.description: Number of days of inactivity before sessions will automatically be terminated; 1-366 days

unconfirmedSession.description: Contains information about an unconfirmed session

log_in_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the user has logged in

device_model.description: Model of the device that was used for the session creation, as provided by the application

location.description: A human-readable description of the location from which the session was created, based on the IP address

connectedWebsite.description: Contains information about one website the current user is logged in with Telegram

domain_name.description: The domain name of the website

bot_user_id.description: User identifier of a bot linked with the website

browser.description: The version of a browser used to log in

platform.description: Operating system the browser is running on

log_in_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the user was logged in

last_active_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when obtained authorization was last used

ip_address.description: IP address from which the user was logged in, in human-readable format

location.description: Human-readable description of a country and a region from which the user was logged in, based on the IP address

connectedWebsites.description: Contains a list of websites the current user is logged in with Telegram

reportReasonChildAbuse.description: The chat has child abuse related content

reportReasonUnrelatedLocation.description: The location-based chat is unrelated to its stated location

reportReasonFake.description: The chat represents a fake account

reportReasonIllegalDrugs.description: The chat has illegal drugs related content

reportReasonPersonalDetails.description: The chat contains messages with personal details

reportReasonCustom.description: A custom reason provided by the user

reportChatResultOptionRequired.description: The user must choose an option to report the chat and repeat request with the chosen option

reportChatResultTextRequired.description: The user must add additional text details to the report

option_id.description: Option identifier for the next reportChat request

is_optional.description: True, if the user can skip text adding

reportChatResultMessagesRequired.description: The user must choose messages to report and repeat the reportChat request with the chosen messages

reportStoryResultOptionRequired.description: The user must choose an option to report the story and repeat request with the chosen option

reportStoryResultTextRequired.description: The user must add additional text details to the report

option_id.description: Option identifier for the next reportStory request

is_optional.description: True, if the user can skip text adding

internalLinkTypeActiveSessions.description: The link is a link to the Devices section of the application. Use getActiveSessions to get the list of active sessions and show them to the user

internalLinkTypeAttachmentMenuBot.description: The link is a link to an attachment menu bot to be opened in the specified or a chosen chat. Process given target_chat to open the chat. Then, call searchPublicChat with the given bot username, check that the user is a bot and can be added to attachment menu. Then, use getAttachmentMenuBot to receive information about the bot. If the bot isn't added to attachment menu, then show a disclaimer about Mini Apps being third-party applications, ask the user to accept their Terms of service and confirm adding the bot to side and attachment menu. If the user accept the terms and confirms adding, then use toggleBotIsAddedToAttachmentMenu to add the bot. If the attachment menu bot can't be used in the opened chat, show an error to the user. If the bot is added to attachment menu and can be used in the chat, then use openWebApp with the given URL

url.description: URL to be passed to openWebApp

internalLinkTypeAuthenticationCode.description: The link contains an authentication code. Call checkAuthenticationCode with the code if the current authorization state is authorizationStateWaitCode

internalLinkTypeBackground.description: The link is a link to a background. Call searchBackground with the given background name to process the link. If background is found and the user wants to apply it, then call setDefaultBackground

internalLinkTypeBotAddToChannel.description: The link is a link to a Telegram bot, which is expected to be added to a channel chat as an administrator. Call searchPublicChat with the given bot username and check that the user is a bot, ask the current user to select a channel chat to add the bot to as an administrator. Then, call getChatMember to receive the current bot rights in the chat and if the bot already is an administrator, check that the current user can edit its administrator rights and combine received rights with the requested administrator rights. Then, show confirmation box to the user, and call setChatMemberStatus with the chosen chat and confirmed rights

administrator_rights.description: Expected administrator rights for the bot

internalLinkTypeBotStart.description: The link is a link to a chat with a Telegram bot. Call searchPublicChat with the given bot username, check that the user is a bot, show START button in the chat with the bot, and then call sendBotStartMessage with the given start parameter after the button is pressed

start_parameter.description: The parameter to be passed to sendBotStartMessage

autostart.description: True, if sendBotStartMessage must be called automatically without showing the START button

internalLinkTypeBotStartInGroup.description: The link is a link to a Telegram bot, which is expected to be added to a group chat. Call searchPublicChat with the given bot username, check that the user is a bot and can be added to groups, ask the current user to select a basic group or a supergroup chat to add the bot to, taking into account that bots can be added to a public supergroup only by administrators of the supergroup. If administrator rights are provided by the link, call getChatMember to receive the current bot rights in the chat and if the bot already is an administrator, check that the current user can edit its administrator rights, combine received rights with the requested administrator rights, show confirmation box to the user, and call setChatMemberStatus with the chosen chat and confirmed administrator rights. Before call to setChatMemberStatus it may be required to upgrade the chosen basic group chat to a supergroup chat. Then, if start_parameter isn't empty, call sendBotStartMessage with the given start parameter and the chosen chat; otherwise, just send /start message with bot's username added to the chat

start_parameter.description: The parameter to be passed to sendBotStartMessage

administrator_rights.description: Expected administrator rights for the bot; may be null

internalLinkTypeBusinessChat.description: The link is a link to a business chat. Use getBusinessChatLinkInfo with the provided link name to get information about the link, then open received private chat and replace chat draft with the provided text

internalLinkTypeBuyStars.description: The link is a link to the Telegram Star purchase section of the application

star_count.description: The number of Telegram Stars that must be owned by the user

purpose.description: Purpose of Telegram Star purchase. Arbitrary string specified by the server, for example, "subs" if the Telegram Stars are required to extend channel subscriptions

internalLinkTypeChangePhoneNumber.description: The link is a link to the change phone number section of the application

internalLinkTypeChatAffiliateProgram.description: The link is an affiliate program link. Call searchChatAffiliateProgram with the given username and referrer to process the link

username.description: Username to be passed to searchChatAffiliateProgram

referrer.description: Referrer to be passed to searchChatAffiliateProgram

internalLinkTypeChatBoost.description: The link is a link to boost a Telegram chat. Call getChatBoostLinkInfo with the given URL to process the link. If the chat is found, then call getChatBoostStatus and getAvailableChatBoostSlots to get the current boost status and check whether the chat can be boosted. If the user wants to boost the chat and the chat can be boosted, then call boostChat

url.description: URL to be passed to getChatBoostLinkInfo

internalLinkTypeChatFolderInvite.description: The link is an invite link to a chat folder. Call checkChatFolderInviteLink with the given invite link to process the link. If the link is valid and the user wants to join the chat folder, then call addChatFolderByInviteLink

invite_link.description: Internal representation of the invite link

internalLinkTypeChatFolderSettings.description: The link is a link to the folder section of the application settings

internalLinkTypeChatInvite.description: The link is a chat invite link. Call checkChatInviteLink with the given invite link to process the link. If the link is valid and the user wants to join the chat, then call joinChatByInviteLink

invite_link.description: Internal representation of the invite link

internalLinkTypeDefaultMessageAutoDelete.description: The link is a link to the default message auto-delete timer settings section of the application settings

internalLinkTypeEditProfileSettings.description: The link is a link to the edit profile section of the application settings

internalLinkTypeGame.description: The link is a link to a game. Call searchPublicChat with the given bot username, check that the user is a bot, ask the current user to select a chat to send the game, and then call sendMessage with inputMessageGame

bot_username.description: Username of the bot that owns the game

internalLinkTypeGroupCall.description: The link is a link to a group call that isn't bound to a chat. Use getGroupCallParticipants to get the list of group call participants and show them on the join group call screen. Call joinGroupCall with the given invite_link to join the call

invite_link.description: Internal representation of the invite link

internalLinkTypeInstantView.description: The link must be opened in an Instant View. Call getWebPageInstantView with the given URL to process the link. If Instant View is found, then show it, otherwise, open the fallback URL in an external browser

url.description: URL to be passed to getWebPageInstantView

fallback_url.description: An URL to open if getWebPageInstantView fails

internalLinkTypeInvoice.description: The link is a link to an invoice. Call getPaymentForm with the given invoice name to process the link

internalLinkTypeLanguagePack.description: The link is a link to a language pack. Call getLanguagePackInfo with the given language pack identifier to process the link. If the language pack is found and the user wants to apply it, then call setOption for the option "language_pack_id"

internalLinkTypeLanguageSettings.description: The link is a link to the language section of the application settings

internalLinkTypeMainWebApp.description: The link is a link to the main Web App of a bot. Call searchPublicChat with the given bot username, check that the user is a bot and has the main Web App. If the bot can be added to attachment menu, then use getAttachmentMenuBot to receive information about the bot, then if the bot isn't added to side menu, show a disclaimer about Mini Apps being third-party applications, ask the user to accept their Terms of service and confirm adding the bot to side and attachment menu, then if the user accepts the terms and confirms adding, use toggleBotIsAddedToAttachmentMenu to add the bot. Then, use getMainWebApp with the given start parameter and mode and open the returned URL as a Web App

start_parameter.description: Start parameter to be passed to getMainWebApp

mode.description: The mode to be passed to getMainWebApp

internalLinkTypeMessage.description: The link is a link to a Telegram message or a forum topic. Call getMessageLinkInfo with the given URL to process the link, and then open received forum topic or chat and show the message there

url.description: URL to be passed to getMessageLinkInfo

internalLinkTypeMessageDraft.description: The link contains a message draft text. A share screen needs to be shown to the user, then the chosen chat must be opened and the text is added to the input field

contains_link.description: True, if the first line of the text contains a link. If true, the input field needs to be focused and the text after the link must be selected

internalLinkTypeMyStars.description: The link is a link to the screen with information about Telegram Star balance and transactions of the current user

internalLinkTypePassportDataRequest.description: The link contains a request of Telegram passport data. Call getPassportAuthorizationForm with the given parameters to process the link if the link was received from outside of the application; otherwise, ignore it

bot_user_id.description: User identifier of the service's bot; the corresponding user may be unknown yet

scope.description: Telegram Passport element types requested by the service

nonce.description: Unique request identifier provided by the service

callback_url.description: An HTTP URL to open once the request is finished, canceled, or failed with the parameters tg_passport=success, tg_passport=cancel, or tg_passport=error&error=... respectively. If empty, then onActivityResult method must be used to return response on Android, or the link tgbot{bot_user_id}://passport/success or tgbot{bot_user_id}://passport/cancel must be opened otherwise

internalLinkTypePhoneNumberConfirmation.description: The link can be used to confirm ownership of a phone number to prevent account deletion. Call sendPhoneNumberCode with the given phone number and with phoneNumberCodeTypeConfirmOwnership with the given hash to process the link. If succeeded, call checkPhoneNumberCode to check entered by the user code, or resendPhoneNumberCode to resend it

phone_number.description: Phone number value from the link

internalLinkTypePremiumFeatures.description: The link is a link to the Premium features screen of the application from which the user can subscribe to Telegram Premium. Call getPremiumFeatures with the given referrer to process the link

internalLinkTypePremiumGift.description: The link is a link to the screen for gifting Telegram Premium subscriptions to friends via inputInvoiceTelegram with telegramPaymentPurposePremiumGift payments or in-store purchases

internalLinkTypePremiumGiftCode.description: The link is a link with a Telegram Premium gift code. Call checkPremiumGiftCode with the given code to process the link. If the code is valid and the user wants to apply it, then call applyPremiumGiftCode

internalLinkTypePrivacyAndSecuritySettin.description: The link is a link to the privacy and security section of the application settings

internalLinkTypeProxy.description: The link is a link to a proxy. Call addProxy with the given parameters to process the link and add the proxy

server.description: Proxy server domain or IP address

internalLinkTypePublicChat.description: The link is a link to a chat by its username. Call searchPublicChat with the given chat username to process the link. If the chat is found, open its profile information screen or the chat itself. If draft text isn't empty and the chat is a private chat with a regular user, then put the draft text in the input field

draft_text.description: Draft text for message to send in the chat

open_profile.description: True, if chat profile information screen must be opened; otherwise, the chat itself must be opened

internalLinkTypeQrCodeAuthentication.description: The link can be used to login the current user on another device, but it must be scanned from QR-code using in-app camera. An alert similar to "This code can be used to allow someone to log in to your Telegram account. To confirm Telegram login, please go to Settings > Devices > Scan QR and scan the code" needs to be shown

internalLinkTypeRestorePurchases.description: The link forces restore of App Store purchases when opened. For official iOS application only

internalLinkTypeSettings.description: The link is a link to application settings

internalLinkTypeStickerSet.description: The link is a link to a sticker set. Call searchStickerSet with the given sticker set name to process the link and show the sticker set. If the sticker set is found and the user wants to add it, then call changeStickerSet

expect_custom_emoji.description: True, if the sticker set is expected to contain custom emoji

internalLinkTypeStory.description: The link is a link to a story. Call searchPublicChat with the given poster username, then call getStory with the received chat identifier and the given story identifier, then show the story if received

story_poster_username.description: Username of the poster of the story

internalLinkTypeTheme.description: The link is a link to a cloud theme. TDLib has no theme support yet

internalLinkTypeThemeSettings.description: The link is a link to the theme section of the application settings

internalLinkTypeUnknownDeepLink.description: The link is an unknown tg: link. Call getDeepLinkInfo to process the link

link.description: Link to be passed to getDeepLinkInfo

internalLinkTypeUnsupportedProxy.description: The link is a link to an unsupported proxy. An alert can be shown to the user

internalLinkTypeUpgradedGift.description: The link is a link to an upgraded gift. Call getUpgradedGift with the given name to process the link

internalLinkTypeUserPhoneNumber.description: The link is a link to a user by its phone number. Call searchUserByPhoneNumber with the given phone number to process the link. If the user is found, then call createPrivateChat and open user's profile information screen or the chat itself. If draft text isn't empty, then put the draft text in the input field

draft_text.description: Draft text for message to send in the chat

open_profile.description: True, if user's profile information screen must be opened; otherwise, the chat itself must be opened

internalLinkTypeUserToken.description: The link is a link to a user by a temporary token. Call searchUserByToken with the given token to process the link. If the user is found, then call createPrivateChat and open the chat

internalLinkTypeVideoChat.description: The link is a link to a video chat. Call searchPublicChat with the given chat username, and then joinVideoChat with the given invite hash to process the link

chat_username.description: Username of the chat with the video chat

invite_hash.description: If non-empty, invite hash to be used to join the video chat without being muted by administrators

is_live_stream.description: True, if the video chat is expected to be a live stream in a channel or a broadcast group

internalLinkTypeWebApp.description: The link is a link to a Web App. Call searchPublicChat with the given bot username, check that the user is a bot. If the bot is restricted for the current user, then show an error message. Otherwise, call searchWebApp with the received bot and the given web_app_short_name. Process received foundWebApp by showing a confirmation dialog if needed. If the bot can be added to attachment or side menu, but isn't added yet, then show a disclaimer about Mini Apps being third-party applications instead of the dialog and ask the user to accept their Terms of service. If the user accept the terms and confirms adding, then use toggleBotIsAddedToAttachmentMenu to add the bot. Then, call getWebAppLinkUrl and open the returned URL as a Web App

bot_username.description: Username of the bot that owns the Web App

web_app_short_name.description: Short name of the Web App

start_parameter.description: Start parameter to be passed to getWebAppLinkUrl

mode.description: The mode in which the Web App must be opened

messageLink.description: Contains an HTTPS link to a message in a supergroup or channel, or a forum topic

is_public.description: True, if the link will work for non-members of the chat

messageLinkInfo.description: Contains information about a link to a message or a forum topic in a chat

is_public.description: True, if the link is a public link for a message or a forum topic in a chat

chat_id.description: If found, identifier of the chat to which the link points, 0 otherwise

message_thread_id.description: If found, identifier of the message thread in which to open the message, or a forum topic to open if the message is missing

message.description: If found, the linked message; may be null

media_timestamp.description: Timestamp from which the video/audio/video note/voice note/story playing must start, in seconds; 0 if not specified. The media can be in the message content or in its link preview

for_album.description: True, if the whole media album to which the message belongs is linked

chatBoostLink.description: Contains an HTTPS link to boost a chat

is_public.description: True, if the link will work for non-members of the chat

chatBoostLinkInfo.description: Contains information about a link to boost a chat

is_public.description: True, if the link will work for non-members of the chat

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat to which the link points; 0 if the chat isn't found

blockListMain.description: The main block list that disallows writing messages to the current user, receiving their status and photo, viewing of stories, and some other actions

blockListStories.description: The block list that disallows viewing of stories of the current user

fileTypeNone.description: The data is not a file

fileTypeAudio.description: The file is an audio file

fileTypeNotificationSound.description: The file is a notification sound

fileTypePhotoStory.description: The file is a photo published as a story

fileTypeProfilePhoto.description: The file is a profile photo

fileTypeSecret.description: The file was sent to a secret chat (the file type is not known to the server)

fileTypeSecretThumbnail.description: The file is a thumbnail of a file from a secret chat

fileTypeSecure.description: The file is a file from Secure storage used for storing Telegram Passport files

fileTypeSelfDestructingPhoto.description: The file is a self-destructing photo in a private chat

fileTypeSelfDestructingVideo.description: The file is a self-destructing video in a private chat

fileTypeSelfDestructingVideoNote.description: The file is a self-destructing video note in a private chat

fileTypeSelfDestructingVoiceNote.description: The file is a self-destructing voice note in a private chat

fileTypeThumbnail.description: The file is a thumbnail of another file

fileTypeUnknown.description: The file type is not yet known

fileTypeVideoNote.description: The file is a video note

fileTypeVideoStory.description: The file is a video published as a story

fileTypeVoiceNote.description: The file is a voice note

fileTypeWallpaper.description: The file is a wallpaper or a background pattern

storageStatisticsByFileType.description: Contains the storage usage statistics for a specific file type

size.description: Total size of the files, in bytes

storageStatisticsByChat.description: Contains the storage usage statistics for a specific chat

size.description: Total size of the files in the chat, in bytes

count.description: Total number of files in the chat

storageStatistics.description: Contains the exact storage usage statistics split by chats and file type

size.description: Total size of files, in bytes

storageStatisticsFast.description: Contains approximate storage usage statistics, excluding files of unknown file type

files_size.description: Approximate total size of files, in bytes

language_pack_database_size.description: Size of the language pack database

log_size.description: Size of the TDLib internal log

statistics.description: Database statistics in an unspecified human-readable format

networkTypeOther.description: A different network type (e.g., Ethernet network)

networkStatisticsEntryFile.description: Contains information about the total amount of data that was used to send and receive files

file_type.description: Type of the file the data is part of; pass null if the data isn't related to files

network_type.description: Type of the network the data was sent through. Call setNetworkType to maintain the actual network type

networkStatisticsEntryCall.description: Contains information about the total amount of data that was used for calls

network_type.description: Type of the network the data was sent through. Call setNetworkType to maintain the actual network type

duration.description: Total call duration, in seconds

networkStatistics.description: A full list of available network statistic entries

since_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) from which the statistics are collected

is_auto_download_enabled.description: True, if the auto-download is enabled

max_photo_file_size.description: The maximum size of a photo file to be auto-downloaded, in bytes

max_video_file_size.description: The maximum size of a video file to be auto-downloaded, in bytes

max_other_file_size.description: The maximum size of other file types to be auto-downloaded, in bytes

video_upload_bitrate.description: The maximum suggested bitrate for uploaded videos, in kbit/s

preload_large_videos.description: True, if the beginning of video files needs to be preloaded for instant playback

preload_next_audio.description: True, if the next audio track needs to be preloaded while the user is listening to an audio file

preload_stories.description: True, if stories needs to be preloaded

use_less_data_for_calls.description: True, if "use less data for calls" option needs to be enabled

autoDownloadSettingsPresets.description: Contains auto-download settings presets for the current user

low.description: Preset with lowest settings; expected to be used by default when roaming

medium.description: Preset with medium settings; expected to be used by default when using mobile data

high.description: Preset with highest settings; expected to be used by default when connected on Wi-Fi

autosaveSettingsScopePrivateChats.description: Autosave settings applied to all private chats without chat-specific settings

autosaveSettingsScopeGroupChats.description: Autosave settings applied to all basic group and supergroup chats without chat-specific settings

autosaveSettingsScopeChannelChats.description: Autosave settings applied to all channel chats without chat-specific settings

autosaveSettingsScopeChat.description: Autosave settings applied to a chat

scopeAutosaveSettings.description: Contains autosave settings for an autosave settings scope

autosave_photos.description: True, if photo autosave is enabled

autosave_videos.description: True, if video autosave is enabled

max_video_file_size.description: The maximum size of a video file to be autosaved, in bytes; 512 KB - 4000 MB

autosaveSettingsException.description: Contains autosave settings for a chat, which overrides default settings for the corresponding scope

private_chat_settings.description: Default autosave settings for private chats

group_settings.description: Default autosave settings for basic group and supergroup chats

channel_settings.description: Default autosave settings for channel chats

connectionStateWaitingForNetwork.description: Waiting for the network to become available. Use setNetworkType to change the available network type

connectionStateConnectingToProxy.description: Establishing a connection with a proxy server

connectionStateConnecting.description: Establishing a connection to the Telegram servers

connectionStateUpdating.description: Downloading data expected to be received while the application was offline

connectionStateReady.description: There is a working connection to the Telegram servers

topChatCategoryUsers.description: A category containing frequently used private chats with non-bot users

topChatCategoryBots.description: A category containing frequently used private chats with bot users

topChatCategoryGroups.description: A category containing frequently used basic groups and supergroups

topChatCategoryChannels.description: A category containing frequently used channels

topChatCategoryInlineBots.description: A category containing frequently used chats with inline bots sorted by their usage in inline mode

topChatCategoryWebAppBots.description: A category containing frequently used chats with bots, which Web Apps were opened

topChatCategoryCalls.description: A category containing frequently used chats used for calls

topChatCategoryForwardChats.description: A category containing frequently used chats used to forward messages

total_count.description: Total number of matched objects

positions.description: The positions of the matched objects

tMeUrlTypeUser.description: A URL linking to a user

tMeUrlTypeSupergroup.description: A URL linking to a public supergroup or channel

supergroup_id.description: Identifier of the supergroup or channel

info.description: Information about the chat invite link

tMeUrlTypeStickerSet.description: A URL linking to a sticker set

tMeUrl.description: Represents a URL linking to an internal Telegram entity

url.description: URL

tMeUrls.description: Contains a list of t.me URLs

suggestedActionEnableArchiveAndMuteNewCh.description: Suggests the user to enable archive_and_mute_new_chats_from_unknown_users setting in archiveChatListSettings

suggestedActionCheckPassword.description: Suggests the user to check whether they still remember their 2-step verification password

suggestedActionCheckPhoneNumber.description: Suggests the user to check whether authorization phone number is correct and change the phone number if it is inaccessible

suggestedActionViewChecksHint.description: Suggests the user to view a hint about the meaning of one and two check marks on sent messages

suggestedActionConvertToBroadcastGroup.description: Suggests the user to convert specified supergroup to a broadcast group

suggestedActionSetPassword.description: Suggests the user to set a 2-step verification password to be able to log in again

authorization_delay.description: The number of days to pass between consecutive authorizations if the user declines to set password; if 0, then the user is advised to set the password for security reasons

suggestedActionUpgradePremium.description: Suggests the user to upgrade the Premium subscription from monthly payments to annual payments

suggestedActionRestorePremium.description: Suggests the user to restore a recently expired Premium subscription

suggestedActionSubscribeToAnnualPremium.description: Suggests the user to subscribe to the Premium subscription with annual payments

suggestedActionGiftPremiumForChristmas.description: Suggests the user to gift Telegram Premium to friends for Christmas

suggestedActionSetBirthdate.description: Suggests the user to set birthdate

suggestedActionSetProfilePhoto.description: Suggests the user to set profile photo

suggestedActionExtendPremium.description: Suggests the user to extend their expiring Telegram Premium subscription

manage_premium_subscription_url.description: A URL for managing Telegram Premium subscription

suggestedActionExtendStarSubscriptions.description: Suggests the user to extend their expiring Telegram Star subscriptions. Call getStarSubscriptions with only_expiring == true to get the number of expiring subscriptions and the number of required to buy Telegram Stars

suggestedActionCustom.description: A custom suggestion to be shown at the top of the chat list

url.description: The link to open when the suggestion is clicked

seconds.description: Contains a value representing a number of seconds

fileDownloadedPrefixSize.description: Contains size of downloaded prefix of a file

starCount.description: Contains a number of Telegram Stars

star_count.description: Number of Telegram Stars

deepLinkInfo.description: Contains information about a tg: deep link

text.description: Text to be shown to the user

need_update_application.description: True, if the user must be asked to update the application

version.description: Version of the parser: 0 or 1 - Telegram Bot API "Markdown" parse mode, 2 - Telegram Bot API "MarkdownV2" parse mode

textParseModeHTML.description: The text uses HTML-style formatting. The same as Telegram Bot API "HTML" parse mode

username.description: Username for logging in; may be empty

password.description: Password for logging in; may be empty

username.description: Username for logging in; may be empty

password.description: Password for logging in; may be empty

http_only.description: Pass true if the proxy supports only HTTP requests and doesn't support transparent TCP connections via HTTP CONNECT method

secret.description: The proxy's secret in hexadecimal encoding

proxy.description: Contains information about a proxy server

server.description: Proxy server domain or IP address

last_used_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the proxy was last used; 0 if never

is_enabled.description: True, if the proxy is enabled now

proxies.description: Represents a list of proxy servers

inputSticker.description: A sticker to be added to a sticker set

sticker.description: File with the sticker; must fit in a 512x512 square. For WEBP stickers the file must be in WEBP or PNG format, which will be converted to WEBP server-side. See https://core.telegram.org/animated_stickers#technical-requirements for technical requirements

emojis.description: String with 1-20 emoji corresponding to the sticker

mask_position.description: Position where the mask is placed; pass null if not specified

keywords.description: List of up to 20 keywords with total length up to 64 characters, which can be used to find the sticker

start_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) at which the date range begins

end_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) at which the date range ends

statisticalValue.description: A value with information about its recent changes

previous_value.description: The value for the previous day

growth_rate_percentage.description: The growth rate of the value, as a percentage

zoom_token.description: If non-empty, a token which can be used to receive a zoomed in graph

statisticalGraphAsync.description: The graph data to be asynchronously loaded through getStatisticalGraph

token.description: The token to use for data loading

statisticalGraphError.description: An error message to be shown to the user instead of the graph

chatStatisticsObjectTypeMessage.description: Describes a message sent in the chat

chatStatisticsObjectTypeStory.description: Describes a story posted on behalf of the chat

chatStatisticsInteractionInfo.description: Contains statistics about interactions with a message sent in the chat or a story posted on behalf of the chat

view_count.description: Number of times the object was viewed

forward_count.description: Number of times the object was forwarded

reaction_count.description: Number of times reactions were added to the object

phoneNumberCodeTypeConfirmOwnership.description: Confirms ownership of a phone number to prevent account deletion while handling links of the type internalLinkTypePhoneNumberConfirmation

logStreamDefault.description: The log is written to stderr or an OS specific log

userSupportInfo.description: Contains custom information about the user

date.description: Information change date

testInt.description: A simple object containing a number; for testing only

testBytes.description: A simple object containing a sequence of bytes; for testing only

testVectorStringObject.description: A simple object containing a vector of objects that hold a string; for testing only

updateAuthorizationState.description: The user authorization state has changed

updateNewMessage.description: A new message was received; can also be an outgoing message

updateMessageSendAcknowledged.description: A request to send a message has reached the Telegram server. This doesn't mean that the message will be sent successfully. This update is sent only if the option "use_quick_ack" is set to true. This update may be sent multiple times for the same message

chat_id.description: The chat identifier of the sent message

updateMessageSendSucceeded.description: A message has been successfully sent

message.description: The sent message. Almost any field of the new message can be different from the corresponding field of the original message. For example, the field scheduling_state may change, making the message scheduled, or non-scheduled

updateMessageSendFailed.description: A message failed to send. Be aware that some messages being sent can be irrecoverably deleted, in which case updateDeleteMessages will be received instead of this update

error.description: The cause of the message sending failure

updateMessageEdited.description: A message was edited. Changes in the message content will come in a separate updateMessageContent

edit_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the message was edited

reply_markup.description: New message reply markup; may be null

updateMessageIsPinned.description: The message pinned state was changed

is_pinned.description: True, if the message is pinned

updateMessageInteractionInfo.description: The information about interactions with a message has changed

interaction_info.description: New information about interactions with the message; may be null

updateMessageContentOpened.description: The message content was opened. Updates voice note messages to "listened", video note messages to "viewed" and starts the self-destruct timer

updateMessageMentionRead.description: A message with an unread mention was read

unread_mention_count.description: The new number of unread mention messages left in the chat

updateMessageUnreadReactions.description: The list of unread reactions added to a message was changed

unread_reaction_count.description: The new number of messages with unread reactions left in the chat

updateMessageFactCheck.description: A fact-check added to a message was changed

updateMessageLiveLocationViewed.description: A message with a live location was viewed. When the update is received, the application is expected to update the live location

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat with the live location message

message_id.description: Identifier of the message with live location

updateVideoPublished.description: An automatically scheduled message with video has been successfully sent after conversion

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat with the message

updateNewChat.description: A new chat has been loaded/created. This update is guaranteed to come before the chat identifier is returned to the application. The chat field changes will be reported through separate updates

updateChatTitle.description: The title of a chat was changed

photo.description: The new chat photo; may be null

accent_color_id.description: The new chat accent color identifier

background_custom_emoji_id.description: The new identifier of a custom emoji to be shown on the reply header and link preview background; 0 if none

updateChatAvailableReactions.description: The chat available reactions were changed

positions.description: The new chat positions in the chat lists

emoji_status.description: The new chat emoji status; may be null

updateScopeNotificationSettings.description: Notification settings for some type of chats were updated

updateNotificationGroup.description: A list of active notifications in a notification group has changed

chat_id.description: Identifier of a chat to which all notifications in the group belong

notification_sound_id.description: Identifier of the notification sound to be played; 0 if sound is disabled

removed_notification_ids.description: Identifiers of removed group notifications, sorted by notification identifier

updateHavePendingNotifications.description: Describes whether there are some pending notification updates. Can be used to prevent application from killing, while there are some pending notifications

have_delayed_notifications.description: True, if there are some delayed notification updates, which will be sent soon

have_unreceived_notifications.description: True, if there can be some yet unreceived notifications, which are being fetched from the server

is_permanent.description: True, if the messages are permanently deleted by a user (as opposed to just becoming inaccessible)

from_cache.description: True, if the messages are deleted only from the cache and can possibly be retrieved again in the future

updateChatAction.description: A message sender activity in the chat has changed

updateUserStatus.description: The user went online or offline

updateBasicGroup.description: Some data of a basic group has changed. This update is guaranteed to come before the basic group identifier is returned to the application

updateSupergroup.description: Some data of a supergroup or a channel has changed. This update is guaranteed to come before the supergroup identifier is returned to the application

updateSecretChat.description: Some data of a secret chat has changed. This update is guaranteed to come before the secret chat identifier is returned to the application

supergroup_id.description: Identifier of the supergroup or channel
