live_period.description: New time relative to the message send date, for which the location can be updated, in seconds. If 0x7FFFFFFF specified, then the location can be updated forever. Otherwise, must not exceed the current live_period by more than a day, and the live location expiration date must remain in the next 90 days. Pass 0 to keep the current live_period

heading.description: The new direction in which the location moves, in degrees; 1-360. Pass 0 if unknown

proximity_alert_radius.description: The new maximum distance for proximity alerts, in meters (0-100000). Pass 0 if the notification is disabled

editMessageMedia.description: Edits the media content of a message, including message caption. If only the caption needs to be edited, use editMessageCaption instead. The type of message content in an album can't be changed with exception of replacing a photo with a video or vice versa. Returns the edited message after the edit is completed on the server side

chat_id.description: The chat the message belongs to

message_id.description: Identifier of the message. Use messageProperties.can_edit_media to check whether the message can be edited

reply_markup.description: The new message reply markup; pass null if none; for bots only

input_message_content.description: New content of the message. Must be one of the following types: inputMessageAnimation, inputMessageAudio, inputMessageDocument, inputMessagePhoto or inputMessageVideo

editMessageCaption.description: Edits the message content caption. Returns the edited message after the edit is completed on the server side

chat_id.description: The chat the message belongs to

message_id.description: Identifier of the message. Use messageProperties.can_be_edited to check whether the message can be edited

reply_markup.description: The new message reply markup; pass null if none; for bots only

caption.description: New message content caption; 0-getOption("message_caption_length_max") characters; pass null to remove caption

show_caption_above_media.description: Pass true to show the caption above the media; otherwise, the caption will be shown below the media. May be true only for animation, photo, and video messages

editMessageReplyMarkup.description: Edits the message reply markup; for bots only. Returns the edited message after the edit is completed on the server side

chat_id.description: The chat the message belongs to

message_id.description: Identifier of the message. Use messageProperties.can_be_edited to check whether the message can be edited

reply_markup.description: The new message reply markup; pass null if none

editInlineMessageText.description: Edits the text of an inline text or game message sent via a bot; for bots only

reply_markup.description: The new message reply markup; pass null if none

input_message_content.description: New text content of the message. Must be of type inputMessageText

editInlineMessageLiveLocation.description: Edits the content of a live location in an inline message sent via a bot; for bots only

reply_markup.description: The new message reply markup; pass null if none

location.description: New location content of the message; pass null to stop sharing the live location

live_period.description: New time relative to the message send date, for which the location can be updated, in seconds. If 0x7FFFFFFF specified, then the location can be updated forever. Otherwise, must not exceed the current live_period by more than a day, and the live location expiration date must remain in the next 90 days. Pass 0 to keep the current live_period

heading.description: The new direction in which the location moves, in degrees; 1-360. Pass 0 if unknown

proximity_alert_radius.description: The new maximum distance for proximity alerts, in meters (0-100000). Pass 0 if the notification is disabled

editInlineMessageMedia.description: Edits the media content of a message with a text, an animation, an audio, a document, a photo or a video in an inline message sent via a bot; for bots only

reply_markup.description: The new message reply markup; pass null if none; for bots only

input_message_content.description: New content of the message. Must be one of the following types: inputMessageAnimation, inputMessageAudio, inputMessageDocument, inputMessagePhoto or inputMessageVideo

editInlineMessageCaption.description: Edits the caption of an inline message sent via a bot; for bots only

reply_markup.description: The new message reply markup; pass null if none

caption.description: New message content caption; pass null to remove caption; 0-getOption("message_caption_length_max") characters

show_caption_above_media.description: Pass true to show the caption above the media; otherwise, the caption will be shown below the media. May be true only for animation, photo, and video messages

editInlineMessageReplyMarkup.description: Edits the reply markup of an inline message sent via a bot; for bots only

reply_markup.description: The new message reply markup; pass null if none

editMessageSchedulingState.description: Edits the time when a scheduled message will be sent. Scheduling state of all messages in the same album or forwarded together with the message will be also changed

chat_id.description: The chat the message belongs to

message_id.description: Identifier of the message. Use messageProperties.can_edit_scheduling_state to check whether the message is suitable

scheduling_state.description: The new message scheduling state; pass null to send the message immediately. Must be null for messages in the state messageSchedulingStateSendWhenVideoProcessed

setMessageFactCheck.description: Changes the fact-check of a message. Can be only used if messageProperties.can_set_fact_check == true

chat_id.description: The channel chat the message belongs to

text.description: New text of the fact-check; 0-getOption("fact_check_length_max") characters; pass null to remove it. Only Bold, Italic, and TextUrl entities with https://t.me/ links are supported

sendBusinessMessage.description: Sends a message on behalf of a business account; for bots only. Returns the message after it was sent

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection on behalf of which to send the request

reply_to.description: Information about the message to be replied; pass null if none

disable_notification.description: Pass true to disable notification for the message

protect_content.description: Pass true if the content of the message must be protected from forwarding and saving

effect_id.description: Identifier of the effect to apply to the message

reply_markup.description: Markup for replying to the message; pass null if none

input_message_content.description: The content of the message to be sent

sendBusinessMessageAlbum.description: Sends 2-10 messages grouped together into an album on behalf of a business account; for bots only. Currently, only audio, document, photo and video messages can be grouped into an album. Documents and audio files can be only grouped in an album with messages of the same type. Returns sent messages

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection on behalf of which to send the request

reply_to.description: Information about the message to be replied; pass null if none

disable_notification.description: Pass true to disable notification for the message

protect_content.description: Pass true if the content of the message must be protected from forwarding and saving

effect_id.description: Identifier of the effect to apply to the message

input_message_contents.description: Contents of messages to be sent. At most 10 messages can be added to an album. All messages must have the same value of show_caption_above_media

editBusinessMessageText.description: Edits the text of a text or game message sent on behalf of a business account; for bots only

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection on behalf of which the message was sent

chat_id.description: The chat the message belongs to

reply_markup.description: The new message reply markup; pass null if none

input_message_content.description: New text content of the message. Must be of type inputMessageText

editBusinessMessageLiveLocation.description: Edits the content of a live location in a message sent on behalf of a business account; for bots only

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection on behalf of which the message was sent

chat_id.description: The chat the message belongs to

reply_markup.description: The new message reply markup; pass null if none

location.description: New location content of the message; pass null to stop sharing the live location

live_period.description: New time relative to the message send date, for which the location can be updated, in seconds. If 0x7FFFFFFF specified, then the location can be updated forever. Otherwise, must not exceed the current live_period by more than a day, and the live location expiration date must remain in the next 90 days. Pass 0 to keep the current live_period

heading.description: The new direction in which the location moves, in degrees; 1-360. Pass 0 if unknown

proximity_alert_radius.description: The new maximum distance for proximity alerts, in meters (0-100000). Pass 0 if the notification is disabled

editBusinessMessageMedia.description: Edits the media content of a message with a text, an animation, an audio, a document, a photo or a video in a message sent on behalf of a business account; for bots only

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection on behalf of which the message was sent

chat_id.description: The chat the message belongs to

reply_markup.description: The new message reply markup; pass null if none; for bots only

input_message_content.description: New content of the message. Must be one of the following types: inputMessageAnimation, inputMessageAudio, inputMessageDocument, inputMessagePhoto or inputMessageVideo

editBusinessMessageCaption.description: Edits the caption of a message sent on behalf of a business account; for bots only

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection on behalf of which the message was sent

chat_id.description: The chat the message belongs to

reply_markup.description: The new message reply markup; pass null if none

caption.description: New message content caption; pass null to remove caption; 0-getOption("message_caption_length_max") characters

show_caption_above_media.description: Pass true to show the caption above the media; otherwise, the caption will be shown below the media. May be true only for animation, photo, and video messages

editBusinessMessageReplyMarkup.description: Edits the reply markup of a message sent on behalf of a business account; for bots only

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection on behalf of which the message was sent

chat_id.description: The chat the message belongs to

reply_markup.description: The new message reply markup; pass null if none

stopBusinessPoll.description: Stops a poll sent on behalf of a business account; for bots only

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection on behalf of which the message with the poll was sent

chat_id.description: The chat the message belongs to

message_id.description: Identifier of the message containing the poll

reply_markup.description: The new message reply markup; pass null if none

setBusinessMessageIsPinned.description: Pins or unpins a message sent on behalf of a business account; for bots only

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection on behalf of which the message was sent

chat_id.description: The chat the message belongs to

is_pinned.description: Pass true to pin the message, pass false to unpin it

readBusinessMessage.description: Reads a message on behalf of a business account; for bots only

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection through which the message was received

chat_id.description: The chat the message belongs to

deleteBusinessMessages.description: Deletes messages on behalf of a business account; for bots only

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection through which the messages were received

editBusinessStory.description: Changes a story posted by the bot on behalf of a business account; for bots only

story_poster_chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat that posted the story

story_id.description: Identifier of the story to edit

areas.description: New clickable rectangle areas to be shown on the story media

privacy_settings.description: The new privacy settings for the story

deleteBusinessStory.description: Deletes a story posted by the bot on behalf of a business account; for bots only

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection

story_id.description: Identifier of the story to delete

setBusinessAccountName.description: Changes the first and last name of a business account; for bots only

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection

first_name.description: The new value of the first name for the business account; 1-64 characters

last_name.description: The new value of the optional last name for the business account; 0-64 characters

setBusinessAccountBio.description: Changes the bio of a business account; for bots only

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection

bio.description: The new value of the bio; 0-getOption("bio_length_max") characters without line feeds

setBusinessAccountProfilePhoto.description: Changes a profile photo of a business account; for bots only

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection

photo.description: Profile photo to set; pass null to remove the photo

is_public.description: Pass true to set the public photo, which will be visible even the main photo is hidden by privacy settings

setBusinessAccountUsername.description: Changes the editable username of a business account; for bots only

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection

username.description: The new value of the username

setBusinessAccountGiftSettings.description: Changes settings for gift receiving of a business account; for bots only

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection

getBusinessAccountStarAmount.description: Returns the amount of Telegram Stars owned by a business account; for bots only

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection

transferBusinessAccountStars.description: Transfer Telegram Stars from the business account to the business bot; for bots only

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection

star_count.description: Number of Telegram Stars to transfer

checkQuickReplyShortcutName.description: Checks validness of a name for a quick reply shortcut. Can be called synchronously

name.description: The name of the shortcut; 1-32 characters

loadQuickReplyShortcuts.description: Loads quick reply shortcuts created by the current user. The loaded data will be sent through updateQuickReplyShortcut and updateQuickReplyShortcuts

setQuickReplyShortcutName.description: Changes name of a quick reply shortcut

shortcut_id.description: Unique identifier of the quick reply shortcut

name.description: New name for the shortcut. Use checkQuickReplyShortcutName to check its validness

shortcut_id.description: Unique identifier of the quick reply shortcut

reorderQuickReplyShortcuts.description: Changes the order of quick reply shortcuts

shortcut_ids.description: The new order of quick reply shortcuts

loadQuickReplyShortcutMessages.description: Loads quick reply messages that can be sent by a given quick reply shortcut. The loaded messages will be sent through updateQuickReplyShortcutMessages

shortcut_id.description: Unique identifier of the quick reply shortcut
Unique identifier of the quick reply shortcut to which the messages belong

addQuickReplyShortcutMessage.description: Adds a message to a quick reply shortcut. If shortcut doesn't exist and there are less than getOption("quick_reply_shortcut_count_max") shortcuts, then a new shortcut is created. The shortcut must not contain more than getOption("quick_reply_shortcut_message_count_max") messages after adding the new message. Returns the added message

reply_to_message_id.description: Identifier of a quick reply message in the same shortcut to be replied; pass 0 if none

input_message_content.description: The content of the message to be added; inputMessagePoll, inputMessageForwarded and inputMessageLocation with live_period aren't supported

addQuickReplyShortcutInlineQueryResultMe.description: Adds a message to a quick reply shortcut via inline bot. If shortcut doesn't exist and there are less than getOption("quick_reply_shortcut_count_max") shortcuts, then a new shortcut is created. The shortcut must not contain more than getOption("quick_reply_shortcut_message_count_max") messages after adding the new message. Returns the added message

reply_to_message_id.description: Identifier of a quick reply message in the same shortcut to be replied; pass 0 if none

result_id.description: Identifier of the inline query result

hide_via_bot.description: Pass true to hide the bot, via which the message is sent. Can be used only for bots getOption("animation_search_bot_username"), getOption("photo_search_bot_username"), and getOption("venue_search_bot_username")

addQuickReplyShortcutMessageAlbum.description: Adds 2-10 messages grouped together into an album to a quick reply shortcut. Currently, only audio, document, photo and video messages can be grouped into an album. Documents and audio files can be only grouped in an album with messages of the same type. Returns sent messages

reply_to_message_id.description: Identifier of a quick reply message in the same shortcut to be replied; pass 0 if none

input_message_contents.description: Contents of messages to be sent. At most 10 messages can be added to an album. All messages must have the same value of show_caption_above_media

readdQuickReplyShortcutMessages.description: Readds quick reply messages which failed to add. Can be called only for messages for which messageSendingStateFailed.can_retry is true and after specified in messageSendingStateFailed.retry_after time passed. If a message is readded, the corresponding failed to send message is deleted. Returns the sent messages in the same order as the message identifiers passed in message_ids. If a message can't be readded, null will be returned instead of the message

message_ids.description: Identifiers of the quick reply messages to readd. Message identifiers must be in a strictly increasing order

editQuickReplyMessage.description: Asynchronously edits the text, media or caption of a quick reply message. Use quickReplyMessage.can_be_edited to check whether a message can be edited. Media message can be edited only to a media message. The type of message content in an album can't be changed with exception of replacing a photo with a video or vice versa

shortcut_id.description: Unique identifier of the quick reply shortcut with the message

input_message_content.description: New content of the message. Must be one of the following types: inputMessageText, inputMessageAnimation, inputMessageAudio, inputMessageDocument, inputMessagePhoto or inputMessageVideo

getForumTopicDefaultIcons.description: Returns the list of custom emoji, which can be used as forum topic icon by all users

createForumTopic.description: Creates a topic in a forum supergroup chat; requires can_manage_topics administrator or can_create_topics member right in the supergroup

icon.description: Icon of the topic. Icon color must be one of 0x6FB9F0, 0xFFD67E, 0xCB86DB, 0x8EEE98, 0xFF93B2, or 0xFB6F5F. Telegram Premium users can use any custom emoji as topic icon, other users can use only a custom emoji returned by getForumTopicDefaultIcons

editForumTopic.description: Edits title and icon of a topic in a forum supergroup chat; requires can_manage_topics right in the supergroup unless the user is creator of the topic

message_thread_id.description: Message thread identifier of the forum topic

name.description: New name of the topic; 0-128 characters. If empty, the previous topic name is kept

edit_icon_custom_emoji.description: Pass true to edit the icon of the topic. Icon of the General topic can't be edited

icon_custom_emoji_id.description: Identifier of the new custom emoji for topic icon; pass 0 to remove the custom emoji. Ignored if edit_icon_custom_emoji is false. Telegram Premium users can use any custom emoji, other users can use only a custom emoji returned by getForumTopicDefaultIcons

getForumTopic.description: Returns information about a forum topic

message_thread_id.description: Message thread identifier of the forum topic

getForumTopicLink.description: Returns an HTTPS link to a topic in a forum chat. This is an offline method

message_thread_id.description: Message thread identifier of the forum topic

getForumTopics.description: Returns found forum topics in a forum chat. This is a temporary method for getting information about topic list from the server

query.description: Query to search for in the forum topic's name

offset_date.description: The date starting from which the results need to be fetched. Use 0 or any date in the future to get results from the last topic

offset_message_id.description: The message identifier of the last message in the last found topic, or 0 for the first request

offset_message_thread_id.description: The message thread identifier of the last found topic, or 0 for the first request

limit.description: The maximum number of forum topics to be returned; up to 100. For optimal performance, the number of returned forum topics is chosen by TDLib and can be smaller than the specified limit

setForumTopicNotificationSettings.description: Changes the notification settings of a forum topic

message_thread_id.description: Message thread identifier of the forum topic

notification_settings.description: New notification settings for the forum topic. If the topic is muted for more than 366 days, it is considered to be muted forever

toggleForumTopicIsClosed.description: Toggles whether a topic is closed in a forum supergroup chat; requires can_manage_topics right in the supergroup unless the user is creator of the topic

message_thread_id.description: Message thread identifier of the forum topic

is_closed.description: Pass true to close the topic; pass false to reopen it

toggleGeneralForumTopicIsHidden.description: Toggles whether a General topic is hidden in a forum supergroup chat; requires can_manage_topics right in the supergroup

is_hidden.description: Pass true to hide and close the General topic; pass false to unhide it

toggleForumTopicIsPinned.description: Changes the pinned state of a forum topic; requires can_manage_topics right in the supergroup. There can be up to getOption("pinned_forum_topic_count_max") pinned forum topics

message_thread_id.description: Message thread identifier of the forum topic

is_pinned.description: Pass true to pin the topic; pass false to unpin it

setPinnedForumTopics.description: Changes the order of pinned forum topics; requires can_manage_topics right in the supergroup

message_thread_ids.description: The new list of pinned forum topics

deleteForumTopic.description: Deletes all messages in a forum topic; requires can_delete_messages administrator right in the supergroup unless the user is creator of the topic, the topic has no messages from other users and has at most 11 messages

message_thread_id.description: Message thread identifier of the forum topic

getEmojiReaction.description: Returns information about an emoji reaction. Returns a 404 error if the reaction is not found

getCustomEmojiReactionAnimations.description: Returns TGS stickers with generic animations for custom emoji reactions

getMessageAvailableReactions.description: Returns reactions, which can be added to a message. The list can change after updateActiveEmojiReactions, updateChatAvailableReactions for the chat, or updateMessageInteractionInfo for the message

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat to which the message belongs

clearRecentReactions.description: Clears the list of recently used reactions

addMessageReaction.description: Adds a reaction or a tag to a message. Use getMessageAvailableReactions to receive the list of available reactions for the message

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat to which the message belongs

reaction_type.description: Type of the reaction to add. Use addPendingPaidMessageReaction instead to add the paid reaction

is_big.description: Pass true if the reaction is added with a big animation

update_recent_reactions.description: Pass true if the reaction needs to be added to recent reactions; tags are never added to the list of recent reactions

removeMessageReaction.description: Removes a reaction from a message. A chosen reaction can always be removed

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat to which the message belongs

reaction_type.description: Type of the reaction to remove. The paid reaction can't be removed

getChatAvailablePaidMessageReactionSende.description: Returns the list of message sender identifiers, which can be used to send a paid reaction in a chat

addPendingPaidMessageReaction.description: Adds the paid message reaction to a message. Use getMessageAvailableReactions to check whether the reaction is available for the message

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat to which the message belongs

star_count.description: Number of Telegram Stars to be used for the reaction. The total number of pending paid reactions must not exceed getOption("paid_reaction_star_count_max")

type.description: Type of the paid reaction; pass null if the user didn't choose reaction type explicitly, for example, the reaction is set from the message bubble

commitPendingPaidMessageReactions.description: Applies all pending paid reactions on a message

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat to which the message belongs

removePendingPaidMessageReactions.description: Removes all pending paid reactions on a message

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat to which the message belongs

setPaidMessageReactionType.description: Changes type of paid message reaction of the current user on a message. The message must have paid reaction added by the current user

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat to which the message belongs

type.description: New type of the paid reaction

setMessageReactions.description: Sets reactions on a message; for bots only

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat to which the message belongs

reaction_types.description: Types of the reaction to set; pass an empty list to remove the reactions

is_big.description: Pass true if the reactions are added with a big animation

getMessageAddedReactions.description: Returns reactions added for a message, along with their sender

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat to which the message belongs

message_id.description: Identifier of the message. Use message.interaction_info.reactions.can_get_added_reactions to check whether added reactions can be received for the message

reaction_type.description: Type of the reactions to return; pass null to return all added reactions; reactionTypePaid isn't supported

offset.description: Offset of the first entry to return as received from the previous request; use empty string to get the first chunk of results

limit.description: The maximum number of reactions to be returned; must be positive and can't be greater than 100

setDefaultReactionType.description: Changes type of default reaction for the current user

reaction_type.description: New type of the default reaction. The paid reaction can't be set as default

getSavedMessagesTags.description: Returns tags used in Saved Messages or a Saved Messages topic

saved_messages_topic_id.description: Identifier of Saved Messages topic which tags will be returned; pass 0 to get all Saved Messages tags

setSavedMessagesTagLabel.description: Changes label of a Saved Messages tag; for Telegram Premium users only

tag.description: The tag which label will be changed

label.description: New label for the tag; 0-12 characters

getMessageEffect.description: Returns information about a message effect. Returns a 404 error if the effect is not found

searchQuote.description: Searches for a given quote in a text. Returns found quote start position in UTF-16 code units. Returns a 404 error if the quote is not found. Can be called synchronously

text.description: Text in which to search for the quote

quote_position.description: Approximate quote position in UTF-16 code units

getTextEntities.description: Returns all entities (mentions, hashtags, cashtags, bot commands, bank card numbers, URLs, and email addresses) found in the text. Can be called synchronously

text.description: The text in which to look for entities

parseTextEntities.description: Parses Bold, Italic, Underline, Strikethrough, Spoiler, CustomEmoji, BlockQuote, ExpandableBlockQuote, Code, Pre, PreCode, TextUrl and MentionName entities from a marked-up text. Can be called synchronously

parseMarkdown.description: Parses Markdown entities in a human-friendly format, ignoring markup errors. Can be called synchronously

text.description: The text to parse. For example, "__italic__ ~~strikethrough~~ ||spoiler|| **bold** `code` ```pre``` __[italic__ text_url](telegram.org) __italic**bold italic__bold**"

getMarkdownText.description: Replaces text entities with Markdown formatting in a human-friendly format. Entities that can't be represented in Markdown unambiguously are kept as is. Can be called synchronously

getCountryFlagEmoji.description: Returns an emoji for the given country. Returns an empty string on failure. Can be called synchronously

country_code.description: A two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code as received from getCountries

getFileMimeType.description: Returns the MIME type of a file, guessed by its extension. Returns an empty string on failure. Can be called synchronously

file_name.description: The name of the file or path to the file

getFileExtension.description: Returns the extension of a file, guessed by its MIME type. Returns an empty string on failure. Can be called synchronously

mime_type.description: The MIME type of the file

cleanFileName.description: Removes potentially dangerous characters from the name of a file. Returns an empty string on failure. Can be called synchronously

file_name.description: File name or path to the file

getLanguagePackString.description: Returns a string stored in the local database from the specified localization target and language pack by its key. Returns a 404 error if the string is not found. Can be called synchronously

language_pack_database_path.description: Path to the language pack database in which strings are stored

localization_target.description: Localization target to which the language pack belongs

key.description: Language pack key of the string to be returned

getJsonValue.description: Converts a JSON-serialized string to corresponding JsonValue object. Can be called synchronously

getJsonString.description: Converts a JsonValue object to corresponding JSON-serialized string. Can be called synchronously

getThemeParametersJsonString.description: Converts a themeParameters object to corresponding JSON-serialized string. Can be called synchronously

theme.description: Theme parameters to convert to JSON

setPollAnswer.description: Changes the user answer to a poll. A poll in quiz mode can be answered only once

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat to which the poll belongs

message_id.description: Identifier of the message containing the poll

option_ids.description: 0-based identifiers of answer options, chosen by the user. User can choose more than 1 answer option only is the poll allows multiple answers

getPollVoters.description: Returns message senders voted for the specified option in a non-anonymous polls. For optimal performance, the number of returned users is chosen by TDLib

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat to which the poll belongs

message_id.description: Identifier of the message containing the poll

offset.description: Number of voters to skip in the result; must be non-negative

limit.description: The maximum number of voters to be returned; must be positive and can't be greater than 50. For optimal performance, the number of returned voters is chosen by TDLib and can be smaller than the specified limit, even if the end of the voter list has not been reached

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat to which the poll belongs

message_id.description: Identifier of the message containing the poll. Use messageProperties.can_be_edited to check whether the poll can be stopped

reply_markup.description: The new message reply markup; pass null if none; for bots only

hideContactCloseBirthdays.description: Hides the list of contacts that have close birthdays for 24 hours

getBusinessConnection.description: Returns information about a business connection by its identifier; for bots only

connection_id.description: Identifier of the business connection to return

getLoginUrlInfo.description: Returns information about a button of type inlineKeyboardButtonTypeLoginUrl. The method needs to be called when the user presses the button

chat_id.description: Chat identifier of the message with the button

message_id.description: Message identifier of the message with the button. The message must not be scheduled

getLoginUrl.description: Returns an HTTP URL which can be used to automatically authorize the user on a website after clicking an inline button of type inlineKeyboardButtonTypeLoginUrl. Use the method getLoginUrlInfo to find whether a prior user confirmation is needed. If an error is returned, then the button must be handled as an ordinary URL button

chat_id.description: Chat identifier of the message with the button

message_id.description: Message identifier of the message with the button

allow_write_access.description: Pass true to allow the bot to send messages to the current user

shareUsersWithBot.description: Shares users after pressing a keyboardButtonTypeRequestUsers button with the bot

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat with the bot

message_id.description: Identifier of the message with the button

only_check.description: Pass true to check that the users can be shared by the button instead of actually sharing them

shareChatWithBot.description: Shares a chat after pressing a keyboardButtonTypeRequestChat button with the bot

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat with the bot

message_id.description: Identifier of the message with the button

only_check.description: Pass true to check that the chat can be shared by the button instead of actually sharing it. Doesn't check bot_is_member and bot_administrator_rights restrictions. If the bot must be a member, then all chats from getGroupsInCommon and all chats, where the user can add the bot, are suitable. In the latter case the bot will be automatically added to the chat. If the bot must be an administrator, then all chats, where the bot already has requested rights or can be added to administrators by the user, are suitable. In the latter case the bot will be automatically granted requested rights

getInlineQueryResults.description: Sends an inline query to a bot and returns its results. Returns an error with code 502 if the bot fails to answer the query before the query timeout expires

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat where the query was sent

user_location.description: Location of the user; pass null if unknown or the bot doesn't need user's location

offset.description: Offset of the first entry to return; use empty string to get the first chunk of results

answerInlineQuery.description: Sets the result of an inline query; for bots only

is_personal.description: Pass true if results may be cached and returned only for the user that sent the query. By default, results may be returned to any user who sends the same query

button.description: Button to be shown above inline query results; pass null if none

cache_time.description: Allowed time to cache the results of the query, in seconds

next_offset.description: Offset for the next inline query; pass an empty string if there are no more results

savePreparedInlineMessage.description: Saves an inline message to be sent by the given user; for bots only

chat_types.description: Types of the chats to which the message can be sent

getPreparedInlineMessage.description: Saves an inline message to be sent by the given user

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the bot that created the message

getGrossingWebAppBots.description: Returns the most grossing Web App bots

offset.description: Offset of the first entry to return as received from the previous request; use empty string to get the first chunk of results

limit.description: The maximum number of bots to be returned; up to 100

searchWebApp.description: Returns information about a Web App by its short name. Returns a 404 error if the Web App is not found

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot

web_app_short_name.description: Short name of the Web App

getWebAppPlaceholder.description: Returns a default placeholder for Web Apps of a bot. This is an offline method. Returns a 404 error if the placeholder isn't known

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot

getWebAppLinkUrl.description: Returns an HTTPS URL of a Web App to open after a link of the type internalLinkTypeWebApp is clicked

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat in which the link was clicked; pass 0 if none

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot

web_app_short_name.description: Short name of the Web App

allow_write_access.description: Pass true if the current user allowed the bot to send them messages

parameters.description: Parameters to use to open the Web App

getMainWebApp.description: Returns information needed to open the main Web App of a bot

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat in which the Web App is opened; pass 0 if none

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot. If the bot is restricted for the current user, then show an error instead of calling the method

parameters.description: Parameters to use to open the Web App

getWebAppUrl.description: Returns an HTTPS URL of a Web App to open from the side menu, a keyboardButtonTypeWebApp button, or an inlineQueryResultsButtonTypeWebApp button

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot. If the bot is restricted for the current user, then show an error instead of calling the method

url.description: The URL from a keyboardButtonTypeWebApp button, inlineQueryResultsButtonTypeWebApp button, or an empty string when the bot is opened from the side menu

parameters.description: Parameters to use to open the Web App

sendWebAppData.description: Sends data received from a keyboardButtonTypeWebApp Web App to a bot

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot

button_text.description: Text of the keyboardButtonTypeWebApp button, which opened the Web App

openWebApp.description: Informs TDLib that a Web App is being opened from the attachment menu, a botMenuButton button, an internalLinkTypeAttachmentMenuBot link, or an inlineKeyboardButtonTypeWebApp button. For each bot, a confirmation alert about data sent to the bot must be shown once

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat in which the Web App is opened. The Web App can't be opened in secret chats

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the bot, providing the Web App. If the bot is restricted for the current user, then show an error instead of calling the method

url.description: The URL from an inlineKeyboardButtonTypeWebApp button, a botMenuButton button, an internalLinkTypeAttachmentMenuBot link, or an empty string otherwise

message_thread_id.description: If not 0, the message thread identifier to which the message will be sent

direct_messages_chat_topic_id.description: If not 0, unique identifier of the topic of channel direct messages chat to which the message will be sent

reply_to.description: Information about the message or story to be replied in the message sent by the Web App; pass null if none

parameters.description: Parameters to use to open the Web App

closeWebApp.description: Informs TDLib that a previously opened Web App was closed

web_app_launch_id.description: Identifier of Web App launch, received from openWebApp

answerWebAppQuery.description: Sets the result of interaction with a Web App and sends corresponding message on behalf of the user to the chat from which the query originated; for bots only

web_app_query_id.description: Identifier of the Web App query

checkWebAppFileDownload.description: Checks whether a file can be downloaded and saved locally by Web App request

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the bot, providing the Web App

url.description: URL of the file

getCallbackQueryAnswer.description: Sends a callback query to a bot and returns an answer. Returns an error with code 502 if the bot fails to answer the query before the query timeout expires

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat with the message

message_id.description: Identifier of the message from which the query originated. The message must not be scheduled

answerCallbackQuery.description: Sets the result of a callback query; for bots only

show_alert.description: Pass true to show an alert to the user instead of a toast notification

url.description: URL to be opened

cache_time.description: Time during which the result of the query can be cached, in seconds

answerShippingQuery.description: Sets the result of a shipping query; for bots only

error_message.description: An error message, empty on success

answerPreCheckoutQuery.description: Sets the result of a pre-checkout query; for bots only

error_message.description: An error message, empty on success

setGameScore.description: Updates the game score of the specified user in the game; for bots only

chat_id.description: The chat to which the message with the game belongs

edit_message.description: Pass true to edit the game message to include the current scoreboard

force.description: Pass true to update the score even if it decreases. If the score is 0, the user will be deleted from the high score table

setInlineGameScore.description: Updates the game score of the specified user in a game; for bots only

edit_message.description: Pass true to edit the game message to include the current scoreboard

force.description: Pass true to update the score even if it decreases. If the score is 0, the user will be deleted from the high score table

getGameHighScores.description: Returns the high scores for a game and some part of the high score table in the range of the specified user; for bots only

chat_id.description: The chat that contains the message with the game

getInlineGameHighScores.description: Returns game high scores and some part of the high score table in the range of the specified user; for bots only

deleteChatReplyMarkup.description: Deletes the default reply markup from a chat. Must be called after a one-time keyboard or a replyMarkupForceReply reply markup has been used. An updateChatReplyMarkup update will be sent if the reply markup is changed

message_id.description: The message identifier of the used keyboard

sendChatAction.description: Sends a notification about user activity in a chat

message_thread_id.description: If not 0, the message thread identifier in which the action was performed

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection on behalf of which to send the request; for bots only

action.description: The action description; pass null to cancel the currently active action

openChat.description: Informs TDLib that the chat is opened by the user. Many useful activities depend on the chat being opened or closed (e.g., in supergroups and channels all updates are received only for opened chats)

closeChat.description: Informs TDLib that the chat is closed by the user. Many useful activities depend on the chat being opened or closed

viewMessages.description: Informs TDLib that messages are being viewed by the user. Sponsored messages must be marked as viewed only when the entire text of the message is shown on the screen (excluding the button). Many useful activities depend on whether the messages are currently being viewed or not (e.g., marking messages as read, incrementing a view counter, updating a view counter, removing deleted messages in supergroups and channels)

message_ids.description: The identifiers of the messages being viewed

source.description: Source of the message view; pass null to guess the source based on chat open state

force_read.description: Pass true to mark as read the specified messages even the chat is closed

openMessageContent.description: Informs TDLib that the message content has been opened (e.g., the user has opened a photo, video, document, location or venue, or has listened to an audio file or voice note message). An updateMessageContentOpened update will be generated if something has changed

message_id.description: Identifier of the message with the opened content

clickAnimatedEmojiMessage.description: Informs TDLib that a message with an animated emoji was clicked by the user. Returns a big animated sticker to be played or a 404 error if usual animation needs to be played

getInternalLink.description: Returns an HTTPS or a tg: link with the given type. Can be called before authorization

is_http.description: Pass true to create an HTTPS link (only available for some link types); pass false to create a tg: link

getInternalLinkType.description: Returns information about the type of internal link. Returns a 404 error if the link is not internal. Can be called before authorization

getExternalLinkInfo.description: Returns information about an action to be done when the current user clicks an external link. Don't use this method for links from secret chats if link preview is disabled in secret chats

getExternalLink.description: Returns an HTTP URL which can be used to automatically authorize the current user on a website after clicking an HTTP link. Use the method getExternalLinkInfo to find whether a prior user confirmation is needed

allow_write_access.description: Pass true if the current user allowed the bot, returned in getExternalLinkInfo, to send them messages

readAllChatMentions.description: Marks all mentions in a chat as read

readAllMessageThreadMentions.description: Marks all mentions in a forum topic as read

message_thread_id.description: Message thread identifier in which mentions are marked as read

readAllChatReactions.description: Marks all reactions in a chat or a forum topic as read

readAllMessageThreadReactions.description: Marks all reactions in a forum topic as read

message_thread_id.description: Message thread identifier in which reactions are marked as read

createPrivateChat.description: Returns an existing chat corresponding to a given user

force.description: Pass true to create the chat without a network request. In this case all information about the chat except its type, title and photo can be incorrect

createBasicGroupChat.description: Returns an existing chat corresponding to a known basic group

force.description: Pass true to create the chat without a network request. In this case all information about the chat except its type, title and photo can be incorrect

createSupergroupChat.description: Returns an existing chat corresponding to a known supergroup or channel

force.description: Pass true to create the chat without a network request. In this case all information about the chat except its type, title and photo can be incorrect

createSecretChat.description: Returns an existing chat corresponding to a known secret chat

createNewBasicGroupChat.description: Creates a new basic group and sends a corresponding messageBasicGroupChatCreate. Returns information about the newly created chat

user_ids.description: Identifiers of users to be added to the basic group; may be empty to create a basic group without other members

title.description: Title of the new basic group; 1-128 characters

message_auto_delete_time.description: Message auto-delete time value, in seconds; must be from 0 up to 365 * 86400 and be divisible by 86400. If 0, then messages aren't deleted automatically

createNewSupergroupChat.description: Creates a new supergroup or channel and sends a corresponding messageSupergroupChatCreate. Returns the newly created chat

title.description: Title of the new chat; 1-128 characters

is_forum.description: Pass true to create a forum supergroup chat

is_channel.description: Pass true to create a channel chat; ignored if a forum is created

location.description: Chat location if a location-based supergroup is being created; pass null to create an ordinary supergroup chat

message_auto_delete_time.description: Message auto-delete time value, in seconds; must be from 0 up to 365 * 86400 and be divisible by 86400. If 0, then messages aren't deleted automatically

for_import.description: Pass true to create a supergroup for importing messages using importMessages

createNewSecretChat.description: Creates a new secret chat. Returns the newly created chat

upgradeBasicGroupChatToSupergroupChat.description: Creates a new supergroup from an existing basic group and sends a corresponding messageChatUpgradeTo and messageChatUpgradeFrom; requires owner privileges. Deactivates the original basic group

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat to upgrade

getChatListsToAddChat.description: Returns chat lists to which the chat can be added. This is an offline method

addChatToList.description: Adds a chat to a chat list. A chat can't be simultaneously in Main and Archive chat lists, so it is automatically removed from another one if needed

chat_list.description: The chat list. Use getChatListsToAddChat to get suitable chat lists

getChatFolder.description: Returns information about a chat folder by its identifier

createChatFolder.description: Creates new chat folder. Returns information about the created chat folder. There can be up to getOption("chat_folder_count_max") chat folders, but the limit can be increased with Telegram Premium

editChatFolder.description: Edits existing chat folder. Returns information about the edited chat folder

leave_chat_ids.description: Identifiers of the chats to leave. The chats must be pinned or always included in the folder

getChatFolderChatsToLeave.description: Returns identifiers of pinned or always included chats from a chat folder, which are suggested to be left when the chat folder is deleted

getChatFolderChatCount.description: Returns approximate number of chats in a being created chat folder. Main and archive chat lists must be fully preloaded for this function to work correctly

reorderChatFolders.description: Changes the order of chat folders

chat_folder_ids.description: Identifiers of chat folders in the new correct order

main_chat_list_position.description: Position of the main chat list among chat folders, 0-based. Can be non-zero only for Premium users

toggleChatFolderTags.description: Toggles whether chat folder tags are enabled

are_tags_enabled.description: Pass true to enable folder tags; pass false to disable them

getRecommendedChatFolders.description: Returns recommended chat folders for the current user

getChatFolderDefaultIconName.description: Returns default icon name for a folder. Can be called synchronously

getChatsForChatFolderInviteLink.description: Returns identifiers of chats from a chat folder, suitable for adding to a chat folder invite link

createChatFolderInviteLink.description: Creates a new invite link for a chat folder. A link can be created for a chat folder if it has only pinned and included chats

chat_ids.description: Identifiers of chats to be accessible by the invite link. Use getChatsForChatFolderInviteLink to get suitable chats. Basic groups will be automatically converted to supergroups before link creation

getChatFolderInviteLinks.description: Returns invite links created by the current user for a shareable chat folder

editChatFolderInviteLink.description: Edits an invite link for a chat folder

invite_link.description: Invite link to be edited

name.description: New name of the link; 0-32 characters

chat_ids.description: New identifiers of chats to be accessible by the invite link. Use getChatsForChatFolderInviteLink to get suitable chats. Basic groups will be automatically converted to supergroups before link editing

deleteChatFolderInviteLink.description: Deletes an invite link for a chat folder

invite_link.description: Invite link to be deleted

checkChatFolderInviteLink.description: Checks the validity of an invite link for a chat folder and returns information about the corresponding chat folder

invite_link.description: Invite link to be checked

addChatFolderByInviteLink.description: Adds a chat folder by an invite link

invite_link.description: Invite link for the chat folder

chat_ids.description: Identifiers of the chats added to the chat folder. The chats are automatically joined if they aren't joined yet

getChatFolderNewChats.description: Returns new chats added to a shareable chat folder by its owner. The method must be called at most once in getOption("chat_folder_new_chats_update_period") for the given chat folder

processChatFolderNewChats.description: Process new chats added to a shareable chat folder by its owner

added_chat_ids.description: Identifiers of the new chats, which are added to the chat folder. The chats are automatically joined if they aren't joined yet

getArchiveChatListSettings.description: Returns settings for automatic moving of chats to and from the Archive chat lists

setArchiveChatListSettings.description: Changes settings for automatic moving of chats to and from the Archive chat lists

setChatTitle.description: Changes the chat title. Supported only for basic groups, supergroups and channels. Requires can_change_info member right

title.description: New title of the chat; 1-128 characters

setChatPhoto.description: Changes the photo of a chat. Supported only for basic groups, supergroups and channels. Requires can_change_info member right

photo.description: New chat photo; pass null to delete the chat photo

setChatAccentColor.description: Changes accent color and background custom emoji of a channel chat. Requires can_change_info administrator right

accent_color_id.description: Identifier of the accent color to use. The chat must have at least accentColor.min_channel_chat_boost_level boost level to pass the corresponding color

background_custom_emoji_id.description: Identifier of a custom emoji to be shown on the reply header and link preview background; 0 if none. Use chatBoostLevelFeatures.can_set_background_custom_emoji to check whether a custom emoji can be set

setChatProfileAccentColor.description: Changes accent color and background custom emoji for profile of a supergroup or channel chat. Requires can_change_info administrator right

profile_accent_color_id.description: Identifier of the accent color to use for profile; pass -1 if none. The chat must have at least profileAccentColor.min_supergroup_chat_boost_level for supergroups or profileAccentColor.min_channel_chat_boost_level for channels boost level to pass the corresponding color

profile_background_custom_emoji_id.description: Identifier of a custom emoji to be shown on the chat's profile photo background; 0 if none. Use chatBoostLevelFeatures.can_set_profile_background_custom_emoji to check whether a custom emoji can be set

setChatMessageAutoDeleteTime.description: Changes the message auto-delete or self-destruct (for secret chats) time in a chat. Requires change_info administrator right in basic groups, supergroups and channels. Message auto-delete time can't be changed in a chat with the current user (Saved Messages) and the chat 777000 (Telegram).

message_auto_delete_time.description: New time value, in seconds; unless the chat is secret, it must be from 0 up to 365 * 86400 and be divisible by 86400. If 0, then messages aren't deleted automatically

setChatEmojiStatus.description: Changes the emoji status of a chat. Use chatBoostLevelFeatures.can_set_emoji_status to check whether an emoji status can be set. Requires can_change_info administrator right

emoji_status.description: New emoji status; pass null to remove emoji status

setChatPermissions.description: Changes the chat members permissions. Supported only for basic groups and supergroups. Requires can_restrict_members administrator right

permissions.description: New non-administrator members permissions in the chat

setChatBackground.description: Sets the background in a specific chat. Supported only in private and secret chats with non-deleted users, and in chats with sufficient boost level and can_change_info administrator right

background.description: The input background to use; pass null to create a new filled or chat theme background

type.description: Background type; pass null to use default background type for the chosen background; backgroundTypeChatTheme isn't supported for private and secret chats. Use chatBoostLevelFeatures.chat_theme_background_count and chatBoostLevelFeatures.can_set_custom_background to check whether the background type can be set in the boosted chat

dark_theme_dimming.description: Dimming of the background in dark themes, as a percentage; 0-100. Applied only to Wallpaper and Fill types of background

only_for_self.description: Pass true to set background only for self; pass false to set background for all chat users. Always false for backgrounds set in boosted chats. Background can be set for both users only by Telegram Premium users and if set background isn't of the type inputBackgroundPrevious

deleteChatBackground.description: Deletes background in a specific chat

restore_previous.description: Pass true to restore previously set background. Can be used only in private and secret chats with non-deleted users if userFullInfo.set_chat_background == true. Supposed to be used from messageChatSetBackground messages with the currently set background that was set for both sides by the other user

setChatTheme.description: Changes the chat theme. Supported only in private and secret chats

theme_name.description: Name of the new chat theme; pass an empty string to return the default theme

setChatDraftMessage.description: Changes the draft message in a chat

message_thread_id.description: If not 0, the message thread identifier in which the draft was changed

draft_message.description: New draft message; pass null to remove the draft. All files in draft message content must be of the type inputFileLocal. Media thumbnails and captions are ignored

setChatNotificationSettings.description: Changes the notification settings of a chat. Notification settings of a chat with the current user (Saved Messages) can't be changed

notification_settings.description: New notification settings for the chat. If the chat is muted for more than 366 days, it is considered to be muted forever

toggleChatHasProtectedContent.description: Changes the ability of users to save, forward, or copy chat content. Supported only for basic groups, supergroups and channels. Requires owner privileges

toggleChatViewAsTopics.description: Changes the view_as_topics setting of a forum chat or Saved Messages

toggleChatIsTranslatable.description: Changes the translatable state of a chat

toggleChatIsMarkedAsUnread.description: Changes the marked as unread state of a chat

toggleChatDefaultDisableNotification.description: Changes the value of the default disable_notification parameter, used when a message is sent to a chat

setChatAvailableReactions.description: Changes reactions, available in a chat. Available for basic groups, supergroups, and channels. Requires can_change_info member right

available_reactions.description: Reactions available in the chat. All explicitly specified emoji reactions must be active. In channel chats up to the chat's boost level custom emoji reactions can be explicitly specified

setChatClientData.description: Changes application-specific data associated with a chat

setChatDescription.description: Changes information about a chat. Available for basic groups, supergroups, and channels. Requires can_change_info member right

setChatDiscussionGroup.description: Changes the discussion group of a channel chat; requires can_change_info administrator right in the channel if it is specified

chat_id.description: Identifier of the channel chat. Pass 0 to remove a link from the supergroup passed in the second argument to a linked channel chat (requires can_pin_messages member right in the supergroup)

discussion_chat_id.description: Identifier of a new channel's discussion group. Use 0 to remove the discussion group. Use the method getSuitableDiscussionChats to find all suitable groups. Basic group chats must be first upgraded to supergroup chats. If new chat members don't have access to old messages in the supergroup, then toggleSupergroupIsAllHistoryAvailable must be used first to change that

setChatDirectMessagesGroup.description: Changes direct messages group settings for a channel chat; requires owner privileges in the chat

is_enabled.description: Pass true if the direct messages group is enabled for the channel chat; pass false otherwise

paid_message_star_count.description: The new number of Telegram Stars that must be paid for each message that is sent to the direct messages chat unless the sender is an administrator of the channel chat; 0-getOption("paid_message_star_count_max"). The channel will receive getOption("paid_message_earnings_per_mille") Telegram Stars for each 1000 Telegram Stars paid for message sending. Requires supergroupFullInfo.can_enable_paid_messages for positive amounts

setChatLocation.description: Changes the location of a chat. Available only for some location-based supergroups, use supergroupFullInfo.can_set_location to check whether the method is allowed to use

location.description: New location for the chat; must be valid and not null

setChatSlowModeDelay.description: Changes the slow mode delay of a chat. Available only for supergroups; requires can_restrict_members right

slow_mode_delay.description: New slow mode delay for the chat, in seconds; must be one of 0, 10, 30, 60, 300, 900, 3600

pinChatMessage.description: Pins a message in a chat. A message can be pinned only if messageProperties.can_be_pinned

message_id.description: Identifier of the new pinned message

disable_notification.description: Pass true to disable notification about the pinned message. Notifications are always disabled in channels and private chats

only_for_self.description: Pass true to pin the message only for self; private chats only

unpinChatMessage.description: Removes a pinned message from a chat; requires can_pin_messages member right if the chat is a basic group or supergroup, or can_edit_messages administrator right if the chat is a channel

message_id.description: Identifier of the removed pinned message

unpinAllChatMessages.description: Removes all pinned messages from a chat; requires can_pin_messages member right if the chat is a basic group or supergroup, or can_edit_messages administrator right if the chat is a channel

unpinAllMessageThreadMessages.description: Removes all pinned messages from a forum topic; requires can_pin_messages member right in the supergroup

message_thread_id.description: Message thread identifier in which messages will be unpinned

joinChat.description: Adds the current user as a new member to a chat. Private and secret chats can't be joined using this method. May return an error with a message "INVITE_REQUEST_SENT" if only a join request was created

leaveChat.description: Removes the current user from chat members. Private and secret chats can't be left using this method

addChatMember.description: Adds a new member to a chat; requires can_invite_users member right. Members can't be added to private or secret chats. Returns information about members that weren't added

forward_limit.description: The number of earlier messages from the chat to be forwarded to the new member; up to 100. Ignored for supergroups and channels, or if the added user is a bot

addChatMembers.description: Adds multiple new members to a chat; requires can_invite_users member right. Currently, this method is only available for supergroups and channels. This method can't be used to join a chat. Members can't be added to a channel if it has more than 200 members. Returns information about members that weren't added

user_ids.description: Identifiers of the users to be added to the chat. The maximum number of added users is 20 for supergroups and 100 for channels

setChatMemberStatus.description: Changes the status of a chat member; requires can_invite_users member right to add a chat member, can_promote_members administrator right to change administrator rights of the member, and can_restrict_members administrator right to change restrictions of a user. This function is currently not suitable for transferring chat ownership; use transferChatOwnership instead. Use addChatMember or banChatMember if some additional parameters needs to be passed

member_id.description: Member identifier. Chats can be only banned and unbanned in supergroups and channels

status.description: The new status of the member in the chat

banChatMember.description: Bans a member in a chat; requires can_restrict_members administrator right. Members can't be banned in private or secret chats. In supergroups and channels, the user will not be able to return to the group on their own using invite links, etc., unless unbanned first

banned_until_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the user will be unbanned; 0 if never. If the user is banned for more than 366 days or for less than 30 seconds from the current time, the user is considered to be banned forever. Ignored in basic groups and if a chat is banned

revoke_messages.description: Pass true to delete all messages in the chat for the user that is being removed. Always true for supergroups and channels

canTransferOwnership.description: Checks whether the current session can be used to transfer a chat ownership to another user

transferChatOwnership.description: Changes the owner of a chat; requires owner privileges in the chat. Use the method canTransferOwnership to check whether the ownership can be transferred from the current session. Available only for supergroups and channel chats

user_id.description: Identifier of the user to which transfer the ownership. The ownership can't be transferred to a bot or to a deleted user

password.description: The 2-step verification password of the current user

getChatMember.description: Returns information about a single member of a chat

searchChatMembers.description: Searches for a specified query in the first name, last name and usernames of the members of a specified chat. Requires administrator rights if the chat is a channel

limit.description: The maximum number of users to be returned; up to 200

filter.description: The type of users to search for; pass null to search among all chat members

getChatAdministrators.description: Returns a list of administrators of the chat with their custom titles

clearAllDraftMessages.description: Clears message drafts in all chats

exclude_secret_chats.description: Pass true to keep local message drafts in secret chats

getSavedNotificationSound.description: Returns saved notification sound by its identifier. Returns a 404 error if there is no saved notification sound with the specified identifier

getSavedNotificationSounds.description: Returns the list of saved notification sounds. If a sound isn't in the list, then default sound needs to be used

addSavedNotificationSound.description: Adds a new notification sound to the list of saved notification sounds. The new notification sound is added to the top of the list. If it is already in the list, its position isn't changed

removeSavedNotificationSound.description: Removes a notification sound from the list of saved notification sounds

getChatNotificationSettingsExceptions.description: Returns the list of chats with non-default notification settings for new messages

scope.description: If specified, only chats from the scope will be returned; pass null to return chats from all scopes

compare_sound.description: Pass true to include in the response chats with only non-default sound

getScopeNotificationSettings.description: Returns the notification settings for chats of a given type

scope.description: Types of chats for which to return the notification settings information

setScopeNotificationSettings.description: Changes notification settings for chats of a given type

scope.description: Types of chats for which to change the notification settings

notification_settings.description: The new notification settings for the given scope
The new notification settings for reactions

resetAllNotificationSettings.description: Resets all chat and scope notification settings to their default values. By default, all chats are unmuted and message previews are shown

toggleChatIsPinned.description: Changes the pinned state of a chat. There can be up to getOption("pinned_chat_count_max")/getOption("pinned_archived_chat_count_max") pinned non-secret chats and the same number of secret chats in the main/archive chat list. The limit can be increased with Telegram Premium

chat_list.description: Chat list in which to change the pinned state of the chat

is_pinned.description: Pass true to pin the chat; pass false to unpin it

setPinnedChats.description: Changes the order of pinned chats

chat_list.description: Chat list in which to change the order of pinned chats

chat_ids.description: The new list of pinned chats

readChatList.description: Traverse all chats in a chat list and marks all messages in the chats as read

chat_list.description: Chat list in which to mark all chats as read

getCurrentWeather.description: Returns the current weather in the given location

location.description: The location

story_poster_chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat that posted the story

only_local.description: Pass true to get only locally available information without sending network requests

getChatsToPostStories.description: Returns supergroup and channel chats in which the current user has the right to post stories. The chats must be rechecked with canPostStory before actually trying to post a story there

canPostStory.description: Checks whether the current user can post a story on behalf of a chat; requires can_post_stories right for supergroup and channel chats

chat_id.description: Chat identifier. Pass Saved Messages chat identifier when posting a story on behalf of the current user

postStory.description: Posts a new story on behalf of a chat; requires can_post_stories right for supergroup and channel chats. Returns a temporary story

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat that will post the story. Pass Saved Messages chat identifier when posting a story on behalf of the current user

areas.description: Clickable rectangle areas to be shown on the story media; pass null if none

caption.description: Story caption; pass null to use an empty caption; 0-getOption("story_caption_length_max") characters; can have entities only if getOption("can_use_text_entities_in_story_caption")

privacy_settings.description: The privacy settings for the story; ignored for stories posted on behalf of supergroup and channel chats

active_period.description: Period after which the story is moved to archive, in seconds; must be one of 6 * 3600, 12 * 3600, 86400, or 2 * 86400 for Telegram Premium users, and 86400 otherwise

from_story_full_id.description: Full identifier of the original story, which content was used to create the story; pass null if the story isn't repost of another story

is_posted_to_chat_page.description: Pass true to keep the story accessible after expiration

protect_content.description: Pass true if the content of the story must be protected from forwarding and screenshotting

editStory.description: Changes content and caption of a story. Can be called only if story.can_be_edited == true

story_poster_chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat that posted the story

story_id.description: Identifier of the story to edit

content.description: New content of the story; pass null to keep the current content

areas.description: New clickable rectangle areas to be shown on the story media; pass null to keep the current areas. Areas can't be edited if story content isn't changed

caption.description: New story caption; pass null to keep the current caption

editStoryCover.description: Changes cover of a video story. Can be called only if story.can_be_edited == true and the story isn't being edited now

story_poster_chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat that posted the story

story_id.description: Identifier of the story to edit

cover_frame_timestamp.description: New timestamp of the frame, which will be used as video thumbnail

setStoryPrivacySettings.description: Changes privacy settings of a story. The method can be called only for stories posted on behalf of the current user and if story.can_be_edited == true

privacy_settings.description: The new privacy settings for the story

toggleStoryIsPostedToChatPage.description: Toggles whether a story is accessible after expiration. Can be called only if story.can_toggle_is_posted_to_chat_page == true

story_poster_chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat that posted the story

is_posted_to_chat_page.description: Pass true to make the story accessible after expiration; pass false to make it private

deleteStory.description: Deletes a previously posted story. Can be called only if story.can_be_deleted == true

story_poster_chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat that posted the story

story_id.description: Identifier of the story to delete

getStoryNotificationSettingsExceptions.description: Returns the list of chats with non-default notification settings for stories

loadActiveStories.description: Loads more active stories from a story list. The loaded stories will be sent through updates. Active stories are sorted by the pair (active_stories.order, active_stories.story_poster_chat_id) in descending order. Returns a 404 error if all active stories have been loaded

story_list.description: The story list in which to load active stories

setChatActiveStoriesList.description: Changes story list in which stories from the chat are shown

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat that posted stories

story_list.description: New list for active stories posted by the chat

getChatActiveStories.description: Returns the list of active stories posted by the given chat

getChatPostedToChatPageStories.description: Returns the list of stories that posted by the given chat to its chat page. If from_story_id == 0, then pinned stories are returned first. Then, stories are returned in reverse chronological order (i.e., in order of decreasing story_id). For optimal performance, the number of returned stories is chosen by TDLib

from_story_id.description: Identifier of the story starting from which stories must be returned; use 0 to get results from pinned and the newest story

limit.description: The maximum number of stories to be returned. For optimal performance, the number of returned stories is chosen by TDLib and can be smaller than the specified limit

getChatArchivedStories.description: Returns the list of all stories posted by the given chat; requires can_edit_stories right in the chat. The stories are returned in reverse chronological order (i.e., in order of decreasing story_id). For optimal performance, the number of returned stories is chosen by TDLib

from_story_id.description: Identifier of the story starting from which stories must be returned; use 0 to get results from the last story

limit.description: The maximum number of stories to be returned. For optimal performance, the number of returned stories is chosen by TDLib and can be smaller than the specified limit

setChatPinnedStories.description: Changes the list of pinned stories on a chat page; requires can_edit_stories right in the chat

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat that posted the stories

story_ids.description: New list of pinned stories. All stories must be posted to the chat page first. There can be up to getOption("pinned_story_count_max") pinned stories on a chat page

openStory.description: Informs TDLib that a story is opened and is being viewed by the user

story_poster_chat_id.description: The identifier of the chat that posted the opened story

closeStory.description: Informs TDLib that a story is closed by the user

story_poster_chat_id.description: The identifier of the poster of the story to close

getStoryAvailableReactions.description: Returns reactions, which can be chosen for a story

setStoryReaction.description: Changes chosen reaction on a story that has already been sent

story_poster_chat_id.description: The identifier of the poster of the story

reaction_type.description: Type of the reaction to set; pass null to remove the reaction. Custom emoji reactions can be used only by Telegram Premium users. Paid reactions can't be set

update_recent_reactions.description: Pass true if the reaction needs to be added to recent reactions

getStoryInteractions.description: Returns interactions with a story. The method can be called only for stories posted on behalf of the current user

query.description: Query to search for in names, usernames and titles; may be empty to get all relevant interactions

only_contacts.description: Pass true to get only interactions by contacts; pass false to get all relevant interactions

prefer_forwards.description: Pass true to get forwards and reposts first, then reactions, then other views; pass false to get interactions sorted just by interaction date

prefer_with_reaction.description: Pass true to get interactions with reaction first; pass false to get interactions sorted just by interaction date. Ignored if prefer_forwards == true

offset.description: Offset of the first entry to return as received from the previous request; use empty string to get the first chunk of results

limit.description: The maximum number of story interactions to return

getChatStoryInteractions.description: Returns interactions with a story posted in a chat. Can be used only if story is posted on behalf of a chat and the user is an administrator in the chat

story_poster_chat_id.description: The identifier of the poster of the story

reaction_type.description: Pass the default heart reaction or a suggested reaction type to receive only interactions with the specified reaction type; pass null to receive all interactions; reactionTypePaid isn't supported

prefer_forwards.description: Pass true to get forwards and reposts first, then reactions, then other views; pass false to get interactions sorted just by interaction date
