offset.description: Offset of the first entry to return as received from the previous request; use empty string to get the first chunk of results

limit.description: The maximum number of story interactions to return

reportStory.description: Reports a story to the Telegram moderators

story_poster_chat_id.description: The identifier of the poster of the story to report

story_id.description: The identifier of the story to report

option_id.description: Option identifier chosen by the user; leave empty for the initial request

text.description: Additional report details; 0-1024 characters; leave empty for the initial request

activateStoryStealthMode.description: Activates stealth mode for stories, which hides all views of stories from the current user in the last "story_stealth_mode_past_period" seconds and for the next "story_stealth_mode_future_period" seconds; for Telegram Premium users only

getStoryPublicForwards.description: Returns forwards of a story as a message to public chats and reposts by public channels. Can be used only if the story is posted on behalf of the current user or story.can_get_statistics == true. For optimal performance, the number of returned messages and stories is chosen by TDLib

story_poster_chat_id.description: The identifier of the poster of the story

offset.description: Offset of the first entry to return as received from the previous request; use empty string to get the first chunk of results

limit.description: The maximum number of messages and stories to be returned; must be positive and can't be greater than 100. For optimal performance, the number of returned objects is chosen by TDLib and can be smaller than the specified limit

getChatBoostLevelFeatures.description: Returns the list of features available on the specific chat boost level. This is an offline method

is_channel.description: Pass true to get the list of features for channels; pass false to get the list of features for supergroups

getChatBoostFeatures.description: Returns the list of features available for different chat boost levels. This is an offline method

is_channel.description: Pass true to get the list of features for channels; pass false to get the list of features for supergroups

getAvailableChatBoostSlots.description: Returns the list of available chat boost slots for the current user

getChatBoostStatus.description: Returns the current boost status for a supergroup or a channel chat

boostChat.description: Boosts a chat and returns the list of available chat boost slots for the current user after the boost

slot_ids.description: Identifiers of boost slots of the current user from which to apply boosts to the chat

getChatBoostLink.description: Returns an HTTPS link to boost the specified supergroup or channel chat

getChatBoostLinkInfo.description: Returns information about a link to boost a chat. Can be called for any internal link of the type internalLinkTypeChatBoost

url.description: The link to boost a chat

getChatBoosts.description: Returns the list of boosts applied to a chat; requires administrator rights in the chat

only_gift_codes.description: Pass true to receive only boosts received from gift codes and giveaways created by the chat

offset.description: Offset of the first entry to return as received from the previous request; use empty string to get the first chunk of results

limit.description: The maximum number of boosts to be returned; up to 100. For optimal performance, the number of returned boosts can be smaller than the specified limit

getUserChatBoosts.description: Returns the list of boosts applied to a chat by a given user; requires administrator rights in the chat; for bots only

getAttachmentMenuBot.description: Returns information about a bot that can be added to attachment or side menu

bot_user_id.description: Bot's user identifier

toggleBotIsAddedToAttachmentMenu.description: Adds or removes a bot to attachment and side menu. Bot can be added to the menu, only if userTypeBot.can_be_added_to_attachment_menu == true

bot_user_id.description: Bot's user identifier

is_added.description: Pass true to add the bot to attachment menu; pass false to remove the bot from attachment menu

allow_write_access.description: Pass true if the current user allowed the bot to send them messages. Ignored if is_added is false

getThemedEmojiStatuses.description: Returns up to 8 emoji statuses, which must be shown right after the default Premium Badge in the emoji status list for self status

getRecentEmojiStatuses.description: Returns recent emoji statuses for self status

getUpgradedGiftEmojiStatuses.description: Returns available upgraded gift emoji statuses for self status

getDefaultEmojiStatuses.description: Returns default emoji statuses for self status

clearRecentEmojiStatuses.description: Clears the list of recently used emoji statuses for self status

getThemedChatEmojiStatuses.description: Returns up to 8 emoji statuses, which must be shown in the emoji status list for chats

getDefaultChatEmojiStatuses.description: Returns default emoji statuses for chats

getDisallowedChatEmojiStatuses.description: Returns the list of emoji statuses, which can't be used as chat emoji status, even they are from a sticker set with is_allowed_as_chat_emoji_status == true

downloadFile.description: Downloads a file from the cloud. Download progress and completion of the download will be notified through updateFile updates

file_id.description: Identifier of the file to download

priority.description: Priority of the download (1-32). The higher the priority, the earlier the file will be downloaded. If the priorities of two files are equal, then the last one for which downloadFile/addFileToDownloads was called will be downloaded first

offset.description: The starting position from which the file needs to be downloaded

limit.description: Number of bytes which need to be downloaded starting from the "offset" position before the download will automatically be canceled; use 0 to download without a limit

synchronous.description: Pass true to return response only after the file download has succeeded, has failed, has been canceled, or a new downloadFile request with different offset/limit parameters was sent; pass false to return file state immediately, just after the download has been started

getFileDownloadedPrefixSize.description: Returns file downloaded prefix size from a given offset, in bytes

offset.description: Offset from which downloaded prefix size needs to be calculated

cancelDownloadFile.description: Stops the downloading of a file. If a file has already been downloaded, does nothing

file_id.description: Identifier of a file to stop downloading

only_if_pending.description: Pass true to stop downloading only if it hasn't been started, i.e. request hasn't been sent to server

getSuggestedFileName.description: Returns suggested name for saving a file in a given directory

directory.description: Directory in which the file is expected to be saved

preliminaryUploadFile.description: Preliminary uploads a file to the cloud before sending it in a message, which can be useful for uploading of being recorded voice and video notes. In all other cases there is no need to preliminary upload a file. Updates updateFile will be used to notify about upload progress. The upload will not be completed until the file is sent in a message

file_type.description: File type; pass null if unknown

priority.description: Priority of the upload (1-32). The higher the priority, the earlier the file will be uploaded. If the priorities of two files are equal, then the first one for which preliminaryUploadFile was called will be uploaded first

cancelPreliminaryUploadFile.description: Stops the preliminary uploading of a file. Supported only for files uploaded by using preliminaryUploadFile

file_id.description: Identifier of the file to stop uploading

writeGeneratedFilePart.description: Writes a part of a generated file. This method is intended to be used only if the application has no direct access to TDLib's file system, because it is usually slower than a direct write to the destination file

generation_id.description: The identifier of the generation process

offset.description: The offset from which to write the data to the file

setFileGenerationProgress.description: Informs TDLib on a file generation progress

generation_id.description: The identifier of the generation process

expected_size.description: Expected size of the generated file, in bytes; 0 if unknown

local_prefix_size.description: The number of bytes already generated

generation_id.description: The identifier of the generation process

error.description: If passed, the file generation has failed and must be terminated; pass null if the file generation succeeded

readFilePart.description: Reads a part of a file from the TDLib file cache and returns read bytes. This method is intended to be used only if the application has no direct access to TDLib's file system, because it is usually slower than a direct read from the file

file_id.description: Identifier of the file. The file must be located in the TDLib file cache

offset.description: The offset from which to read the file

count.description: Number of bytes to read. An error will be returned if there are not enough bytes available in the file from the specified position. Pass 0 to read all available data from the specified position

deleteFile.description: Deletes a file from the TDLib file cache

file_id.description: Identifier of the file to delete

addFileToDownloads.description: Adds a file from a message to the list of file downloads. Download progress and completion of the download will be notified through updateFile updates. If message database is used, the list of file downloads is persistent across application restarts. The downloading is independent of download using downloadFile, i.e. it continues if downloadFile is canceled or is used to download a part of the file

file_id.description: Identifier of the file to download

chat_id.description: Chat identifier of the message with the file

priority.description: Priority of the download (1-32). The higher the priority, the earlier the file will be downloaded. If the priorities of two files are equal, then the last one for which downloadFile/addFileToDownloads was called will be downloaded first

toggleDownloadIsPaused.description: Changes pause state of a file in the file download list

is_paused.description: Pass true if the download is paused

toggleAllDownloadsArePaused.description: Changes pause state of all files in the file download list

are_paused.description: Pass true to pause all downloads; pass false to unpause them

removeFileFromDownloads.description: Removes a file from the file download list

delete_from_cache.description: Pass true to delete the file from the TDLib file cache

removeAllFilesFromDownloads.description: Removes all files from the file download list

only_active.description: Pass true to remove only active downloads, including paused

only_completed.description: Pass true to remove only completed downloads

delete_from_cache.description: Pass true to delete the file from the TDLib file cache

searchFileDownloads.description: Searches for files in the file download list or recently downloaded files from the list

query.description: Query to search for; may be empty to return all downloaded files

only_active.description: Pass true to search only for active downloads, including paused

only_completed.description: Pass true to search only for completed downloads

offset.description: Offset of the first entry to return as received from the previous request; use empty string to get the first chunk of results

limit.description: The maximum number of files to be returned

setApplicationVerificationToken.description: Application or reCAPTCHA verification has been completed. Can be called before authorization

verification_id.description: Unique identifier for the verification process as received from updateApplicationVerificationRequired or updateApplicationRecaptchaVerificationRequired

token.description: Play Integrity API token for the Android application, or secret from push notification for the iOS application for application verification, or reCAPTCHA token for reCAPTCHA verifications; pass an empty string to abort verification and receive the error "VERIFICATION_FAILED" for the request

getMessageFileType.description: Returns information about a file with messages exported from another application

message_file_head.description: Beginning of the message file; up to 100 first lines

getMessageImportConfirmationText.description: Returns a confirmation text to be shown to the user before starting message import

chat_id.description: Identifier of a chat to which the messages will be imported. It must be an identifier of a private chat with a mutual contact or an identifier of a supergroup chat with can_change_info member right

importMessages.description: Imports messages exported from another app

chat_id.description: Identifier of a chat to which the messages will be imported. It must be an identifier of a private chat with a mutual contact or an identifier of a supergroup chat with can_change_info member right

message_file.description: File with messages to import. Only inputFileLocal and inputFileGenerated are supported. The file must not be previously uploaded

attached_files.description: Files used in the imported messages. Only inputFileLocal and inputFileGenerated are supported. The files must not be previously uploaded

replacePrimaryChatInviteLink.description: Replaces current primary invite link for a chat with a new primary invite link. Available for basic groups, supergroups, and channels. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right

createChatInviteLink.description: Creates a new invite link for a chat. Available for basic groups, supergroups, and channels. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat

expiration_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the link will expire; pass 0 if never

member_limit.description: The maximum number of chat members that can join the chat via the link simultaneously; 0-99999; pass 0 if not limited

creates_join_request.description: Pass true if users joining the chat via the link need to be approved by chat administrators. In this case, member_limit must be 0

createChatSubscriptionInviteLink.description: Creates a new subscription invite link for a channel chat. Requires can_invite_users right in the chat

subscription_pricing.description: Information about subscription plan that will be applied to the users joining the chat via the link. Subscription period must be 2592000 in production environment, and 60 or 300 if Telegram test environment is used

editChatInviteLink.description: Edits a non-primary invite link for a chat. Available for basic groups, supergroups, and channels. If the link creates a subscription, then expiration_date, member_limit and creates_join_request must not be used. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat for own links and owner privileges for other links

invite_link.description: Invite link to be edited

expiration_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the link will expire; pass 0 if never

member_limit.description: The maximum number of chat members that can join the chat via the link simultaneously; 0-99999; pass 0 if not limited

creates_join_request.description: Pass true if users joining the chat via the link need to be approved by chat administrators. In this case, member_limit must be 0

editChatSubscriptionInviteLink.description: Edits a subscription invite link for a channel chat. Requires can_invite_users right in the chat for own links and owner privileges for other links

invite_link.description: Invite link to be edited

getChatInviteLink.description: Returns information about an invite link. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat to get own links and owner privileges to get other links

invite_link.description: Invite link to get

getChatInviteLinkCounts.description: Returns the list of chat administrators with number of their invite links. Requires owner privileges in the chat

getChatInviteLinks.description: Returns invite links for a chat created by specified administrator. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat to get own links and owner privileges to get other links

creator_user_id.description: User identifier of a chat administrator. Must be an identifier of the current user for non-owner

is_revoked.description: Pass true if revoked links needs to be returned instead of active or expired

offset_date.description: Creation date of an invite link starting after which to return invite links; use 0 to get results from the beginning

offset_invite_link.description: Invite link starting after which to return invite links; use empty string to get results from the beginning

limit.description: The maximum number of invite links to return; up to 100

getChatInviteLinkMembers.description: Returns chat members joined a chat via an invite link. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat for own links and owner privileges for other links

invite_link.description: Invite link for which to return chat members

only_with_expired_subscription.description: Pass true if the link is a subscription link and only members with expired subscription must be returned

offset_member.description: A chat member from which to return next chat members; pass null to get results from the beginning

limit.description: The maximum number of chat members to return; up to 100

revokeChatInviteLink.description: Revokes invite link for a chat. Available for basic groups, supergroups, and channels. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat for own links and owner privileges for other links. If a primary link is revoked, then additionally to the revoked link returns new primary link

invite_link.description: Invite link to be revoked

deleteRevokedChatInviteLink.description: Deletes revoked chat invite links. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat for own links and owner privileges for other links

invite_link.description: Invite link to revoke

deleteAllRevokedChatInviteLinks.description: Deletes all revoked chat invite links created by a given chat administrator. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat for own links and owner privileges for other links

creator_user_id.description: User identifier of a chat administrator, which links will be deleted. Must be an identifier of the current user for non-owner

checkChatInviteLink.description: Checks the validity of an invite link for a chat and returns information about the corresponding chat

invite_link.description: Invite link to be checked

joinChatByInviteLink.description: Uses an invite link to add the current user to the chat if possible. May return an error with a message "INVITE_REQUEST_SENT" if only a join request was created

invite_link.description: Invite link to use

getChatJoinRequests.description: Returns pending join requests in a chat

invite_link.description: Invite link for which to return join requests. If empty, all join requests will be returned. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat for own links and owner privileges for other links

query.description: A query to search for in the first names, last names and usernames of the users to return

offset_request.description: A chat join request from which to return next requests; pass null to get results from the beginning

limit.description: The maximum number of requests to join the chat to return

processChatJoinRequest.description: Handles a pending join request in a chat

user_id.description: Identifier of the user that sent the request

approve.description: Pass true to approve the request; pass false to decline it

processChatJoinRequests.description: Handles all pending join requests for a given link in a chat

invite_link.description: Invite link for which to process join requests. If empty, all join requests will be processed. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat for own links and owner privileges for other links

approve.description: Pass true to approve all requests; pass false to decline them

user_id.description: Identifier of the user to be called

protocol.description: The call protocols supported by the application

is_video.description: Pass true to create a video call

protocol.description: The call protocols supported by the application

is_disconnected.description: Pass true if the user was disconnected

invite_link.description: If the call was upgraded to a group call, pass invite link to the group call

duration.description: The call duration, in seconds

is_video.description: Pass true if the call was a video call

connection_id.description: Identifier of the connection used during the call

comment.description: An optional user comment if the rating is less than 5

problems.description: List of the exact types of problems with the call, specified by the user

sendCallDebugInformation.description: Sends debug information for a call to Telegram servers

sendCallLog.description: Sends log file for a call to Telegram servers

log_file.description: Call log file. Only inputFileLocal and inputFileGenerated are supported

getVideoChatAvailableParticipants.description: Returns the list of participant identifiers, on whose behalf a video chat in the chat can be joined

setVideoChatDefaultParticipant.description: Changes default participant identifier, on whose behalf a video chat in the chat will be joined

default_participant_id.description: Default group call participant identifier to join the video chats

createVideoChat.description: Creates a video chat (a group call bound to a chat). Available only for basic groups, supergroups and channels; requires can_manage_video_chats administrator right

chat_id.description: Identifier of a chat in which the video chat will be created

title.description: Group call title; if empty, chat title will be used

start_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the group call is expected to be started by an administrator; 0 to start the video chat immediately. The date must be at least 10 seconds and at most 8 days in the future

is_rtmp_stream.description: Pass true to create an RTMP stream instead of an ordinary video chat

createGroupCall.description: Creates a new group call that isn't bound to a chat

join_parameters.description: Parameters to join the call; pass null to only create call link without joining the call

getVideoChatRtmpUrl.description: Returns RTMP URL for streaming to the video chat of a chat; requires can_manage_video_chats administrator right

replaceVideoChatRtmpUrl.description: Replaces the current RTMP URL for streaming to the video chat of a chat; requires owner privileges in the chat

getGroupCall.description: Returns information about a group call

group_call_id.description: Group call identifier of the video chat

toggleVideoChatEnabledStartNotification.description: Toggles whether the current user will receive a notification when the video chat starts; for scheduled video chats only

enabled_start_notification.description: New value of the enabled_start_notification setting

joinGroupCall.description: Joins a group call that is not bound to a chat

joinVideoChat.description: Joins an active video chat. Returns join response payload for tgcalls

participant_id.description: Identifier of a group call participant, which will be used to join the call; pass null to join as self; video chats only

invite_hash.description: Invite hash as received from internalLinkTypeVideoChat

startGroupCallScreenSharing.description: Starts screen sharing in a joined group call. Returns join response payload for tgcalls

audio_source_id.description: Screen sharing audio channel synchronization source identifier; received from tgcalls

payload.description: Group call join payload; received from tgcalls

toggleGroupCallScreenSharingIsPaused.description: Pauses or unpauses screen sharing in a joined group call

is_paused.description: Pass true to pause screen sharing; pass false to unpause it

endGroupCallScreenSharing.description: Ends screen sharing in a joined group call

setVideoChatTitle.description: Sets title of a video chat; requires groupCall.can_be_managed right

toggleVideoChatMuteNewParticipants.description: Toggles whether new participants of a video chat can be unmuted only by administrators of the video chat. Requires groupCall.can_toggle_mute_new_participants right

mute_new_participants.description: New value of the mute_new_participants setting

inviteGroupCallParticipant.description: Invites a user to an active group call; for group calls not bound to a chat only. Sends a service message of the type messageGroupCall. The group call can have at most getOption("group_call_participant_count_max") participants

is_video.description: Pass true if the group call is a video call

declineGroupCallInvitation.description: Declines an invitation to an active group call via messageGroupCall. Can be called both by the sender and the receiver of the invitation

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat with the message

message_id.description: Identifier of the message of the type messageGroupCall

banGroupCallParticipants.description: Bans users from a group call not bound to a chat; requires groupCall.is_owned. Only the owner of the group call can invite the banned users back

user_ids.description: Identifiers of group call participants to ban; identifiers of unknown users from the update updateGroupCallParticipants can be also passed to the method

inviteVideoChatParticipants.description: Invites users to an active video chat. Sends a service message of the type messageInviteVideoChatParticipants to the chat bound to the group call

user_ids.description: User identifiers. At most 10 users can be invited simultaneously

getVideoChatInviteLink.description: Returns invite link to a video chat in a public chat

can_self_unmute.description: Pass true if the invite link needs to contain an invite hash, passing which to joinVideoChat would allow the invited user to unmute themselves. Requires groupCall.can_be_managed right

revokeGroupCallInviteLink.description: Revokes invite link for a group call. Requires groupCall.can_be_managed right for video chats or groupCall.is_owned otherwise

startGroupCallRecording.description: Starts recording of an active group call; for video chats only. Requires groupCall.can_be_managed right

record_video.description: Pass true to record a video file instead of an audio file

use_portrait_orientation.description: Pass true to use portrait orientation for video instead of landscape one

endGroupCallRecording.description: Ends recording of an active group call; for video chats only. Requires groupCall.can_be_managed right

toggleGroupCallIsMyVideoPaused.description: Toggles whether current user's video is paused

is_my_video_paused.description: Pass true if the current user's video is paused

toggleGroupCallIsMyVideoEnabled.description: Toggles whether current user's video is enabled

is_my_video_enabled.description: Pass true if the current user's video is enabled

setGroupCallParticipantIsSpeaking.description: Informs TDLib that speaking state of a participant of an active group call has changed. Returns identifier of the participant if it is found

audio_source.description: Group call participant's synchronization audio source identifier, or 0 for the current user

is_speaking.description: Pass true if the user is speaking

toggleGroupCallParticipantIsMuted.description: Toggles whether a participant of an active group call is muted, unmuted, or allowed to unmute themselves

is_muted.description: Pass true to mute the user; pass false to unmute them

setGroupCallParticipantVolumeLevel.description: Changes volume level of a participant of an active group call. If the current user can manage the group call or is the owner of the group call, then the participant's volume level will be changed for all users with the default volume level

volume_level.description: New participant's volume level; 1-20000 in hundreds of percents

toggleGroupCallParticipantIsHandRaised.description: Toggles whether a group call participant hand is rased; for video chats only

is_hand_raised.description: Pass true if the user's hand needs to be raised. Only self hand can be raised. Requires groupCall.can_be_managed right to lower other's hand

getGroupCallParticipants.description: Returns information about participants of a non-joined group call that is not bound to a chat

input_group_call.description: The group call which participants will be returned

limit.description: The maximum number of participants to return; must be positive

loadGroupCallParticipants.description: Loads more participants of a group call. The loaded participants will be received through updates. Use the field groupCall.loaded_all_participants to check whether all participants have already been loaded

group_call_id.description: Group call identifier. The group call must be previously received through getGroupCall and must be joined or being joined

limit.description: The maximum number of participants to load; up to 100

endGroupCall.description: Ends a group call. Requires groupCall.can_be_managed right for video chats or groupCall.is_owned otherwise

getVideoChatStreams.description: Returns information about available video chat streams

getVideoChatStreamSegment.description: Returns a file with a segment of a video chat stream in a modified OGG format for audio or MPEG-4 format for video

time_offset.description: Point in time when the stream segment begins; Unix timestamp in milliseconds

scale.description: Segment duration scale; 0-1. Segment's duration is 1000/(2**scale) milliseconds

channel_id.description: Identifier of an audio/video channel to get as received from tgcalls

video_quality.description: Video quality as received from tgcalls; pass null to get the worst available quality

encryptGroupCallData.description: Encrypts group call data before sending them over network using tgcalls

group_call_id.description: Group call identifier. The call must not be a video chat

data_channel.description: Data channel for which data is encrypted

unencrypted_prefix_size.description: Size of data prefix that must be kept unencrypted

decryptGroupCallData.description: Decrypts group call data received by tgcalls

group_call_id.description: Group call identifier. The call must not be a video chat

participant_id.description: Identifier of the group call participant, which sent the data

data_channel.description: Data channel for which data was encrypted; pass null if unknown

setMessageSenderBlockList.description: Changes the block list of a message sender. Currently, only users and supergroup chats can be blocked

sender_id.description: Identifier of a message sender to block/unblock

block_list.description: New block list for the message sender; pass null to unblock the message sender

blockMessageSenderFromReplies.description: Blocks an original sender of a message in the Replies chat

message_id.description: The identifier of an incoming message in the Replies chat

delete_message.description: Pass true to delete the message

delete_all_messages.description: Pass true to delete all messages from the same sender

report_spam.description: Pass true to report the sender to the Telegram moderators

getBlockedMessageSenders.description: Returns users and chats that were blocked by the current user

block_list.description: Block list from which to return users

offset.description: Number of users and chats to skip in the result; must be non-negative

limit.description: The maximum number of users and chats to return; up to 100

addContact.description: Adds a user to the contact list or edits an existing contact by their user identifier

contact.description: The contact to add or edit; phone number may be empty and needs to be specified only if known, vCard is ignored

share_phone_number.description: Pass true to share the current user's phone number with the new contact. A corresponding rule to userPrivacySettingShowPhoneNumber will be added if needed. Use the field userFullInfo.need_phone_number_privacy_exception to check whether the current user needs to be asked to share their phone number

importContacts.description: Adds new contacts or edits existing contacts by their phone numbers; contacts' user identifiers are ignored

contacts.description: The list of contacts to import or edit; contacts' vCard are ignored and are not imported

getContacts.description: Returns all contacts of the user

searchContacts.description: Searches for the specified query in the first names, last names and usernames of the known user contacts

query.description: Query to search for; may be empty to return all contacts

limit.description: The maximum number of users to be returned

removeContacts.description: Removes users from the contact list

user_ids.description: Identifiers of users to be deleted

getImportedContactCount.description: Returns the total number of imported contacts

changeImportedContacts.description: Changes imported contacts using the list of contacts saved on the device. Imports newly added contacts and, if at least the file database is enabled, deletes recently deleted contacts. Query result depends on the result of the previous query, so only one query is possible at the same time

contacts.description: The new list of contacts, contact's vCard are ignored and are not imported

clearImportedContacts.description: Clears all imported contacts, contact list remains unchanged

setCloseFriends.description: Changes the list of close friends of the current user

user_ids.description: User identifiers of close friends; the users must be contacts of the current user

getCloseFriends.description: Returns all close friends of the current user

setUserPersonalProfilePhoto.description: Changes a personal profile photo of a contact user

photo.description: Profile photo to set; pass null to delete the photo; inputChatPhotoPrevious isn't supported in this function

suggestUserProfilePhoto.description: Suggests a profile photo to another regular user with common messages and allowing non-paid messages

photo.description: Profile photo to suggest; inputChatPhotoPrevious isn't supported in this function

toggleBotCanManageEmojiStatus.description: Toggles whether the bot can manage emoji status of the current user

bot_user_id.description: User identifier of the bot

can_manage_emoji_status.description: Pass true if the bot is allowed to change emoji status of the user; pass false otherwise

setUserEmojiStatus.description: Changes the emoji status of a user; for bots only

emoji_status.description: New emoji status; pass null to switch to the default badge

searchUserByPhoneNumber.description: Searches a user by their phone number. Returns a 404 error if the user can't be found

only_local.description: Pass true to get only locally available information without sending network requests

sharePhoneNumber.description: Shares the phone number of the current user with a mutual contact. Supposed to be called when the user clicks on chatActionBarSharePhoneNumber

user_id.description: Identifier of the user with whom to share the phone number. The user must be a mutual contact

getUserProfilePhotos.description: Returns the profile photos of a user. Personal and public photo aren't returned

offset.description: The number of photos to skip; must be non-negative

limit.description: The maximum number of photos to be returned; up to 100

getStickerOutline.description: Returns outline of a sticker. This is an offline method. Returns a 404 error if the outline isn't known

for_animated_emoji.description: Pass true to get the outline scaled for animated emoji

for_clicked_animated_emoji_message.description: Pass true to get the outline scaled for clicked animated emoji message

getStickers.description: Returns stickers from the installed sticker sets that correspond to any of the given emoji or can be found by sticker-specific keywords. If the query is non-empty, then favorite, recently used or trending stickers may also be returned

sticker_type.description: Type of the stickers to return

query.description: Search query; a space-separated list of emojis or a keyword prefix. If empty, returns all known installed stickers

limit.description: The maximum number of stickers to be returned

chat_id.description: Chat identifier for which to return stickers. Available custom emoji stickers may be different for different chats

getAllStickerEmojis.description: Returns unique emoji that correspond to stickers to be found by the getStickers(sticker_type, query, 1000000, chat_id)

sticker_type.description: Type of the stickers to search for

chat_id.description: Chat identifier for which to find stickers

return_only_main_emoji.description: Pass true if only main emoji for each found sticker must be included in the result

searchStickers.description: Searches for stickers from public sticker sets that correspond to any of the given emoji

sticker_type.description: Type of the stickers to return

emojis.description: Space-separated list of emojis to search for

query.description: Query to search for; may be empty to search for emoji only

input_language_codes.description: List of possible IETF language tags of the user's input language; may be empty if unknown

offset.description: The offset from which to return the stickers; must be non-negative

limit.description: The maximum number of stickers to be returned; 0-100

getGreetingStickers.description: Returns greeting stickers from regular sticker sets that can be used for the start page of other users

getPremiumStickers.description: Returns premium stickers from regular sticker sets

limit.description: The maximum number of stickers to be returned; 0-100

getInstalledStickerSets.description: Returns a list of installed sticker sets

sticker_type.description: Type of the sticker sets to return

getArchivedStickerSets.description: Returns a list of archived sticker sets

sticker_type.description: Type of the sticker sets to return

offset_sticker_set_id.description: Identifier of the sticker set from which to return the result; use 0 to get results from the beginning

limit.description: The maximum number of sticker sets to return; up to 100

getTrendingStickerSets.description: Returns a list of trending sticker sets. For optimal performance, the number of returned sticker sets is chosen by TDLib

sticker_type.description: Type of the sticker sets to return

offset.description: The offset from which to return the sticker sets; must be non-negative

limit.description: The maximum number of sticker sets to be returned; up to 100. For optimal performance, the number of returned sticker sets is chosen by TDLib and can be smaller than the specified limit, even if the end of the list has not been reached

getAttachedStickerSets.description: Returns a list of sticker sets attached to a file, including regular, mask, and emoji sticker sets. Currently, only animations, photos, and videos can have attached sticker sets

getStickerSet.description: Returns information about a sticker set by its identifier

getStickerSetName.description: Returns name of a sticker set by its identifier

searchStickerSet.description: Searches for a sticker set by its name

ignore_cache.description: Pass true to ignore local cache of sticker sets and always send a network request

searchInstalledStickerSets.description: Searches for installed sticker sets by looking for specified query in their title and name

sticker_type.description: Type of the sticker sets to search for

limit.description: The maximum number of sticker sets to return

searchStickerSets.description: Searches for sticker sets by looking for specified query in their title and name. Excludes installed sticker sets from the results

sticker_type.description: Type of the sticker sets to return

changeStickerSet.description: Installs/uninstalls or activates/archives a sticker set

is_archived.description: The new value of is_archived. A sticker set can't be installed and archived simultaneously

viewTrendingStickerSets.description: Informs the server that some trending sticker sets have been viewed by the user

sticker_set_ids.description: Identifiers of viewed trending sticker sets

reorderInstalledStickerSets.description: Changes the order of installed sticker sets

sticker_type.description: Type of the sticker sets to reorder

sticker_set_ids.description: Identifiers of installed sticker sets in the new correct order

getRecentStickers.description: Returns a list of recently used stickers

is_attached.description: Pass true to return stickers and masks that were recently attached to photos or video files; pass false to return recently sent stickers

addRecentSticker.description: Manually adds a new sticker to the list of recently used stickers. The new sticker is added to the top of the list. If the sticker was already in the list, it is removed from the list first. Only stickers belonging to a sticker set or in WEBP or WEBM format can be added to this list. Emoji stickers can't be added to recent stickers

is_attached.description: Pass true to add the sticker to the list of stickers recently attached to photo or video files; pass false to add the sticker to the list of recently sent stickers

sticker.description: Sticker file to add

removeRecentSticker.description: Removes a sticker from the list of recently used stickers

is_attached.description: Pass true to remove the sticker from the list of stickers recently attached to photo or video files; pass false to remove the sticker from the list of recently sent stickers

sticker.description: Sticker file to delete

clearRecentStickers.description: Clears the list of recently used stickers

is_attached.description: Pass true to clear the list of stickers recently attached to photo or video files; pass false to clear the list of recently sent stickers

addFavoriteSticker.description: Adds a new sticker to the list of favorite stickers. The new sticker is added to the top of the list. If the sticker was already in the list, it is removed from the list first. Only stickers belonging to a sticker set or in WEBP or WEBM format can be added to this list. Emoji stickers can't be added to favorite stickers

sticker.description: Sticker file to add

removeFavoriteSticker.description: Removes a sticker from the list of favorite stickers

sticker.description: Sticker file to delete from the list

getStickerEmojis.description: Returns emoji corresponding to a sticker. The list is only for informational purposes, because a sticker is always sent with a fixed emoji from the corresponding Sticker object

sticker.description: Sticker file identifier

searchEmojis.description: Searches for emojis by keywords. Supported only if the file database is enabled. Order of results is unspecified

input_language_codes.description: List of possible IETF language tags of the user's input language; may be empty if unknown

getKeywordEmojis.description: Return emojis matching the keyword. Supported only if the file database is enabled. Order of results is unspecified

input_language_codes.description: List of possible IETF language tags of the user's input language; may be empty if unknown

type.description: Type of emoji categories to return; pass null to get default emoji categories

getAnimatedEmoji.description: Returns an animated emoji corresponding to a given emoji. Returns a 404 error if the emoji has no animated emoji

getEmojiSuggestionsUrl.description: Returns an HTTP URL which can be used to automatically log in to the translation platform and suggest new emoji replacements. The URL will be valid for 30 seconds after generation

language_code.description: Language code for which the emoji replacements will be suggested

getCustomEmojiStickers.description: Returns the list of custom emoji stickers by their identifiers. Stickers are returned in arbitrary order. Only found stickers are returned

custom_emoji_ids.description: Identifiers of custom emoji stickers. At most 200 custom emoji stickers can be received simultaneously

getDefaultChatPhotoCustomEmojiStickers.description: Returns default list of custom emoji stickers for placing on a chat photo

getDefaultProfilePhotoCustomEmojiSticker.description: Returns default list of custom emoji stickers for placing on a profile photo

getDefaultBackgroundCustomEmojiStickers.description: Returns default list of custom emoji stickers for reply background

addSavedAnimation.description: Manually adds a new animation to the list of saved animations. The new animation is added to the beginning of the list. If the animation was already in the list, it is removed first. Only non-secret video animations with MIME type "video/mp4" can be added to the list

animation.description: The animation file to be added. Only animations known to the server (i.e., successfully sent via a message) can be added to the list

removeSavedAnimation.description: Removes an animation from the list of saved animations

getRecentInlineBots.description: Returns up to 20 recently used inline bots in the order of their last usage

getOwnedBots.description: Returns the list of bots owned by the current user

searchHashtags.description: Searches for recently used hashtags by their prefix

limit.description: The maximum number of hashtags to be returned

removeRecentHashtag.description: Removes a hashtag from the list of recently used hashtags

getLinkPreview.description: Returns a link preview by the text of a message. Do not call this function too often. Returns a 404 error if the text has no link preview

link_preview_options.description: Options to be used for generation of the link preview; pass null to use default link preview options

getWebPageInstantView.description: Returns an instant view version of a web page if available. This is an offline method if only_local is true. Returns a 404 error if the web page has no instant view page

url.description: The web page URL

only_local.description: Pass true to get only locally available information without sending network requests

setProfilePhoto.description: Changes a profile photo for the current user

photo.description: Profile photo to set

is_public.description: Pass true to set the public photo, which will be visible even the main photo is hidden by privacy settings

profile_photo_id.description: Identifier of the profile photo to delete

setAccentColor.description: Changes accent color and background custom emoji for the current user; for Telegram Premium users only

accent_color_id.description: Identifier of the accent color to use

background_custom_emoji_id.description: Identifier of a custom emoji to be shown on the reply header and link preview background; 0 if none

setProfileAccentColor.description: Changes accent color and background custom emoji for profile of the current user; for Telegram Premium users only

profile_accent_color_id.description: Identifier of the accent color to use for profile; pass -1 if none

profile_background_custom_emoji_id.description: Identifier of a custom emoji to be shown on the user's profile photo background; 0 if none

setName.description: Changes the first and last name of the current user

first_name.description: The new value of the first name for the current user; 1-64 characters

last_name.description: The new value of the optional last name for the current user; 0-64 characters

setBio.description: Changes the bio of the current user

bio.description: The new value of the user bio; 0-getOption("bio_length_max") characters without line feeds

setUsername.description: Changes the editable username of the current user

username.description: The new value of the username. Use an empty string to remove the username. The username can't be completely removed if there is another active or disabled username

toggleUsernameIsActive.description: Changes active state for a username of the current user. The editable username can't be disabled. May return an error with a message "USERNAMES_ACTIVE_TOO_MUCH" if the maximum number of active usernames has been reached

is_active.description: Pass true to activate the username; pass false to disable it

reorderActiveUsernames.description: Changes order of active usernames of the current user

usernames.description: The new order of active usernames. All currently active usernames must be specified

setBirthdate.description: Changes the birthdate of the current user

birthdate.description: The new value of the current user's birthdate; pass null to remove the birthdate

setPersonalChat.description: Changes the personal chat of the current user

chat_id.description: Identifier of the new personal chat; pass 0 to remove the chat. Use getSuitablePersonalChats to get suitable chats

setEmojiStatus.description: Changes the emoji status of the current user; for Telegram Premium users only

emoji_status.description: New emoji status; pass null to switch to the default badge

toggleHasSponsoredMessagesEnabled.description: Toggles whether the current user has sponsored messages enabled. The setting has no effect for users without Telegram Premium for which sponsored messages are always enabled

has_sponsored_messages_enabled.description: Pass true to enable sponsored messages for the current user; false to disable them

setBusinessLocation.description: Changes the business location of the current user. Requires Telegram Business subscription

location.description: The new location of the business; pass null to remove the location

setBusinessOpeningHours.description: Changes the business opening hours of the current user. Requires Telegram Business subscription

opening_hours.description: The new opening hours of the business; pass null to remove the opening hours; up to 28 time intervals can be specified

setBusinessGreetingMessageSettings.description: Changes the business greeting message settings of the current user. Requires Telegram Business subscription

greeting_message_settings.description: The new settings for the greeting message of the business; pass null to disable the greeting message

setBusinessAwayMessageSettings.description: Changes the business away message settings of the current user. Requires Telegram Business subscription

away_message_settings.description: The new settings for the away message of the business; pass null to disable the away message

setBusinessStartPage.description: Changes the business start page of the current user. Requires Telegram Business subscription

start_page.description: The new start page of the business; pass null to remove custom start page

sendPhoneNumberCode.description: Sends a code to the specified phone number. Aborts previous phone number verification if there was one. On success, returns information about the sent code

phone_number.description: The phone number, in international format

settings.description: Settings for the authentication of the user's phone number; pass null to use default settings

type.description: Type of the request for which the code is sent

sendPhoneNumberFirebaseSms.description: Sends Firebase Authentication SMS to the specified phone number. Works only when received a code of the type authenticationCodeTypeFirebaseAndroid or authenticationCodeTypeFirebaseIos

token.description: Play Integrity API or SafetyNet Attestation API token for the Android application, or secret from push notification for the iOS application

reportPhoneNumberCodeMissing.description: Reports that authentication code wasn't delivered via SMS to the specified phone number; for official mobile applications only

resendPhoneNumberCode.description: Resends the authentication code sent to a phone number. Works only if the previously received authenticationCodeInfo next_code_type was not null and the server-specified timeout has passed

reason.description: Reason of code resending; pass null if unknown

checkPhoneNumberCode.description: Check the authentication code and completes the request for which the code was sent if appropriate

getBusinessConnectedBot.description: Returns the business bot that is connected to the current user account. Returns a 404 error if there is no connected bot

setBusinessConnectedBot.description: Adds or changes business bot that is connected to the current user account

deleteBusinessConnectedBot.description: Deletes the business bot that is connected to the current user account

bot_user_id.description: Unique user identifier for the bot

toggleBusinessConnectedBotChatIsPaused.description: Pauses or resumes the connected business bot in a specific chat

is_paused.description: Pass true to pause the connected bot in the chat; pass false to resume the bot

removeBusinessConnectedBotFromChat.description: Removes the connected business bot from a specific chat by adding the chat to businessRecipients.excluded_chat_ids

getBusinessChatLinks.description: Returns business chat links created for the current account

createBusinessChatLink.description: Creates a business chat link for the current account. Requires Telegram Business subscription. There can be up to getOption("business_chat_link_count_max") links created. Returns the created link

link_info.description: Information about the link to create

editBusinessChatLink.description: Edits a business chat link of the current account. Requires Telegram Business subscription. Returns the edited link

deleteBusinessChatLink.description: Deletes a business chat link of the current account

getBusinessChatLinkInfo.description: Returns information about a business chat link

getUserLink.description: Returns an HTTPS link, which can be used to get information about the current user

searchUserByToken.description: Searches a user by a token from the user's link

setCommands.description: Sets the list of commands supported by the bot for the given user scope and language; for bots only

scope.description: The scope to which the commands are relevant; pass null to change commands in the default bot command scope

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code. If empty, the commands will be applied to all users from the given scope, for which language there are no dedicated commands

deleteCommands.description: Deletes commands supported by the bot for the given user scope and language; for bots only

scope.description: The scope to which the commands are relevant; pass null to delete commands in the default bot command scope

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code or an empty string

getCommands.description: Returns the list of commands supported by the bot for the given user scope and language; for bots only

scope.description: The scope to which the commands are relevant; pass null to get commands in the default bot command scope

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code or an empty string

setMenuButton.description: Sets menu button for the given user or for all users; for bots only

user_id.description: Identifier of the user or 0 to set menu button for all users

getMenuButton.description: Returns menu button set by the bot for the given user; for bots only

user_id.description: Identifier of the user or 0 to get the default menu button

setDefaultGroupAdministratorRights.description: Sets default administrator rights for adding the bot to basic group and supergroup chats; for bots only

default_group_administrator_rights.description: Default administrator rights for adding the bot to basic group and supergroup chats; pass null to remove default rights

setDefaultChannelAdministratorRights.description: Sets default administrator rights for adding the bot to channel chats; for bots only

default_channel_administrator_rights.description: Default administrator rights for adding the bot to channels; pass null to remove default rights

canBotSendMessages.description: Checks whether the specified bot can send messages to the user. Returns a 404 error if can't and the access can be granted by call to allowBotToSendMessages

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot

allowBotToSendMessages.description: Allows the specified bot to send messages to the user

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot

sendWebAppCustomRequest.description: Sends a custom request from a Web App

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the bot

getBotMediaPreviews.description: Returns the list of media previews of a bot

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot. The bot must have the main Web App

getBotMediaPreviewInfo.description: Returns the list of media previews for the given language and the list of languages for which the bot has dedicated previews

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot. The bot must be owned and must have the main Web App

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code for which to get previews. If empty, then default previews are returned

addBotMediaPreview.description: Adds a new media preview to the beginning of the list of media previews of a bot. Returns the added preview after addition is completed server-side. The total number of previews must not exceed getOption("bot_media_preview_count_max") for the given language

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot. The bot must be owned and must have the main Web App

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code for which preview is added. If empty, then the preview will be shown to all users for whose languages there are no dedicated previews. If non-empty, then there must be an official language pack of the same name, which is returned by getLocalizationTargetInfo

editBotMediaPreview.description: Replaces media preview in the list of media previews of a bot. Returns the new preview after edit is completed server-side

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot. The bot must be owned and must have the main Web App

language_code.description: Language code of the media preview to edit

file_id.description: File identifier of the media to replace

reorderBotMediaPreviews.description: Changes order of media previews in the list of media previews of a bot

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot. The bot must be owned and must have the main Web App

language_code.description: Language code of the media previews to reorder

file_ids.description: File identifiers of the media in the new order

deleteBotMediaPreviews.description: Delete media previews from the list of media previews of a bot

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot. The bot must be owned and must have the main Web App

language_code.description: Language code of the media previews to delete

file_ids.description: File identifiers of the media to delete

setBotName.description: Sets the name of a bot. Can be called only if userTypeBot.can_be_edited == true

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code. If empty, the name will be shown to all users for whose languages there is no dedicated name

name.description: New bot's name on the specified language; 0-64 characters; must be non-empty if language code is empty

getBotName.description: Returns the name of a bot in the given language. Can be called only if userTypeBot.can_be_edited == true

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code or an empty string

setBotProfilePhoto.description: Changes a profile photo for a bot

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot

photo.description: Profile photo to set; pass null to delete the chat photo

toggleBotUsernameIsActive.description: Changes active state for a username of a bot. The editable username can't be disabled. May return an error with a message "USERNAMES_ACTIVE_TOO_MUCH" if the maximum number of active usernames has been reached. Can be called only if userTypeBot.can_be_edited == true

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot

is_active.description: Pass true to activate the username; pass false to disable it

reorderBotActiveUsernames.description: Changes order of active usernames of a bot. Can be called only if userTypeBot.can_be_edited == true

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot

usernames.description: The new order of active usernames. All currently active usernames must be specified

setBotInfoDescription.description: Sets the text shown in the chat with a bot if the chat is empty. Can be called only if userTypeBot.can_be_edited == true

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code. If empty, the description will be shown to all users for whose languages there is no dedicated description

description.description: New bot's description on the specified language

getBotInfoDescription.description: Returns the text shown in the chat with a bot if the chat is empty in the given language. Can be called only if userTypeBot.can_be_edited == true

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code or an empty string

setBotInfoShortDescription.description: Sets the text shown on a bot's profile page and sent together with the link when users share the bot. Can be called only if userTypeBot.can_be_edited == true

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code. If empty, the short description will be shown to all users for whose languages there is no dedicated description

short_description.description: New bot's short description on the specified language

getBotInfoShortDescription.description: Returns the text shown on a bot's profile page and sent together with the link when users share the bot in the given language. Can be called only if userTypeBot.can_be_edited == true

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the target bot

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code or an empty string

setMessageSenderBotVerification.description: Changes the verification status of a user or a chat by an owned bot

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the owned bot, which will verify the user or the chat

verified_id.description: Identifier of the user or the supergroup or channel chat, which will be verified by the bot

custom_description.description: Custom description of verification reason; 0-getOption("bot_verification_custom_description_length_max"). If empty, then "was verified by organization "organization_name"" will be used as description. Can be specified only if the bot is allowed to provide custom description

removeMessageSenderBotVerification.description: Removes the verification status of a user or a chat by an owned bot

bot_user_id.description: Identifier of the owned bot, which verified the user or the chat

verified_id.description: Identifier of the user or the supergroup or channel chat, which verification is removed

getActiveSessions.description: Returns all active sessions of the current user

terminateSession.description: Terminates a session of the current user

terminateAllOtherSessions.description: Terminates all other sessions of the current user

confirmSession.description: Confirms an unconfirmed session of the current user from another device

toggleSessionCanAcceptCalls.description: Toggles whether a session can accept incoming calls

can_accept_calls.description: Pass true to allow accepting incoming calls by the session; pass false otherwise

toggleSessionCanAcceptSecretChats.description: Toggles whether a session can accept incoming secret chats

can_accept_secret_chats.description: Pass true to allow accepting secret chats by the session; pass false otherwise

setInactiveSessionTtl.description: Changes the period of inactivity after which sessions will automatically be terminated

inactive_session_ttl_days.description: New number of days of inactivity before sessions will be automatically terminated; 1-366 days

getConnectedWebsites.description: Returns all website where the current user used Telegram to log in

disconnectWebsite.description: Disconnects website from the current user's Telegram account

disconnectAllWebsites.description: Disconnects all websites from the current user's Telegram account

setSupergroupUsername.description: Changes the editable username of a supergroup or channel, requires owner privileges in the supergroup or channel

supergroup_id.description: Identifier of the supergroup or channel

username.description: New value of the username. Use an empty string to remove the username. The username can't be completely removed if there is another active or disabled username

toggleSupergroupUsernameIsActive.description: Changes active state for a username of a supergroup or channel, requires owner privileges in the supergroup or channel. The editable username can't be disabled. May return an error with a message "USERNAMES_ACTIVE_TOO_MUCH" if the maximum number of active usernames has been reached

supergroup_id.description: Identifier of the supergroup or channel

is_active.description: Pass true to activate the username; pass false to disable it

disableAllSupergroupUsernames.description: Disables all active non-editable usernames of a supergroup or channel, requires owner privileges in the supergroup or channel

supergroup_id.description: Identifier of the supergroup or channel

reorderSupergroupActiveUsernames.description: Changes order of active usernames of a supergroup or channel, requires owner privileges in the supergroup or channel

supergroup_id.description: Identifier of the supergroup or channel

usernames.description: The new order of active usernames. All currently active usernames must be specified

setSupergroupStickerSet.description: Changes the sticker set of a supergroup; requires can_change_info administrator right

sticker_set_id.description: New value of the supergroup sticker set identifier. Use 0 to remove the supergroup sticker set

setSupergroupCustomEmojiStickerSet.description: Changes the custom emoji sticker set of a supergroup; requires can_change_info administrator right. The chat must have at least chatBoostFeatures.min_custom_emoji_sticker_set_boost_level boost level to pass the corresponding color

custom_emoji_sticker_set_id.description: New value of the custom emoji sticker set identifier for the supergroup. Use 0 to remove the custom emoji sticker set in the supergroup

setSupergroupUnrestrictBoostCount.description: Changes the number of times the supergroup must be boosted by a user to ignore slow mode and chat permission restrictions; requires can_restrict_members administrator right

unrestrict_boost_count.description: New value of the unrestrict_boost_count supergroup setting; 0-8. Use 0 to remove the setting

toggleSupergroupSignMessages.description: Toggles whether sender signature or link to the account is added to sent messages in a channel; requires can_change_info member right

toggleSupergroupJoinToSendMessages.description: Toggles whether joining is mandatory to send messages to a discussion supergroup; requires can_restrict_members administrator right

supergroup_id.description: Identifier of the supergroup that isn't a broadcast group

toggleSupergroupJoinByRequest.description: Toggles whether all users directly joining the supergroup need to be approved by supergroup administrators; requires can_restrict_members administrator right

supergroup_id.description: Identifier of the supergroup that isn't a broadcast group

toggleSupergroupIsAllHistoryAvailable.description: Toggles whether the message history of a supergroup is available to new members; requires can_change_info member right

toggleSupergroupCanHaveSponsoredMessages.description: Toggles whether sponsored messages are shown in the channel chat; requires owner privileges in the channel. The chat must have at least chatBoostFeatures.min_sponsored_message_disable_boost_level boost level to disable sponsored messages

toggleSupergroupHasAutomaticTranslation.description: Toggles whether messages are automatically translated in the channel chat; requires can_change_info administrator right in the channel. The chat must have at least chatBoostFeatures.min_automatic_translation_boost_level boost level to enable automatic translation

toggleSupergroupHasHiddenMembers.description: Toggles whether non-administrators can receive only administrators and bots using getSupergroupMembers or searchChatMembers. Can be called only if supergroupFullInfo.can_hide_members == true

toggleSupergroupHasAggressiveAntiSpamEna.description: Toggles whether aggressive anti-spam checks are enabled in the supergroup. Can be called only if supergroupFullInfo.can_toggle_aggressive_anti_spam == true

supergroup_id.description: The identifier of the supergroup, which isn't a broadcast group

toggleSupergroupIsForum.description: Toggles whether the supergroup is a forum; requires owner privileges in the supergroup. Discussion supergroups can't be converted to forums

has_forum_tabs.description: New value of has_forum_tabs; ignored if is_forum is false

toggleSupergroupIsBroadcastGroup.description: Upgrades supergroup to a broadcast group; requires owner privileges in the supergroup

reportSupergroupSpam.description: Reports messages in a supergroup as spam; requires administrator rights in the supergroup

message_ids.description: Identifiers of messages to report. Use messageProperties.can_report_supergroup_spam to check whether the message can be reported

reportSupergroupAntiSpamFalsePositive.description: Reports a false deletion of a message by aggressive anti-spam checks; requires administrator rights in the supergroup. Can be called only for messages from chatEventMessageDeleted with can_report_anti_spam_false_positive == true

message_id.description: Identifier of the erroneously deleted message from chatEventMessageDeleted

getSupergroupMembers.description: Returns information about members or banned users in a supergroup or channel. Can be used only if supergroupFullInfo.can_get_members == true; additionally, administrator privileges may be required for some filters

supergroup_id.description: Identifier of the supergroup or channel

filter.description: The type of users to return; pass null to use supergroupMembersFilterRecent

offset.description: Number of users to skip

limit.description: The maximum number of users to be returned; up to 200

closeSecretChat.description: Closes a secret chat, effectively transferring its state to secretChatStateClosed

getChatEventLog.description: Returns a list of service actions taken by chat members and administrators in the last 48 hours. Available only for supergroups and channels. Requires administrator rights. Returns results in reverse chronological order (i.e., in order of decreasing event_id)

query.description: Search query by which to filter events

from_event_id.description: Identifier of an event from which to return results. Use 0 to get results from the latest events

limit.description: The maximum number of events to return; up to 100

filters.description: The types of events to return; pass null to get chat events of all types

user_ids.description: User identifiers by which to filter events. By default, events relating to all users will be returned

getTimeZones.description: Returns the list of supported time zones

getPaymentForm.description: Returns an invoice payment form. This method must be called when the user presses inline button of the type inlineKeyboardButtonTypeBuy, or wants to buy access to media in a messagePaidMedia message

theme.description: Preferred payment form theme; pass null to use the default theme

validateOrderInfo.description: Validates the order information provided by a user and returns the available shipping options for a flexible invoice

order_info.description: The order information, provided by the user; pass null if empty

allow_save.description: Pass true to save the order information

sendPaymentForm.description: Sends a filled-out payment form to the bot for final verification

payment_form_id.description: Payment form identifier returned by getPaymentForm

order_info_id.description: Identifier returned by validateOrderInfo, or an empty string

shipping_option_id.description: Identifier of a chosen shipping option, if applicable

credentials.description: The credentials chosen by user for payment; pass null for a payment in Telegram Stars

tip_amount.description: Chosen by the user amount of tip in the smallest units of the currency

getPaymentReceipt.description: Returns information about a successful payment

chat_id.description: Chat identifier of the messagePaymentSuccessful message

getSavedOrderInfo.description: Returns saved order information. Returns a 404 error if there is no saved order information

deleteSavedCredentials.description: Deletes saved credentials for all payment provider bots

setGiftSettings.description: Changes settings for gift receiving for the current user

getAvailableGifts.description: Returns gifts that can be sent to other users and channel chats

sendGift.description: Sends a gift to another user or channel chat. May return an error with a message "STARGIFT_USAGE_LIMITED" if the gift was sold out

gift_id.description: Identifier of the gift to send

owner_id.description: Identifier of the user or the channel chat that will receive the gift

text.description: Text to show along with the gift; 0-getOption("gift_text_length_max") characters. Only Bold, Italic, Underline, Strikethrough, Spoiler, and CustomEmoji entities are allowed. Must be empty if the receiver enabled paid messages

is_private.description: Pass true to show gift text and sender only to the gift receiver; otherwise, everyone will be able to see them

pay_for_upgrade.description: Pass true to additionally pay for the gift upgrade and allow the receiver to upgrade it for free

sellGift.description: Sells a gift for Telegram Stars

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection on behalf of which to send the request; for bots only

toggleGiftIsSaved.description: Toggles whether a gift is shown on the current user's or the channel's profile page; requires can_post_messages administrator right in the channel chat

is_saved.description: Pass true to display the gift on the user's or the channel's profile page; pass false to remove it from the profile page

setPinnedGifts.description: Changes the list of pinned gifts on the current user's or the channel's profile page; requires can_post_messages administrator right in the channel chat

owner_id.description: Identifier of the user or the channel chat that received the gifts

received_gift_ids.description: New list of pinned gifts. All gifts must be upgraded and saved on the profile page first. There can be up to getOption("pinned_gift_count_max") pinned gifts

toggleChatGiftNotifications.description: Toggles whether notifications for new gifts received by a channel chat are sent to the current user; requires can_post_messages administrator right in the chat

are_enabled.description: Pass true to enable notifications about new gifts owned by the channel chat; pass false to disable the notifications

getGiftUpgradePreview.description: Returns examples of possible upgraded gifts for a regular gift

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection on behalf of which to send the request; for bots only

keep_original_details.description: Pass true to keep the original gift text, sender and receiver in the upgraded gift

star_count.description: The amount of Telegram Stars required to pay for the upgrade. It the gift has prepaid_upgrade_star_count > 0, then pass 0, otherwise, pass gift.upgrade_star_count

transferGift.description: Sends an upgraded gift to another user or a channel chat

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection on behalf of which to send the request; for bots only

new_owner_id.description: Identifier of the user or the channel chat that will receive the gift

star_count.description: The amount of Telegram Stars required to pay for the transfer

sendResoldGift.description: Sends an upgraded gift that is available for resale to another user or channel chat; gifts already owned by the current user must be transferred using transferGift and can't be passed to the method

gift_name.description: Name of the upgraded gift to send

owner_id.description: Identifier of the user or the channel chat that will receive the gift

star_count.description: The amount of Telegram Stars required to pay for the gift

getReceivedGifts.description: Returns gifts received by the given user or chat

business_connection_id.description: Unique identifier of business connection on behalf of which to send the request; for bots only

exclude_unsaved.description: Pass true to exclude gifts that aren't saved to the chat's profile page. Always true for gifts received by other users and channel chats without can_post_messages administrator right

exclude_saved.description: Pass true to exclude gifts that are saved to the chat's profile page. Always false for gifts received by other users and channel chats without can_post_messages administrator right

exclude_unlimited.description: Pass true to exclude gifts that can be purchased unlimited number of times

exclude_limited.description: Pass true to exclude gifts that can be purchased limited number of times

exclude_upgraded.description: Pass true to exclude upgraded gifts

sort_by_price.description: Pass true to sort results by gift price instead of send date

offset.description: Offset of the first entry to return as received from the previous request; use empty string to get the first chunk of results

limit.description: The maximum number of gifts to be returned; must be positive and can't be greater than 100. For optimal performance, the number of returned objects is chosen by TDLib and can be smaller than the specified limit

getReceivedGift.description: Returns information about a received gift

getUpgradedGift.description: Returns information about an upgraded gift by its name

name.description: Unique name of the upgraded gift

getUpgradedGiftWithdrawalUrl.description: Returns a URL for upgraded gift withdrawal in the TON blockchain as an NFT; requires owner privileges for gifts owned by a chat

password.description: The 2-step verification password of the current user

setGiftResalePrice.description: Changes resale price of a unique gift owned by the current user

resale_star_count.description: The new price for the unique gift; 0 or getOption("gift_resale_star_count_min")-getOption("gift_resale_star_count_max"). Pass 0 to disallow gift resale. The current user will receive getOption("gift_resale_earnings_per_mille") Telegram Stars for each 1000 Telegram Stars paid for the gift

searchGiftsForResale.description: Returns upgraded gifts that can be bought from other owners

gift_id.description: Identifier of the regular gift that was upgraded to a unique gift

order.description: Order in which the results will be sorted
